An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request for a non-existent WSDL file to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2356.title: GIMP SUNRAS plugin buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2356.body: GIMP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the set_color_table in the SUNRAS plugin. By creating a specially-crafted .RAS file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.For Gentoo Linux:Refer to GLSA 200705-08 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (gimp):Refer to USN-467-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0343 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (gimp):Refer to MDKSA-2007:108 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Turbolinux (gimp):Refer to TLSA-2007-34 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2365.title: Multiple Adobe products .PNG file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2365.body: Multiple Adobe products including Photoshop CS2/CS3, Photoshop Elements and Corel Paint Shop Pro are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the PNG.8BI Photoshop Format Plugin. By creating a specially-crafted .PNG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.Refer to APSB07-13, APSB07-16, and APSB07-17 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-2391.title: Apple Safari setTimeout cross-domain security bypass
CVE-2007-2391.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page containing a windows.setTimeout JavaScript function, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof Web content or conduct phishing attacks.Apply APPLE-SA-2007-06-14, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2401.title: Apple Mac OS X XMLHttpRequest HTTP header injection
CVE-2007-2401.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to header injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by headers passed to the XMLHttpRequest. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary HTTP requests, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-006, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For iPhone:Refer to APPLE Article ID: 306173 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-2402.title: Apple QuickTime Java applet information disclosure
CVE-2007-2402.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a design error in the QuickTime for Java. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to capture the user's screen content and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2408.title: Apple Safari Java applet security bypass
CVE-2007-2408.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability within the handling of the "Enable Java" preference. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to load and run the applet, even when Java is disabled.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.3 beta or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References.For Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2415.title: Pi3Web HTTP Server HTTP request denial of service
CVE-2007-2415.body: Pi3Web HTTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service when handling HTTP requests. By sending an overly long specially-crafted HTTP request composed of multiple "\A" characters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Pi3Web (PL2 or later), available from the Pi3 Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-2418.title: Trillian Pro Rendezvous XMPP HTML buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2418.body: Trillian Pro is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Rendezvous / Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) module when decoding HTML. By sending a specially-crafted message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Trillian (3.1.5.1 or later), available from the Trillian Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2428.title: Ahhp-Portal page.php file include
CVE-2007-2428.body: Ahhp-Portal could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the page.php script using the fp or the sc parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2446.title: Samba lsa_io_trans_names buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2446.body: Samba is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the lsa_io_trans_names function. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the LSA RPC interface, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability or upgrade to the latest version of Samba (3.0.25 or later), available from the Samba Web site. CVE-2007-2446.body: Samba is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sec_io_acl function. CVE-2007-2446.body: Samba is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the mb_io_notify_option_type_data function. CVE-2007-2446.body: Samba is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the netdfs_io_dfs_EnumInfo_d function. CVE-2007-2450.title: Apache Tomcat Manager and Host Manager cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2450.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Manager and Host Manager Web forms. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the filename parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (6.0.HEAD, 5.5.HEAD, 5.0.HEAD, or 4.1.HEAD or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. See References.For Red Hat Linux (tomcat):Refer to RHSA-2007:0569 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2458.title: Pixaria Gallery cfg[sys][base_path] parameter file include
CVE-2007-2458.body: Pixaria Gallery could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the class.Smarty.php script or various other scripts using the cfg[sys][base_path] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Pixaria Gallery (1.4.3 or later), available from the Pixaria Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2459.title: Imager Perl extension BMP file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2459.body: The Imager extension for Perl is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the read_4bit_bmp() and read_8bit_bmp() functions. By creating a malicious BMP image file and persuading a victim to open the file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Imager (0.57 or later), available from the Imager Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-2479.title: Trillian CTCP PING information disclosure
CVE-2007-2479.body: Trillian could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the IRC module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending an overly long UTF-8 encoded CTCP PING message to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Trillian (3.1.5.0 or later), available from the Trillian Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2508.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect EarthAgent.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2508.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPCFN_EVENTBACK_Online() function in the EarthAgent.exe daemon. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to TCP port 3628, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ServerProtect 5.58 for Windows Security Patch 3 - Build 1176), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2508.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect AgRpcCln.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2508.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the CAgRpcClient::CreateBinding() function in the AgRpcCln.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ServerProtect 5.58 for Windows Security Patch 3 - Build 1176), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2509.title: PHP ftp_putcmd() function CRLF injection
CVE-2007-2509.body: PHP is vulnerable to CRLF injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ftp_putcmd() function. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary FTP commands using CRLF sequences, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.2 or 4.4.7 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:102 and MDKSA-2007:103 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-462-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (php4):Refer to DSA-1296 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (php5):Refer to DSA-1295 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (PHP):Refer to GLSA 200705-19 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Avaya (PHP):Refer to ASA-2007-231 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2521.title: E-GADS! common.php file include
CVE-2007-2521.body: E-GADS! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the common.php script using the locale parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of E-GADS! (2.2.7 or later), available from the E-GADS! Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2522.title: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) products Console Server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2522.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) Anti-Virus and Anti-Spyware products are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the Console Server login credentials by the inoweb service. By attempting to log in using an overly long username or password, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Security Notice 050807 for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-2524.title: OTRS (Open Ticket Request System) index.pl cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2524.body: OTRS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Subaction parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OTRS available from the OTRS Web site. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (otrs2):Refer to DSA-1298 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2571.title: Xoops WF-Quote Module index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-2571.body: The Xoops WF-Quote Module is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2572.title: NoAh mfa_theme.php file include
CVE-2007-2572.body: NoAh The PHP Content Architect could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mfa_theme.php script using the tpls[1] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2575.title: Gallery Watermark module watermark.php file include
CVE-2007-2575.body: The Gallery Watermark module could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the watermark.php script using the GALLERY_BASEDIR parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2581.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server default.aspx PATH_INFO cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2581.body: Microsoft SharePoint Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the default.aspx script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PATH_INFO string to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-2582.title: IBM DB2 Universal Database DB2 JDBC Applet Server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2582.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DB2 JDBC Applet Server. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for your system, as listed in IBM APAR IY97750. See References.

CVE-2007-2583.title: MySQL IF clause denial of service
CVE-2007-2583.body: MySQL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error in IF clauses. By sending a specially-crafted IF clause, an authenticated remote attacker could cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of MySQL (5.0.40 or later), available from the MySQL Web site. See References.For Mandriva Linux (MySQL):Refer to MDKSA-2007:139 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2589.title: SquirrelMail compose.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-2589.body: SquirrelMail is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the compose.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted email within an IMG tag, which would allow the attacker to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activity, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious email message.Upgrade to the latest version of SquirrelMail (1.4.10 or later), available from Sourceforge.net. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (squirrelmail):Refer to DSA-1290-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux (squirrelmail):Refer to RHSA-2007:0358 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:106 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2609.title: GNU EDU ETCDIR and LIBSDIR file include
CVE-2007-2609.body: GNU EDU could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the lom.php, lom_update.php, check-lom.php, or weigh_keywords.php scripts using the ETCDIR parameter or to the logout.php, help.php, index.php, or login.php scripts using the LIBSDIR parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2666.title: Scintilla RB buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2666.body: Scintilla is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the LexRuby.cxx module when processing RB ruby source files. By creating a specially-crafted .RB file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.Upgrade to the latest version of Scintilla (CVS 1.13 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Repository Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2666.title: Notepad++ RB file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2666.body: Notepad++ is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SciLexer module when processing RB ruby source files. By creating a specially-crafted .RB file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.Upgrade to the latest version of Notepad++ (4.1.2 or later), available from the Notepad++ Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2673.title: Censura vendorid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-2673.body: Censura is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the censura.php script using the vendorid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Censura (1.16.04 or later), available from the Censura Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2719.title: HP Systems Insight Manager JSESSIONID session hijacking
CVE-2007-2719.body: HP Systems Insight Manager could allow a remote attacker to hijack an administrator's session, caused by the improper handling of session data. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially-crafted Web page containing a malicious JSESSIONID cookie value to hijack an administrator's session and gain complete administrative control, if the attacker could persuade the victim to visit a malicious Web page and login to the affected application.Refer to HPSBMA02213 SSRT061214 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-2741.title: Little cms ICC profile buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2741.body: Little cms is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the embedded ICC profile image parser. By creating a specially-crafted JPEG image with an ICC profile, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash if the attacker could persuade the victim to view the malicious image.Update to the latest version of Little cms (1.15 or later), available from the Little cms Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2745.title: Vdeck printcal.pl cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2745.body: Vdeck is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the printcal.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the type parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2764.title: Sun Brocade SilkWorm embedded Linux kernel denial of service
CVE-2007-2764.body: Multiple Sun Brocade SilkWorm switches are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of user-created kernel processes by the embedded Linux kernel. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified attack vectors to cause the device to reboot.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102752 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-2780.title: PsychoStats server.php newtheme information disclosure
CVE-2007-2780.body: PsychoStats could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the server.php script using an invalid newtheme parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Apply the fix for this vulnerability (psychostats3.0.6b.zip), available from the PsychoStats Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2788.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment image parsing buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2788.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the image parsing code. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted applet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102934 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For BEA Jrockit:Refer to BEA07-177.00 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.Refer to HS07-028 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (BEA JRockit):Refer to GLSA 200709-15 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2788.title: Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) ICC profile integer overflow
CVE-2007-2788.body: Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) is vulnerable to an integer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the embedded ICC profile image parser. By creating a specially-crafted JPEG or Bitmap image, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system if the attacker could persuade the victim to view the malicious image.Upgrade to the latest version of Sun JDK (1.5.0_07-b03 or 1.6.0_01-b06 or later), available from the Sun Microsystems Web site. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Sun JDK/JRE):Refer to GLSA 200705-23 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (emul-linux-x86-java):Refer to GLSA 200706-08 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (BEA JRockit):Refer to GLSA 200709-15 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2789.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment Java Virtual Machine denial of service
CVE-2007-2789.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted applet, a remote attacker could cause the Java Virtual Machine to hang, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102934 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For BEA Jrockit:Refer to BEA07-177.00 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (BEA JRockit):Refer to GLSA 200709-15 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2789.title: Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) BMP image parser denial of service
CVE-2007-2789.body: Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) is vulnerable to a denial of service attack when the BMP image parser attempts to open local files on a Linux or Unix system while parsing BMP images. By creating a specially-crafted Bitmap image, a remote attacker could cause a denial of service if the attacker could persuade the victim to view the malicious image.Upgrade to the latest version of Sun JDK (1.5.0_07-b03 or 1.6.0_01-b06 or later), available from the Sun Microsystems Web site. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Sun JDK/JRE):Refer to GLSA 200705-23 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (emul-linux-x86-java):Refer to GLSA 200706-08 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (BEA JRockit):Refer to GLSA 200709-15 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2798.title: MIT Kerberos rename_principal_2_svc buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2798.body: Kerberos is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the kadmind server's rename_principal_2_svc function. By sending a specially-crafted request to rename principals, an authenticated remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.For VMware ESX 3.0.1:Apply Patch Bundle ESX-1001723, available from the VMware Web site. See References.For VMware ESX 3.0.0:Apply Patch Bundle ESX-1001212, available from the VMware Web site. See References.For VMware ESX 3.0.2:Apply Patch Bundle ESX-1001731, available from the VMware Web site. See References.For VMware ESX 2.5.4:Upgrade to the latest version of VMware ESX (patch 10 Build 53326 or later), available from the VMware Web site. See References.For VMware ESX 2.5.3:Upgrade to the latest version of VMware ESX (patch 13 Build 52488 or later), available from the VMware Web site. See References.For VMware ESX 2.1.3:Upgrade to the latest version of VMware ESX (patch 8 Build 53228 or later), available from the VMware Web site. See References.For VMware ESX 2.0.2:Upgrade to the latest version of VMware ESX (patch 8 Build 52650 or later), available from the VMware Web site. See References.For Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, as listed in MITKRB5-SA-2007-005. See References.For Novell:Refer to Novell Security Alert Document ID: 3675615 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0562-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:137 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-477-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Solaris (kadmind):Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102985 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian/GNU Linux (krb5):Refer to DSA-1323-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (MIT Kerberos):Refer to GLSA 200707-11 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Turbolinux (krb5):Refer to TLSA-2007-42 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2799.title: Christos Zoulas file assert function code execution
CVE-2007-2799.body: Christos Zoulas' file and applications implementing the program, such as AMaViS, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow when handling overly large files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially-crafted file to bypass the assert function and execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges, once the malicious file is opened.For Gentoo Linux:Refer to GLSA 200705-25 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For AMaViS:Refer to AMaViS Security Announcement ASA-2007-3 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0391 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (file):Refer to USN-439-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (file):Refer to MDKSA-2007:114 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Avaya systems installed on RHEL versions 4 and 5:Refer to ASA-2007-290 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian Linux (file):Refer to DSA-1343-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate upgrade for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2801.title: eTicket open.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2801.body: eTicket is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the open.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the err or warn parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2803.title: Vizayn Urun Tanitim Sitesi default.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-2803.body: Vizayn Urun Tanitim Sitesi is vulnerable to SQL injection. If "islem" is set to "haberdetay" a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to default.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2816.title: On-line bookmarks manager root parameter file include
CVE-2007-2816.body: On-line bookmarks manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the root parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of On-line bookmarks (0.7.5 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2827.title: LeadTools ISIS ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2827.body: The LeadTools ISIS ActiveX control (ltisi14E.ocx) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2846.title: avast! antivirus SIS buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2846.body: avast! antivirus is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing SIS files. By creating a specially-crafted SIS file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.Upgrade to the latest version of avast! antivirus (4.7.700 or later), available from the avast! antivirus Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2855.title: Dart ZipLite Compression ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2855.body: The Dart ZipLite Compression ActiveX control (DartZipLite.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By creating a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, if the attacker could persuade the victim to visit the Web page and enable the ActiveX control.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2856.title: PowerTCP ZIP Compression ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2856.body: The PowerTCP ZIP Compression ActiveX control (DartZip.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By creating a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, if the attacker could persuade the victim to visit the Web page and enable the ActiveX control.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2856.title: PowerTCP Service ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2856.body: The PowerTCP Service ActiveX control (DartService.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By creating a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, if the attacker could persuade the victim to visit the Web page and enable the ActiveX control.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2872.title: PHP chunk_split() security bypass
CVE-2007-2872.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an integer overflow error in the chunk_split() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass open_basedir or safe_mode restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.8 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-1171.title: NukeSentinel nsbypass.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-1171.body: NukeSentinel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the nsbypass.php script using the tid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of NukeSentinel (2.5.12 or later), available from the NukeScripts Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-1211.title: Microsoft Windows GDI WMF image denial of service
CVE-2007-1211.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by an invalid memory reference that can occur when an application attempts to interpret a malformed Windows Metafile (WMF) image. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site hosting a malformed WMF file, a remote attacker could cause the victim's system to stop responding and possibly restart.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-017. See References.

CVE-2007-2052.title: Python _localemodule.c information disclosure
CVE-2007-2052.body: Python could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an off-by-one error in the PyLocale_strxfrm function in Modules/_localemodule.c that could result in a memory leak. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified attack vector to read portions of memory.For Debian GNU/Linux:Apply the patch for this vulnerability, as listed in Debian Bug report logs - #416934. See References.For Mandriva Linux (python):Refer to MDKSA-2007:099 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2875.title: Linux kernel cpuset_tasks_read function information disclosure
CVE-2007-2875.body: Linux kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an underflow error in the cpuset_tasks_read function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read kernel memory and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux kernel (2.6.20.13 or 2.6.21.4 or later), available from the Linux Kernel Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (linux-source):Refer to USN-489-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (kernel):Refer to MDKSA-2007:171 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (linux-source):Refer to USN-510-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (linux):Refer to DSA-1363-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux (kernel):Refer to RHSA-2007:0705-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2884.title: Microsoft Visual Basic Company Name buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2884.body: Microsoft Visual Basic is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of Visual Basic Project (VBF) files. By creating a specially-crafted VBP file and persuading the victim to open the project description page and select company name, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to consume all available CPU resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2884.title: Microsoft Visual Basic project detail buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2884.body: Microsoft Visual Basic is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By creating a specially-crafted VBP file containing an overly long project detail field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2893.title: Bochs NE2000 buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2893.body: Bochs is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the emulated NE2000 device. By sending a large value in the TXCNT register, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.For Debian GNU/Linux (bochs):Refer to DSA-1351-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-2898.title: 2z project rating.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-2898.body: 2z project is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the rating.php script using the rating or post_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of 2z project (0.9.5 or later), available from the 2z project Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2899.title: Navboard config.php code execution
CVE-2007-2899.body: Navboard could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the config.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system with the privileges of the Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2914.title: PsychoStats multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-2914.body: PsychoStats is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the awards.php, login.php, register.php, and weapons.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2931.title: Microsoft MSN Messenger video conversations buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2931.body: Microsoft MSN Messenger is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by the improper handling of video conversations. By persuading the victim to accept an incoming Web cam invitation and sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-054. See References.For Hewlett-Packard:Refer to HPSBST02260 SSRT071471 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-2952.title: Blue Coat K9 Web Protection HTTP version buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2952.body: Blue Coat K9 Web Protection is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the filter service (k9filter.exe). By sending a specially-crafted HTTP response containing overly long version information, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the service to crash. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, the attacker would need to perform DNS cache poisoning or use man-in-the-middle techniques to intercept a victim's request.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2954.title: Novell Client NWSPOOL.DLL buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2954.body: Novell Client is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nwspool.dll library. By sending specially-crafted RPC requests to the RpcAddPrinterDriver and RpcGetPrinterDriverDirectory functions, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to crash.Refer to Novell Technical Information Document ID: 5005400 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-2957.title: McAfee E-Business Server authentication packet buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2957.body: McAfee E-Business Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the e-Business administration utility service. By sending a specially-crafted authentication packet with an overly large length value, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of McAfee E-Business Server (8.5.3 for Solaris or 8.1.2 for Linux/HP-UX/AIX or later), available from the McAfee Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-2967.title: Multiple F-Secure archive denial of service
CVE-2007-2967.body: Multiple F-Secure Anti-Virus applications are vulnerable to a denial of service. By creating a specially-crafted ARJ archive or FSG packed executable file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to enter an infinite loop, resulting in a denial of service, if the attacker could persuade the victim to scan a malicious file.Refer to F-Secure Security Bulletin FSC-2007-3 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-2980.title: LeadTools Raster ISIS Object ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2980.body: The LeadTools Raster ISIS Object (LTRIS14e.DLL) ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling the DriverName property. By creating a specially-crafted Web page containing a malicious DriverName property, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, once the Web page is opened and the ActiveX control is enabled.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2981.title: LeadTools Raster OCR Document Object ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2981.body: The LeadTools Raster OCR Document Object Library (ltrdc14e.dll) ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling the DictionaryFileName property. By creating a specially-crafted Web page containing a malicious DictionaryFileName property, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, once the page is opened and the ActiveX control is enabled.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2984.title: Media Technology Group CDPass.dll ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-2984.body: The Media Technology Group (CDPass.dll) ActiveX control is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-2985.title: Pheap edit.php code execution
CVE-2007-2985.body: Pheap could allow a remote attacker with knowlege of the Admin username to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the edit.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted URL request using the filename parameter to execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3008.title: Mbedthis AppWeb HTTP TRACE cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3008.body: Mbedthis AppWeb is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. If the HTTP TRACE method is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted HTTP TRACE request to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Mbedthis AppWeb (12.2.2 or later) available from the Mbedthis Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3010.title: Alcatel-Lucent Unified Maintenance Tool OmniPCX masterCGI command execution
CVE-2007-3010.body: The Alcatel-Lucent Unified Maintenance Tool shipped with OmniPCX Enterprise could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the masterCGI script. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary shell commands using the ping and user parameters separated by a semi-colon character (;) in a specially-crafted URL request to the OmniPCX Web interface, which would be executed on the system with the privileges of the Web application user.Refer to the Alcatel-Lucent Security Advisory for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3040.title: Microsoft Agent ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3040.body: The Microsoft Agent ActiveX control (agentdpv.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Agent.Control function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-051. See References.For Hewlett-Packard:Refer to HPSBST02260 SSRT071471 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3050.title: Chameleon CMS PHPSESSID session hijacking
CVE-2007-3050.body: Chameleon CMS could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by a vulnerability in the cookie variable, PHPSESSID. By setting the PHPSESSID variable to a fixed value, a remote attacker could hijack a victim's session once the victim logs into the application using the set PHPSESSID value.Apply patch (build 2085/17) for this vulnerability, available from the Chameleon Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3056.title: WebSVN filedetails.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3056.body: WebSVN is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the filedetails.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the path parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of WebSVN (2.0 or later), available from the WebSVN Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3063.title: My DataBook diary.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3063.body: My DataBook is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the diary.php script using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3064.title: My DataBook diary.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3064.body: My DataBook is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the diary.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3106.title: libvorbis _01inverse code execution
CVE-2007-3106.body: libvorbis could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service, caused by an error in the res0.c file's _01inverse function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite system memory and cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code. Note: This vulnerability also affects Music Box.Upgrade to the latest version of libvorbis (1.2.0 or later), available from the libvorbis Web site. See References.For Music Box:Upgrade to the latest version of Music Box (1.6 or later), as listed in the Tellini Blog, Tuesday, July 31, 2007. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (libvorbis):Refer to USN-498-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux (libvorbis):Refer to RHSA-2007:0845-4 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3119.title: Kartli Alisveris Sistemi news.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-3119.body: Kartli Alisveris Sistemi is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the news.asp script using the news_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3147.title: Yahoo! Messenger Webcam Upload ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3147.body: The Yahoo! Messenger Webcam Upload ActiveX control (ywcupl.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long "Server" property to the Send() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Yahoo! Messenger (8.1.0.401 or later), available from the Yahoo! Messenger Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3148.title: Yahoo! Messenger Webcam Viewer ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3148.body: The Yahoo! Messenger Webcam Upload ActiveX control (ywcvwr.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long "Server" property to the Receive() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Yahoo! Messenger (8.1.0.401 or later), available from the Yahoo! Messenger Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3169.title: EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3169.body: The EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX control (edrawofficeviewer.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the HttpDownloadFile function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3177.title: Ingate Firewall and Ingate SIParator maddr parameter authentication bypass
CVE-2007-3177.body: Ingate Firewall and Ingate SIParator could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication, caused by an error in the authentication requirement for SIP. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the maddr parameter to bypass the authentication process and gain unauthorized access to the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Ingate Firewall or Ingate SIParator (4.5.2 or later), available from the Ingate Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3184.title: Cisco Trust Agent unauthorized access
CVE-2007-3184.body: The Cisco Trust Agent (CTA) software installed on a MacOS X machine could allow a local attacker to bypass authentication and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable system. If the Cisco Secure ACS is configured to display messages after a posture check, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized administrative access to the "System Preferences" window and modify the passwords of admin and non-root user accounts.Refer to cisco-sr-20070611-cta for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3185.title: Apple Safari feed:// denial of service
CVE-2007-3185.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Web page containing a feed://% URL, a remote attacker could cause the browser to crash.Apply APPLE-SA-2007-06-14, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3186.title: Apple Safari URL protocol command execution
CVE-2007-3186.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to execute commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the URL protocol. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system or cause the browser to crash.Apply APPLE-SA-2007-06-14, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3216.title: Computer Associates (CA) Brightstor ARCserve Backup LGServer buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3216.body: CA Brightstor ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by multiple functions in the LGServer. By sending specially-crafted requests, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID: 35673 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3242.title: web-app.org WebAPP and web-app.net WebAPP Network Edition menu manager command execution
CVE-2007-3242.body: web-app.org WebAPP and web-app.net WebAPP Network Edition could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute commands on the system, caused by improper of validation of user-supplied input in the Menu Manager. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary shell metacharacters into personal menus items to create, read, or delete arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of web-app.org WebAPP (0.9.9.6 of 20070221 or later), available from the web-app.org WebAPP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3274.title: Apple Safari document.location denial of service
CVE-2007-3274.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page containing a malicious JavaScript document.location function, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the browser.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3278.title: PostgreSQL Database Link library (dblink) SQL injection
CVE-2007-3278.body: PostgreSQL is vulnerable to SQL injection. If the Database Link library (dblink) is enabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the dblink host parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, local trust authentication must be enabled.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:188 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3291.title: LiveCMS article name cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3291.body: LiveCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the article name form. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the titulo parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3294.title: Tidy extension for PHP tidy_parse_string and tidy_repair_string buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3294.body: The Tidy extension for PHP 5.2.3 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the tidy_parse_string and tidy_repair_string functions. By sending a specially-crafted command, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3301.title: FuseTalk autherror.cfm SQL injection
CVE-2007-3301.body: FuseTalk is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the autherror.cfm or forumerror.cfm script using the errorcode or txForumID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of FuseTalk (after 6/19/2007 or later). Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3338.title: Ingres Database Server uuid_from_char() function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3338.body: Ingres Database Server, which is included in multiple CA (Computer Associates) products, is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the uuid_from_char() and verifydb duve_get_args() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified attack vectors to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-3340.title: HTTP Server GET request denial of service
CVE-2007-3340.body: HTTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending multiple HTTP GET requests to a nonexistent page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to return a 404 error message, resulting in a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3373.body: Cluster Project could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a vulnerability in the process_client function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read client cluster messages.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, as listed on the RCS file Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (redhat-cluster-suite):Refer to USN-476-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3375.title: Lhaca .LZH archives buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3375.body: Lhaca is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .LZH archive, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Lhaca (1.23 or later), available from the Lhaca Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3378.title: PHP session_save_path and error_log security bypass
CVE-2007-3378.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper processing of the session_save_path and error_log values. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass open_basedir and safe_mode directives and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.8 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3378.title: PHP .htaccess security bypass
CVE-2007-3378.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the session_save_path() and ini_set() functions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using directives in the .htaccess file to bypass open_basedir or safe_mode restrictions to gain unauthorized access and modify configuration settings.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3382.title: Apache Tomcat " (single quote) cookie information disclosure
CVE-2007-3382.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused improper handling of ' (single quote) cookie delimiter values. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain cookie information, including the session ID.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (6.0.14 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site - Security Updates. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0871-5 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3385.title: Apache Tomcat \" cookie information disclosure
CVE-2007-3385.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused improper handling of \" character sequences. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain cookie information, including the session ID.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (6.0.14 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site - Security Updates. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0871-5 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3386.title: Apache Tomcat Host Manager Servlet alias cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3386.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Host Manager Servlet. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the hidden alias field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (6.0.14 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site - Security Updates. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0871-5 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3391.title: Wireshark (Ethereal) DCP ETSI denial of service
CVE-2007-3391.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted DCP ETSI packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Wireshark (0.99.6 or later), available from the Wireshark Web site. See References.For Mandriva Linux (wireshark):Refer to MDKSA-2007:145 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For SUSE Linux:Refer to SUSE-SR:2007:015 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3399.title: Pphlogger (Power Phlogger) get_userdata.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3399.body: Pphlogger (Power Phlogger) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the get_userdata.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3399.title: Power Phlogger login.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3399.body: Power Phlogger is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3400.title: NCTAudioEditor2 ActiveX control (NCTWMAFile2.dll) CreateFile file overwrite
CVE-2007-3400.body: The NCTAudioEditor2 ActiveX control (NCTWMAFile2.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the CreateFile function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and enable the ActiveX control, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3405.title: Lebisoft zdefter ad or konu parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3405.body: Lebisoft zdefter is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the defter_kayit.asp and defter_yaz.asp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ad or konu parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3410.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer and HelixPlayer SmilTimeValue::parseWallClockValue() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3410.body: RealNetworks RealPlayer and HelixPlayer are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SmilTimeValue::parseWallClockValue() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted SMIL file containing an overly long time string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the RealNetworks Customer Support - Real Security Updates Web page for upgrade information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3416.title: web-app.org WebAPP and web-app.net WebAPP Network Edition administration cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-3416.body: web-app.org WebAPP and web-app.net WebAPP Network Edition are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by a vulnerability in the administration for poll, profiles, IP bans or forums. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to cause the administrator to perform arbitrary deletions, once the administrator views the malicious request. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.For web-app.org WebAPP:Upgrade to the latest version of web-app.org WebAPP (0.9.9.7 or later), available from the web-app.org WebAPP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3447.title: BugMall Shopping Cart search SQL injection
CVE-2007-3447.body: BugMall Shopping Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search box, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3454.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan CGIOCommon.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3454.body: Trend Micro OfficeScan is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in the CGIOCommon.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted request with an overly long session cookie, remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with Web user privileges.Refer to Trend Micro Web site: June 26, 2007 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3455.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan cgiChkMasterPwd.exe security bypass
CVE-2007-3455.body: Trend Micro OfficeScan could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the cgiChkMasterPwd.exe component. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP header with an empty encryption string and hash value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass Management Console authentication and gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to Trend Micro Web site: June 26, 2007 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3456.title: Adobe Flash Player SWF code execution
CVE-2007-3456.body: Adobe Macromedia Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified vulnerability. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted SWF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB07-12 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3472.title: GD Graphics Library gdImageCreateTrueColor integer overflow
CVE-2007-3472.body: The GD Graphics Library could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the gdImageCreateTrueColor function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified attack vectors to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of the GD Graphics Library (2.0.35 or later), available from the GD Graphics Library Web site. See References.For SUSE Linux:Refer to SUSE-SR:2007:015 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:153 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (tetex):Refer to MDKSA-2007:164 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (GD):Refer to GLSA 200708-05 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3503.title: Sun JDK Javadoc tool cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3503.body: Sun JDK is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Javadoc tool when generating HTML documentation pages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, if they attacker could persuade the victim to view a malicious HTML documentation page. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102958 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For BEA Jrockit:Refer to BEA07-177.00 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (BEA JRockit):Refer to GLSA 200709-15 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3508.title: GNU C Library (glibc) process_envvars integer overflow
CVE-2007-3508.body: The GNU C Library (glibc) is vulnerable to an integer overflow in the process_envvars function. By setting a large LD_HWCAP_MASK environment variable, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3510.title: IBM Lotus Domino IMAP server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3510.body: IBM Lotus Domino is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. If the Domino server is configured for IMAP, a remote authenticated attacker could establish a connection between the IMAP server and TCP port 143 to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1270623 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3516.title: Gorki Online Santrac Sistesi kayit.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3516.body: Gorki Online Santrac Sistesi is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the kayit.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the kullanici, posta, or takim_adi parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3539.title: QuickTicket qti_usr.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3539.body: QuickTicket is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the qti_usr.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3539.title: QuickTalk forum multiple scripts SQL injection
CVE-2007-3539.body: QuickTalk forum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to multiple scripts using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3550.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Zone domain name denial of service
CVE-2007-3550.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a vulnerability that can occur when resolving domain names in different Internet Explorer "Zones". By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that uses JavaScript to fill "Zones" with arbitrary domain names containing certain metacharacters, a remote attacker could consume an excessive amount of CPU resources the next time Internet Explorer is launched.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3551.title: bbs100 state_login_prompt() denial of service
CVE-2007-3551.body: bbs100 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a buffer overflow in the state_login_prompt() function. By attempting to log in as a guest while another guest user is already logged in, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of bbs100 (3.2 or later), available from the bbs100 Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3586.title: MyCMS id file include
CVE-2007-3586.body: MyCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the id parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3593.title: ManageEngine NetFlow Analyzer and OpManager multiple parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3593.body: ManageEngine NetFlow Analyzer and OpManager are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3653.title: Fa Name index.php and page.php scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3653.body: Fa Name is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php and page.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the key, desc, or name parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3654.title: NetBSD display driver denial of service
CVE-2007-3654.body: NetBSD is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of user-supplied input in various display driver functions.
