By sending a negative or large value using an ioctl call, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to arbitrary memory locations, resulting in a system panic.Refer to NetBSD-SA2007-006 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3655.title: Sun Java Web Start JNLP buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3655.body: Sun Java Web Start is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Java Web Start component (javaws.exe). By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JNLP file with an overly long codebase attribute, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102996 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3656.title: Mozilla Firefox wyciwyg:// cross-domain security bypass
CVE-2007-3656.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by an error when handling wyciwyg:// URIs. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information, spoof Web content, conduct phishing attacks, or poison the Web cache.Refer to MFSA 2007-24 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (firefox):Refer to USN-490-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian Linux (xulrunner):Refer to DSA-1337-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian Linux (iceweasel):Refer to DSA-1338-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian Linux (iceape):Refer to DSA-1339-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (mozilla-firefox):Refer to MDKSA-2007:152 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For SUSE Linux:Refer to SUSE-SA:2007:049 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Mozilla):Refer to GLSA 200708-09 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3677.title: eVisit Analyst id parameter path disclosure
CVE-2007-3677.body: eVisit Analyst could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the idsp1.pl, ip.pl and einsite_director.pl CGI scripts using an invalid id parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.eVisit Analyst customers should contact eVisit Analyst support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-3677.title: eVisit Analyst id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-3677.body: eVisit Analyst is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the idsp1.pl, ip.pl, or einsite_director.pl CGI script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.eVisit Analyst customers should contact eVisit Analyst support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-3678.title: QuarkXpress MSWord text-import extension buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3678.body: QuarkXpress is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the MSWord text-import extension's (Word 6-2000 Filter.xnt) lstrcpy function. By persuading a victim to import a specially-crafted DOC file with an overly long font name, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3687.title: RPG Inferno module for vBulletin inferno.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3687.body: The RPG Inferno module for vBulletin is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the inferno.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of RPG Inferno (2.4 as of 7/10/2007 or later), available from the RPG Inferno Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3694.title: Broadcast Machine login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3694.body: Broadcast Machine is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the GET or POST form fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3701.title: TippingPoint IPS hex security bypass
CVE-2007-3701.body: TippingPoint IPS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request containing hexadecimal-encoded alternate Unicode characters to bypass IPS signature detection.Refer to 3COM-07-003 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3711.title: TippingPoint IPS fragmented packet security bypass
CVE-2007-3711.body: TippingPoint IPS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request containing fragmented packets to bypass IPS signature detection.Refer to 3COM-07-002 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3715.title: Sun Java System Application Server and Sun Java System Web Server XSLT stylesheets code execution
CVE-2007-3715.body: Sun Java System Application Server and Sun Java System Web Server could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the Java XML Digital Signature implementation. By sending a specially-crafted XML signature containing a malicious XSLT stylesheet, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary Java code on the system with the application's permissions.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102992 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3739.title: Linux kernel stack expansion denial of service
CVE-2007-3739.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the stack expansion when the hugetlb kernel is used on PowerPC systems. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.For Red Hat Linux (kernel):Refer to RHSA-2007:0705-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-518-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian Linux (linux-2.6):Refer to DSA-1378-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3740.title: Linux kernel CIFS filesystem denial of service
CVE-2007-3740.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the CIFS filesystem. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to dishonor the umask values of a process, resulting in a denial of service.For Red Hat Linux (kernel):Refer to RHSA-2007:0705-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-518-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian Linux (linux-2.6):Refer to DSA-1378-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-3743.title: Apple Safari bookmark buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3743.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to add a specially-crafted bookmark with an overly long title, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.3 beta or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3744.title: Apple Mac OS X mDNSResponder buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3744.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the UPnP IGD (Internet Gateway Device Standardized Device Control Protocol) code of the mDNSResponder implementation. By sending a specially-crafted packet to a vulnerable system, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3750.title: Apple QuickTime Sample Table Sample Descriptor (STSD) atoms buffer overfow
CVE-2007-3750.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the handling of malformed STSD atoms. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QuickTime movie file containing a STSD atom, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3752.title: Apple iTunes music file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3752.body: Apple iTunes is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling album cover art embedded in a media file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted music file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (7.4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3753.title: Apple iPhone Bluetooth server code execution
CVE-2007-3753.body: Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Bluetooth server. By sending specially-crafted Service Discovery Protocol (SDP) packets to an iPhone with Bluetooth enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3754.title: Apple iPhone Mail information disclosure
CVE-2007-3754.body: Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. When Mail Notification is configured to use SSL for incoming and outgoing connections, the users are not notified when the mail server identity has changed or is from an untrusted source. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to impersonate the user's mail server and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3755.title: Apple iPhone tel link phone hijacking
CVE-2007-3755.body: Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to hijack calls. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted email message with a 'tel:' link, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the phone and make an unauthorized telephone call.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3756.title: Apple Safari URL information disclosure
CVE-2007-3756.body: Apple Safari for iPhone, Mac OS X, and Windows could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a design error that allows the popup window read access to the URL in the parent window. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the URL contents to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Safari:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.4 beta or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3757.title: Apple iPhone tel link call hijacking
CVE-2007-3757.body: Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to hijack calls, caused by the improper handling of 'tel:' links in Safari. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted telephone link, a remote attacker could cause a different number to be dialed other than the one displayed in the confirmation dialog. Once the browser is closed, the telephone call is confirmed unintentionally, allowing the attacker to hijack the victim's call.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3758.title: Apple Safari window properties security bypass
CVE-2007-3758.body: Apple Safari for iPhone, Mac OS X, and Windows could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability related to the handling of window properties. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could set JavaScript window properties of another domain and gain unauthorized access to other domains. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Safari:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.4 beta or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3760.title: Apple Safari frame tags security bypass
CVE-2007-3760.body: Apple Safari for iPhone, Mac OS X, and Windows could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability related to the handling of frame tags. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could use frame tags to bypass same origin policy restrictions and gain unauthorized access to other domains. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Safari:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.4 beta or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3761.title: Apple iPhone frame security bypass
CVE-2007-3761.body: Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by the association of JavaScript with the wrong frame in Safari. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute JavaScript code in the context of another domain.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3805.title: Clavister CorePlus IKE denial of service
CVE-2007-3805.body: Clavister CorePlus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified vulnerability in the IKE negotiation during certificate validation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the gateway to become unresponsive, resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Clavister CorePlus (8.81.01 or 8.80.04 or later), available from the Clavister Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3806.title: PHP glob() function denial of service
CVE-2007-3806.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory corruption vulnerability in the glob() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an invalid flags parameter to possibly execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (initialize glob struct), available from the PHP CVS Repository. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3849.title: Advanced Intrusion Detection Environment (AIDE) file checksum security bypass
CVE-2007-3849.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Advanced Intrusion Detection Environment (AIDE) related to file checksum storage has unknown attack vectors and could allow an attacker to bypass file modification detection.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0539-8 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3852.title: sysstat init script privilege escalation
CVE-2007-3852.body: sysstat could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability in the init script (sysstat.ini) when creating temporary files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of sysstat (8.0.0 or later), available from the sysstat Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3874.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution TFTP/MTFTP directory traversal
CVE-2007-3874.body: The Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the PXE component included within the TFTP/MTFTP server. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted request to the TFTP/MTFTP server to traverse directories and view arbitrary files with SYSTEM privileges.Refer to SYM07-025 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3876.title: Apple Mac OS X SMB buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3876.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the mount_smbfs and smbutil applications. By parsing command line arguments, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3884.title: Husrev Forums philboard_forum.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-3884.body: Husrev Forums is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the philboard_forum.asp script using the forumid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3884.title: husrevforum philboard_forum.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-3884.body: husrevforum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the philboard_forum.asp script using the forumid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3887.title: ASP Ziyaretci Defteri mesaj_formu.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3887.body: ASP Ziyaretci Defteri is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mesaj_formu.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Isim or Mesajiniz filelds to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3895.title: Microsoft DirectX DirectShow WAV and AVI code execution
CVE-2007-3895.body: Microsoft DirectShow, which is part of Microsoft DirectX, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper parsing of WAV and AVI files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WAV or AVI file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-3901.title: Microsoft DirectX DirectShow SAMI code execution
CVE-2007-3901.body: Microsoft DirectShow could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability when parameters in a Synchronized Accessible Media Interchange (SAMI) file are parsed. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted SAMI format file, by hosting the file on a Web site.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-3902.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer ActiveX setExpression code execution
CVE-2007-3902.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of the setExpression method when an ActiveX object has been deleted or has not been initialized. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-3903.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer cloneNode and nodeValue code execution
CVE-2007-3903.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of the cloneNode and nodeValue JavaScript functions when an ActiveX object has been deleted or has not been initialized. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-3909.title: Bandersnatch index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3909.body: Bandersnatch is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using search parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Bandersnatch customers should contact Bandersnatch support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-3910.title: Bandersnatch resource name cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-3910.body: Bandersnatch is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the conversation log. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the JID resource name parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Bandersnatch customers should contact Bandersnatch support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-3911.title: Bakbone NetVault Report Manager scheduler client and server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3911.body: Bakbone NetVault Reporter Manager is vulnerable to multiple heap-based buffer overflows in the scheduler client (clsscheduler.exe) and the scheduler server (srvscheduler.exe) services. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST or GET request containing an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Bakbone NetVault Report Manager (3.5 update 4 or later), available from the Bakbone NetVault Report Manager Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3913.title: GForge unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2007-3913.body: GForge is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified attack vectors, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.For Debian/GNU Linux:Refer to DSA-1369-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3925.title: Ipswitch IMail Server Search charset buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3925.body: Ipswitch IMail Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted Search Charset command, a authenticated remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Ipswitch IMail Server (2006.21 or later), available from the Ipswitch Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3925.title: Ipswitch IMail Server IMAP Search buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3925.body: Ipswitch IMail Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted IMAP Search command, an authenticated remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Ipswitch IMail Server (2006.21 or later), available from the Ipswitch Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3928.title: Yahoo! Messenger address book buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3928.body: Yahoo! Messenger is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to add a specially-crafted address book entry, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's application to crash.Yahoo! has implemented a server side fix for this vulnerability.

CVE-2007-3929.title: Opera BitTorrent code execution
CVE-2007-3929.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the BitTorrent service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted BitTorrent URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the victim's privileges, once the entry is removed from the BitTorrent download.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera for Windows (9.22 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Opera):Refer to GLSA 200708-17 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3933.title: QuickEStore insertorder.cfm SQL injection
CVE-2007-3933.body: QuickEStore is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the insertorder.cfm script using the CFTOKEN parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3936.title: A-shop filebrowser.asp file deletion
CVE-2007-3936.body: A-shop could allow a remote attacker to delete files, caused by a vulnerability in the filebrowser.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the delfiles parameter to delete arbitrary files on the Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3937.title: A-shop unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2007-3937.body: A-shop is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3938.title: MDPro topicid SQL injection
CVE-2007-3938.body: MDPro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the topicid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to Security fix for MDPro 19/07/2007 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-3944.title: Apple iPhone Safari and MobileSafari buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3944.body: The Apple iPhone Safari and MobileSafari built-in Web browsers are vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the affected device with administrator privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.3 beta or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References.For iPhone:Refer to APPLE Article ID: 306173 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3988.title: VHCS PHPSESSID session hijacking
CVE-2007-3988.body: Virtual Hosting Control System (VHCS) could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session. User-generated SIDs are accepted. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially-crafted Web page containing a malicious PHPSESSID value to hijack a victim's session and gain the victim's privileges, if the attacker could persuade the victim to visit a malicious Web page and login to the affected application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3996.title: PHP gdImageCopyResized() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3996.body: PHP is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the gdImageCopyResized() function. By passing overly large integer value parameters to the imagecopyresized() or imagecopyresampled() PHP functions, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For Red Hat Linux (PHP):Refer to RHSA-2007:0890-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3996.title: PHP gdImageCreate() and gdImageCreateTrueColor() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3996.body: PHP is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the gdImageCreate() and gdImageCreateTrueColor() functions. By passing overly large integer value parameters to the imagecreatetruecolor() PHP function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For Red Hat Linux (PHP):Refer to RHSA-2007:0890-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (PHP):Refer to MDKSA-2007:187 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3997.title: PHP LOCAL INFILE and MySQL extension security bypass
CVE-2007-3997.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of SQL queries containing the LOCAL INFILE option within the MySQL extension. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass open_basedir or safe_mode directives and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.8 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3997.title: PHP LOCAL INFILE security bypass
CVE-2007-3997.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the MySQL and MySQLi extensions when handling the LOCAL INFILE option. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass open_basedir or safe_mode restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-3999.title: Kerberos kadmind svcauth_gss_validate buffer overflow
CVE-2007-3999.body: Kerberos and applications implementing the Kerberos RPC library are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the svcauth_gss_validate function in the MIT krb5 Kerberos administration daemon (kadmind) RPC library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC authentication context message containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the daemon to crash or execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to MIT krb5 Security Advisory 2007-006 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4000.title: Kerberos kadmind modify policy code execution
CVE-2007-4000.body: Kerberos could allow an authenticated remote attacker with modify policy privileges to execute arbitrary code, caused by an unspecified vulnerability in the MIT krb5 Kerberos administration daemon (kadmind). An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM or root privileges or cause the service to crash.Refer to MIT krb5 Security Advisory 2007-006 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0858-2 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-511-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian/GNU Linux:Refer to DSA-1367-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (krb5):Refer to MDKSA-2007:174 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (krb5):Refer to MDKSA-2007:174-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (mit-krb5):Refer to GLSA 200709-01 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4004.title: IBM AIX ftp gets() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4004.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the ftp client, caused by improper bounds checking by the gets() function. By sending multiple calls to the gets() function, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Apply the interim fix for this vulnerability (ftpgets_ifix.tar.Z), available from the IBM AIX FTP site. See References.

CVE-2007-4008.title: Entertainment Media Sharing custom.php file include
CVE-2007-4008.body: Entertainment Media Sharing could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the custom.php script using the pagename parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4009.title: Confixx Pro saveserver.php file include
CVE-2007-4009.body: Confixx Pro could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the saveserver.php script using the thisdir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Apply the Confixx Pro hotfix available from the swsoft Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4031.title: Nessus Vulnerability Scanner ScanCtrl ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4031.body: The Nessus Vulnerability Scanner ScanCtrl ActiveX control (SCANCTRL.ScanCtrlCtrl.1) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite or delete arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the deleteReport(), deleteNessusRC(), saveNessusRC(), and addsetConfig() methods to overwrite or delete arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Nessus (3.0.6.1 or later), available from the Nessus Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4033.title: PHP imagepsloadfont buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4033.body: PHP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the imagepsloadfont function. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, the GD (php_gd2.dll) extension for PHP must be enabled.For Ubuntu Linux (t1lib):Refer to USN-515-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (t1lib):Refer to MDKSA-2007:189 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4056.title: Adult Directory directory.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4056.body: Adult Directory is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the directory.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4062.title: Nessus Vulnerability Scanner ScanCtrl ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4062.body: The Nessus Vulnerability Scanner ScanCtrl ActiveX control (SCANCTRL.ScanCtrlCtrl.1) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite or delete arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the deleteReport(), deleteNessusRC(), saveNessusRC(), and addsetConfig() methods to overwrite or delete arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Nessus (3.0.6.1 or later), available from the Nessus Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4064.title: Drupal server variable cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4064.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple unspecified server variables. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-018 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4064.title: Drupal custom content type cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4064.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts, including the setting.php script. An authenticated remote attacker with "administer content types" permissions could exploit this vulnerability using custom content type name fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-018 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4138.title: Samba smb.conf privilege escalation
CVE-2007-4138.body: Samba could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges. If the "winbind nss info" parameter in smb.conf is set to sfu or rfc2307 and if sfu or rfc2307 primary groups are missing, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain primary group ID zero privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Samba (3.0.26 or later), available from the Samba Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4139.title: WordPress upload.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4139.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the upload.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the style parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to WordPress trac: Ticket #4689 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4144.title: Form Processor Pro formprocessorpro.php and formprocessorpro.pl cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4144.body: Form Processor Pro is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the formprocessorpro.php and the formprocessorpro.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the base_path parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4169.title: vgallite index.php file include
CVE-2007-4169.body: vgallite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the _functions.php script using the dirpath parameter or the index.php script using the lang parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4172.title: Open WebMail multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4172.body: Open WebMail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4173.title: Hunkaray Okul Portali duyuruoku.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-4173.body: Hunkaray Okul Portali is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the duyuruoku.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4174.title: Tor control protocol command execution
CVE-2007-4174.body: Tor could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands, caused by a vulnerability in the control protocol. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted Web site or Tor exit node, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands, modify the torrc configuration file, and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.1.2.16 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4174.title: Tor ControlPort security bypass
CVE-2007-4174.body: Tor could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in ControlPort when handling multiple connections. If the ControlPort is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and rewrite the "torrc" configuration file of another user, which could reveal the user's anonymity.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.1.2.16 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4203.title: Mambo CMS Cookie session hijacking
CVE-2007-4203.body: Mambo CMS could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by a vulnerability in the Cookie variable. By setting the Cookie variable to a fixed value, a remote attacker could hijack a victim's session once the victim logs into the application using the set Cookie value.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4207.title: Gallery in a Box index.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-4207.body: Gallery in a Box is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.asp script using the Username or Password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4216.title: Check Point ZoneAlarm vsdatant.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2007-4216.body: Check Point ZoneAlarm could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability in the vsdatant.sys device driver. By sending a specially-crafted address, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary system memory and execute arbitrary code with ring0 privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Check Point ZoneAlarm (7.0.362 or later), available from the Check Point ZoneAlarm Service and Support Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4217.title: IBM AIX ftp domacro() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4217.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the domacro() function in the ftp client. By sending a specially-crafted command-line argument, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.For AIX 5.2.0:Apply APAR IZ05487, available from the IBM Quick Links Web site. See References.For AIX 5.3.0:Apply APAR IZ05488, available from the IBM Quick Links Web site. See References.--OR--Apply the interim fix for this vulnerability (ftp_ifix.tar.Z), available from the IBM AIX FTP site. See References.

CVE-2007-4218.title: Trend ServerProtect Agent service RPCFN_CopyAUSrc function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4218.body: Trend ServerProtect Agent service is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPCFN_CopyAUSrc function. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the SpntSvc.exe service on TCP port 3628, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4218.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect Notification.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4218.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the NTF_SetPagerNotifyConfig function in the Notification.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the SpntSvc.exe service on TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4218.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect Eng50.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4218.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based and heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPCFN_ENG_TakeActionOnAFile and RPCFN_ENG_AddTaskExportLogItem functions in the Eng50.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the SpntSvc.exe service on TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4218.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect Stcommon.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4218.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPCFN_CMON_SetSvcImpersonateUser and RPCFN_OldCMON_SetSvcImpersonateUser functions in the Stcommon.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the SpntSvc.exe service on TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4218.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect StRpcSrv.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4218.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPCFN_ENG_NewManualScan, RPCFN_ENG_TimedNewManualScan, and RPCFN_SetComputerName functions in the StRpcSrv.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the SpntSvc.exe service on TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-3563.title: AV Arcade index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-3563.body: AV Arcade is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-3912.title: debian-goodies package checkrestart privilege escalation
CVE-2007-3912.body: The debian-goodies package for Debian Linux could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the checkrestart script. By invoking a program with a specially-crafted filename and persuading the admin user to execute the checkrestart script, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of the debian-goodies package (0.34 or later), available from the Debian Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (debian-goodies):Refer to USN-526-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4219.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPCFN_SYNC_TASK function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4219.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the RPCFN_SYNC_TASK function. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to the SpntSvc.exe service on TCP port 5168, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4220.title: Motorola Timbuktu Pro send request directory traversal
CVE-2007-4220.body: Motorola Timbuktu Pro could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker with Send privileges could send a specially-crafted Send request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to create or delete arbitrary files with SYSTEM level privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Timbuktu Pro for Windows (8.6.5 or later), available from the Motorola Netopia Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4221.title: Motorola Timbuktu Pro Scanner buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4221.body: Motorola Timbuktu Pro is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Scanner functionality. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious server and by sending a specially-crafted HELLO response packet, a remote attacker on the adjacent network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Timbuktu Pro for Windows (8.6.5 or later), available from the Motorola Netopia Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4221.title: Motorola Timbuktu Pro login buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4221.body: Motorola Timbuktu Pro is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted login request with an overly long username, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Timbuktu Pro for Windows (8.6.5 or later), available from the Motorola Netopia Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4221.title: Motorola Timbuktu Pro application level protocol buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4221.body: Motorola Timbuktu Pro is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending specially-crafted protocol requests, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Timbuktu Pro for Windows (8.6.5 or later), available from the Motorola Netopia Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4222.title: IBM Lotus Notes HTML RTF conversion buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4222.body: IBM Lotus Notes is vulnerable to a buffer overflow when HTML messages are converted to RTF (Rich Text Format). By sending a specially-crafted HTML email to a vulnerable system, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's email client to crash, once the message is converted back to an HTML message after initially being converted to RTF. This conversion occurs when the message is forwarded, replied to with history, or copied to the clipboard.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1272930 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4244.title: J! Reactions Joomla! component langset.php file include
CVE-2007-4244.body: The J! Reactions Joomla! component could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the langset.php script using the comPath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.J! Reactions Joomla! component customers should contact J! Reactions support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-4245.title: CONTENTdm search.php and results.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4245.body: CONTENTdm is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php and results.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the CISOBOX1 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4267.title: Apple Mac OS X Networking component IOCTL AppleTalk buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4267.body: The Apple Mac OS X Networking component is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of IOCTL requests when adding new AppleTalk zones to the routing table. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges or cause the system to crash. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, AppleTalk must be enabled and configured in routing mode. This is not the default configuration.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4268.title: Apple Mac OS X Networking component AppleTalk mbuf buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4268.body: The Apple Mac OS X Networking component is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the function that allocates mbufs. By sending a specially-crafted AppleTalk request containing a negative value, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges or cause the system to crash. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, AppleTalk must be enabled. This is not the default configuration.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4269.title: Apple Mac OS X Networking component AppleTalk buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4269.body: The Apple Mac OS X Networking component is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the handling of ASP (AppleTalk Session Protocol) messages. By sending a specially-crafted ASP message to an AppleTalk socket, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4276.title: IBM DB2 buildDasPaths() DASPROF environment variable buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4276.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow in the buildDasPaths() function. By setting an overly long DASPROF environment variable, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.For DB2 Universal Database 8:Refer to IBM APAR IY99311 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For DB2 Universal Database 9.1:Refer to IBM APAR IY97346 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4278.title: ESRI ArcSDE numeric values buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4278.body: ESRI ArcSDE is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ArcSDE giomgr process. By sending an over large numeric value that needs more than 8 bytes for representation of ASCII to TCP port 5151, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Upgrade to ESRI ArcSDE (9.2 SP3 or later), available from ESRI Support Center. See References.

CVE-2007-4286.title: Cisco IOS Next Hop Resolution Protocol buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4286.body: Multiple Cisco devices running versions of Cisco IOS with the Next Hop Resolution Protocol enabled are vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the device to restart.Refer to cisco-sa-20070808-nhrp for upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4328.title: Bilder Galerie multiple scripts file include
CVE-2007-4328.body: Bilder Galerie could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the config[root_ordner] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4338.title: Family Connections index.php fcms_login_id security bypass
CVE-2007-4338.body: Family Connections could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper checking of authentication credentials by the index.php script. By setting the fcms_login_id cookie parameter to an arbitrary value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access with administrative credentials to a vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Family Connections (0.9 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2007-4342.title: PHPCentral Login Script include.php file include
CVE-2007-4342.body: The PHPCentral Login Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the include.php script using the _SERVER[DOCUMENT_ROOT] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4345.title: IPSwitch IMail Server IMail Client buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4345.body: IPSwitch IMail Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the IMail client. By sending a specially-crafted email message containing multipart MIME data using an overly long boundary parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of IPSwitch Imail Server (2006.23 or later), available from the 2006.23 Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4347.title: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Server bengine.exe denial of service
CVE-2007-4347.body: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by multiple integer overflow errors in the Backup Exec Job Engine service (bengine.exe). By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 5633, a remote attacker could cause the service to enter into an infinite loop and consume an overly large amount of CPU resources and all available memory, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to SYM07-029 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4348.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) CAD service cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4348.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the CAD service. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the file functionality to inject malicious script into the dsmerror.log which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the log file is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4350.title: HP SiteScope SNMP trap message cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4350.body: HP SiteScope is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using received SNMP trap messages to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the information in the management interface is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.cool-No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4351.title: CUPS ippReadIO function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4351.body: CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ippReadIO function in cups/ipp.c. By sending specially-crafted textWithLanguage or nameWithLanguage tags in an IPP (Internet Printing Protocol) request, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the service to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4364.title: Fedora Commons LDAP server security bypass
CVE-2007-4364.body: Fedora Commons could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error while binding to the LDAP server using an empty password. Certain LDAP implementations return a success code, which would allow an attacker to exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and gain unauthorized access to the affected application.Upgrade to the latest version of Fedora Commons (2.2.1 or later), available from SourceForge.net : Files. See References.

CVE-2007-4368.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest username SQL injection
CVE-2007-4368.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the username field on the login page, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.For versions 2003.16 Patch 2007C, 7.0.0.1_iFix04, and 7.0.1.0_iFix01:Apply the testfixes, (available before December 19, 2007), available to registered customers from the IBM Rational ClearQuest Web site. See References.For versions 2003.06.16 Patch 2007D, 7.0.0.2, and 7.0.1.1:Apply the latest patch, (available on December 19, 2007), available to registered customers from the IBM Rational ClearQuest Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4390.title: BlueCat Adonis DNS/DHCP CLI privilege escalation
CVE-2007-4390.body: The BlueCat Adonis DNS/DHCP appliance could allow a local attacker with administrator privileges to gain elevated privileges on the underlying operating system. By sending a specially-crafted command to the command line interface (CLI), an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute commands with root privileges on the Adonis device.Upgrade to the latest version of Adonis (5.0.5 or later), available from the BlueCat Networks Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4391.title: Yahoo! Messenger webcam streams buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4391.body: Yahoo! Messenger is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by the improper handling of malformed JPEG 2000 code streams sent by the webcam stream. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious webcam stream, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Yahoo! Messenger (8.1.0.421 or later), available from the Yahoo! Messenger Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4419.title: Olate Download admin.php security bypass
CVE-2007-4419.body: Olate Download could allow a remote attacker with knowledge of the admin username to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the admin.php script. By sending a specially-crafted cookie, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized admin access to the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Olate Download (3.4.2 or later), available from the SourceForge.net : Olate Download Forum, 2007-08-20 22:20. See References.

CVE-2007-4420.title: EDraw Office Viewer Component officeviewer.ocx ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4420.body: The EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX control (officeviewer.ocx) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the HttpDownloadFile() function to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4423.title: IBM DB2 AUTH_LIST_GROUPS_FOR_AUTHID function denial of service
CVE-2007-4423.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the AUTH_LIST_GROUPS_FOR_AUTHID function in IBM DB2 could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service.For DB2 Universal Database 9.1:Refer to IBM APAR 1IZ01828 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4436.title: Project and Project issue tracking module for Drupal title information disclosure
CVE-2007-4436.body: The Project and Project issue tracking module for Drupal could allow an authenticated remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the tracker module and the Recent Posts page. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view project titles, issues, and possibly CVS information.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-020 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4438.title: Ampache session hijacking
CVE-2007-4438.body: Ampache is vulnerable to session hijacking, caused by a vulnerability in the session handling code. By persuading the victim to log into the application using a specially-crafted link, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and hijack any known user's Web session.Upgrade to the latest version of Ampache (3.3.3.5 or later), available from the Ampache Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4456.title: SimpleFAQ component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4456.body: The SimpleFAQ component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the aid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of SimpleFAQ (2.5 or later), available from the Parkview Consultants Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4457.title: Dalai Forum forumreply.php file include
CVE-2007-4457.body: Dalai Forum could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the forumreply.php script using the chemin parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4458.title: firesoft class_tpl.php file include
CVE-2007-4458.body: firesoft could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the class_tpl.php script using the cache_file parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4459.title: Cisco IP Phone 7940 SIP message sequence denial of service
CVE-2007-4459.body: Cisco IP Phone 7940 running firmware POS3-08-6-00 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of the state engine in the SIP stack. By sending a sequence of specially-crafted SIP INVITE and OPTIONS messages, a remote attacker could cause the device to reboot.Refer to cisco-sr-20070821-sip for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4464.title: Fileinfo plugin for Total Commander multiple PE file header spoofing
CVE-2007-4464.body: The Fileinfo plugin for Total Commander could allow a remote attacker to spoof the Image File Header tab information. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted PE file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the Image File Header tab.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4465.title: Apache HTTP Server UTF-7 cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4465.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by mod_autoindex.c. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the UTF-7 charset option to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.2.6 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4466.title: Electronic Arts SnoopyCtrl ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4466.body: The Electronic Arts SnoopyCtrl ActiveX control is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities using unspecified methods and initialization parameters to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4467.title: Oracle JInitiator beans.ocx ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4467.body: The Oracle JInitiator ActiveX control (beans.ocx) is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of Oracle JInitiator (1.3.1.28 or later), available from the Oracle Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4470.title: Earth Resource Mapping NCSView ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4470.body: The Earth Resource Mapping NCSView ActiveX control (NCSView.dll) included in the ECW JPEG 2000 Plug-in is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges or cause the browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the NCSView ActiveX control (3.4.0.242 or later) included in the latest version of ECW JPEG 2000 Plug-in (8.1 or later), available from the ER Mapper Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4471.title: QuickBooks Online Edition ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4471.body: The QuickBooks Online Edition ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to overwrite or download arbitrary files on the system, caused by a vulnerability in multiple functions, including the httpGETToFile() and httpPOSTFromFile() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite, corrupt, and download arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of the QuickBooks Online Edition ActiveX control (10 or later), available from the QuickBooks Online Edition Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4472.title: Broderbund Expressit 3DGreetings Player ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4472.body: The Broderbund Expressit 3DGreetings Player ActiveX control is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4473.title: Gesytec Easylon OPC Server code execution
CVE-2007-4473.body: The Gesytec Easylon OPC Server could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of server handles. A remote attacker with access to the OPC interface could exploit this vulnerability and gain unauthorized access to the server memory to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or crash the server.Upgrade to the latest version of Easylon OPC server (2.3.44 or later), available from the Gesytec FTP directory. See References.

CVE-2007-4474.title: IBM Lotus Domino Web Access dwa7 ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4474.body: The IBM Lotus Domino Web Access ActiveX control (dwa7W.dll, dwa7.dll, inotes6.dll, and inotes6w.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the General_ServerName property. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that passes an overly long string to the General_ServerName property and then calls the InstallBrowserHelperDll() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to IBM Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4475.title: SAP GUI EAI WebViewer3D ActiveX control SaveViewToSessionFile() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4475.body: SAP GUI EAI WebViewer3D ActiveX control (webviewer3d.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the SaveViewToSessionFile() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system (SAPgui 7.10 Patch Level 9), available for registered users from the SAP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4491.title: Gurur Haber uyeler2.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4491.body: Gurur Haber is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the uyeler2.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4514.title: HP ProCurve Manager and ProCurve Manager Plus unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2007-4514.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP ProCurve Manager and HP ProCurve Manager Plus could allow a remote unauthorized attacker to view sensitive information on the server.Refer to HPSBMA02420 SSRT071458 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4515.title: Yahoo! Messenger YVerInfo.dll ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4515.body: The Yahoo! Messenger ActiveX control (YVerInfo.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Yahoo! Messenger (8.1.0.419 or later), available from the Yahoo Messenger Web site - Security Updates. See References.

CVE-2007-4517.title: Oracle Database XDB.XDB_PITRIG_PKG. PITRIG_DROPMETADATA buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4517.body: Oracle Database is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the XDB.XDB_PITRIG_PKG.PITRIG_DROPMETADATA procedure, caused by improper bounds checking of the OWNER and NAME arguments.
