By sending specially-crafted arguments to the vulnerable procedure, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the database account.Upgrade to the latest version of Oracle Database Server (10.2.0.4 R2 or later), available from the Oracle Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4539.title: Bugzilla WebService (XML-RPC) interface information disclosure
CVE-2007-4539.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insecure permissions on time-tracking fields in the WebService (XML-RPC) interface. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to the Bugzilla Web site for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Bugzilla):Refer to GLSA 200709-18 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4540.title: Olate Download download.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4540.body: Olate Download is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the download.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Olate (3.4.2 or later), available from the Olate Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4541.title: Olate Download fldm.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4541.body: Olate Download is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the fldm.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTML tags embedded within the comment field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Olate (3.4.2 or later), available from the Olate Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4541.title: Olate Download files.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4541.body: Olate Download is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the files.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cat parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Olate (3.4.2 or later), available from the Olate Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4543.title: Bugzilla buildid cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4543.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the guided form when filing bugs. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the buildid field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the Bugzilla Web site for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Bugzilla):Refer to GLSA 200709-18 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4549.title: ALPass APW file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4549.body: ALPass is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by the improper handling of size information of encrypted records. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted APW file and importing site information, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of ALPass (2.74 or later), available from the ALPass Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4549.title: ALPass ALPass DB File buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4549.body: ALPass is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Import Site Information feature. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ALPass DB File and importing site information from an APW file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of ALPass (2.74 or later), available from the ALPass Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4563.title: Hitachi Cosminexus Application Server group permissions security bypass
CVE-2007-4563.body: The Hitachi Cosminexus Application Server could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the incorrect handling of group permissions. When a logical J2EE server or a logical user server is started from Cosminexus Manager, a local attacker could assign the group permissions of another user to an active server process. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to files and directories.Refer to HS07-025 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4564.title: Hitachi Cosminexus Application Server group permissions security bypass
CVE-2007-4564.body: The Hitachi Cosminexus Application Server could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the incorrect handling of group permissions. When a logical J2EE server or a logical user server is started from Cosminexus Manager, a local attacker could assign the group permissions of another user to an active server process. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to files and directories.Refer to HS07-025 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4566.title: SIDVault LDAP buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4566.body: SIDVault is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the LDAP login mechanism. By sending a specially-crafted LDAP request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of SIDVault (2.0f or later), available from the SIDVault Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4567.title: Linux kernel IPv6 hop-by-hop header denial of service
CVE-2007-4567.body: The Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted IPv6 packet containing a malformed hop-by-hop header, a remote attacker could cause a kernel panic.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux kernel (2.6.22-rc1 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4568.title: X.Org XFS protocol requests buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4568.body: X.Org XFS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the handlers for the QueryXBitmaps and QueryXExtents protocol requests. By sending specially-crafted QueryXBitmaps and QueryXExtents requests, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the server. Note: On Solaris systems, remote exploitation is possible via specially-crafted requests to TCP port 7100.Upgrade to the latest version of X.Org XFS (1.0.5 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2008-001 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X 10.4.11:Apply the Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information.

CVE-2007-4570.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux mctrans daemon denial of service
CVE-2007-4570.body: The Red Hat Enterprise Linux MCS translation daemon (mctransd) is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the substitute_range() function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause mctransd to temporarily stop responding to other requests.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4572.title: Samba nmbd buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4572.body: Samba is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing GETDC logon requests. If Samba is configured as a Primary or Backup Domain Controller, a remote attacker from within the local network could send a specially-crafted GETDC mailslot request to overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Samba (3.0.27 or later), available from the Samba Web site. See References.Refer to VMSA-2008-0001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information, available from the VMware Security-announce Mailing List, Mon Jan 7 17:46:23 PST 2008. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4575.title: OpenOffice.org HSQLDB code execution
CVE-2007-4575.body: OpenOffice.org could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error in the HSQLDB database engine. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted database document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary static Java code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (2.3.1 or later), available from the OpenOffice Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4580.title: BufferZone redlight.sys driver privilege escalation
CVE-2007-4580.body: BufferZone could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability in the redlight.sys driver. By sending specially-crafted IOCTL commands, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4581.title: WBB2-Addon acrotxt.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4581.body: The WBB2-Addon for Acrotxt is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the acrotxt.php script using the show parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4582.title: NVR nvUnifiedControl ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4582.body: The NVR nvUnifiedControl ActiveX control (nvUnifiedControl.dll) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the SetText() function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4583.title: ACTi NVR Server nvUtility.Utility ActiveX control SaveXMLFile() file overwrite
CVE-2007-4583.body: The ACTi NVR Server nvUtility.Utility ActiveX control (nvUtility.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the SaveXMLFile() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to write malicious data and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4583.title: ACTi NVR Server nvUtility.Utility ActiveX control DeleteXMLFile() file overwrite
CVE-2007-4583.body: The ACTi NVR Server nvUtility.Utility ActiveX control (nvUtility.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the DeleteXMLFile() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4584.title: BitchX p_mode function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4584.body: BitchX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the p_mode function. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4586.title: PHP php_iisfunc.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4586.body: PHP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by multiple functions in the php_iisfunc.dll library. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges or cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4587.title: escafeWeb (Tuigwaa) unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4587.body: escafeWeb (Tuigwaa) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of escafeWeb (Tuigwaa) (1.0.5 or later), available from the escafeWeb (Tuigwaa) Web site. CVE-2007-4588.title: InterWorx-CP Server Admin Level (NodeWorx) multiple scripts file include
CVE-2007-4588.body: InterWorx-CP Server Admin Level (NodeWorx) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using various parameters to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of InterWorx-CP (3.0.3 or later), available from the InterWorx-CP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4588.title: InterWorx-CP index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4588.body: InterWorx-CP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of InterWorx-CP (3.0.3 or later), available from the InterWorx-CP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4589.title: InterWorx-CP Webmaster Level (SiteWorx) multiple scripts file include
CVE-2007-4589.body: InterWorx-CP Webmaster Level (SiteWorx) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using various parameters to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of InterWorx-CP (3.0.3 or later), available from the InterWorx-CP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4592.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Web interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4592.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the contextid, userNameVal or username parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.IBM Rational ClearQuest customers should contact IBM support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-4595.title: Mayaa UTF-7 cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4595.body: Mayaa is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted UTF-7 encoded URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Mayaa (1.1.12 or later), available from the Mayaa Web site. CVE-2007-4599.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer PLS file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4599.body: RealNetworks RealPlayer and RealOne Player are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of PLS files. CVE-2007-4600.title: Mathcad XMCDZ worksheet protection security bypass
CVE-2007-4600.body: Mathcad could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions on protected worksheets, caused by a weakness in the XMCDZ file format. By extracting the XML file from the XMCDZ worksheet and modifying or removing the protection tag, an attacker could edit protected data on the worksheet.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4602.title: Micro-CMS revert-content.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4602.body: Micro-CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the revert-content.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4603.title: ACG News index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4603.body: ACG News is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the aid or catid variable, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.ACG News customers should contact AlterCoder support for upgrade or patch information. CVE-2007-4605.title: Virtual War (vWar) mvcw.php file include
CVE-2007-4605.body: Virtual War (vWar) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mvcw.php script using the vwar_root parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4606.title: PHPNuke-Clan mvcw_conver.php file include
CVE-2007-4606.body: PHPNuke-Clan could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mvcw_conver.php script using the vwar_root parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4607.title: Quiksoft EasyMail Objects ActiveX SubmitToExpress buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4607.body: Quiksoft EasyMail Objects and multiple applications implementing the affected program, including PostCast Server, are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SMTP Object ActiveX control's (emsmtp.dll) SubmitToExpress function. CVE-2007-4610.title: Moon Gallery config/admin.php file upload
CVE-2007-4610.body: The Moonware Moon Gallery could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the config/admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4611.title: Moonware Calendar Events viewevent.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4611.body: Moonware Calendar Events is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewevent.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4612.title: Moonware Contact Form contact.php CRLF injection
CVE-2007-4612.body: Moonware Contact Form is vulnerable to CRLF injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the contact.php script. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary HTTP headers using multiple parameters containing CRLF character sequences, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4617.title: BEA Weblogic Server and WebLogic Express unspecified denial of service
CVE-2007-4617.body: The BEA Weblogic Server and WebLogic Express are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when processing client requests. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to cause the server threads to hang, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to BEA07-87.02 for patch and upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-4618.title: BEA Weblogic Server and WebLogic Express headers denial of service
CVE-2007-4618.body: The BEA Weblogic Server and WebLogic Express are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when processing malformed headers. By sending a specially-crafted header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available disk space, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to BEA07-148.01 for patch and upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-4619.title: libFLAC media files multiple integer overflows
CVE-2007-4619.body: The libFLAC library, which is used to process FLAC (Free Lossless Audio Codec) files and is included in various software distributions, is vulnerable to integer overflows. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FLAC file, a remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libFLAC (1.2.1 or later), available from the FLAC Web site. See References.For VLC Media Player:Upgrade to the latest version of VLC Media Player (0.8.6d or later), available from the VideoLAN Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4620.title: CA Alert Notification Server service (Alert.exe) buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4620.body: The Computer Associates (CA) Alert Notification Service (Alert.exe), which is used in multiple CA products, is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the service to crash.Refer to the CA Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4621.title: IBM AIX crontab buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4621.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the crontab command. By sending a specially-crafted command-line argument, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.For AIX 5.2.0:Apply APAR IZ04832, available from the IBM Quick Links Web site. See References.--OR--Apply the interim fix for this vulnerability (crontab_ifix.tar), available from the IBM AIX FTP site. See References.

CVE-2007-4622.title: IBM AIX dig utility dns_name_fromtext integer underflow
CVE-2007-4622.body: The IBM AIX dig utility is vulnerable to an integer underflow in the dns_name_fromtext function in libdns.a. By sending a specially-crafted TSIG key parameter using the -y command line option, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Apply APAR IZ05017, available from the IBM Quick Links Web site. See References.--OR--Apply the interim fix for this vulnerability (dig_ifix.tar), available from the IBM AIX FTP site. See References.

CVE-2007-4623.title: IBM AIX bellmail buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4623.body: IBM AIX bellmail is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sendrmt function. By sending an overly long parameter using the "m" command, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.For AIX 5.2.0:Apply APAR IZ05066, available from the IBM Quick Links Web site. See References.For AIX 5.3.0:Apply APAR IZ05065, available from the IBM Quick Links Web site. See References.--OR--Apply the interim fix for this vulnerability (bellmail_ifix.tar), available from the IBM AIX FTP site. See References.

CVE-2007-4633.title: Cisco CallManager and Unified Communications Manager multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4633.body: Cisco CallManager and Unified Communications Manager are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin and logon pages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the lang variable to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to cisco-sa-20070829-ccm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4634.title: Cisco CallManager and Unified Communications Manager multiple SQL injection
CVE-2007-4634.body: The Cisco CallManager and Unified Communications Manager administration interface is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin or user logon pages using the lang variable, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to cisco-sa-20070829-ccm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4640.title: Pakupaku CMS index.php file upload
CVE-2007-4640.body: Pakupaku CMS could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4641.title: Pakupaku CMS index.php file include
CVE-2007-4641.body: Pakupaku CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4642.title: Doomsday Msg_Write() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4642.body: Doomsday is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Msg_Write() function. By sending an overly long chat message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4642.title: Doomsday D_NetPlayerEvent() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4642.body: Doomsday is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the D_NetPlayerEvent() function. By sending an overly long chat message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4643.title: Doomsday Sv_HandlePacket() underflow
CVE-2007-4643.body: Doomsday is vulnerable to an integer underflow, caused by improper handling of chat messages by the Sv_HandlePacket() function. By sending a specially-crafted PKT_CHAT packet, a remote attacker could attempt to allocate an overly large amount of memory which could cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4644.title: Doomsday Cl_GetPackets() format string
CVE-2007-4644.body: Doomsday could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a format string vulnerability in the Cl_GetPackets() function. By sending a specially-crafted PSV_CONSOLE_TEXT message containing format string specifiers, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4645.title: NMDeluxe index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4645.body: NMDeluxe is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4646.title: Hexamail Server POP3 request buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4646.body: Hexamail Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted POP3 request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Hexamail Server (3.0.1.004 or later), available from the Hexamail Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4647.title: Our Space uploadmedia.cgi file upload
CVE-2007-4647.body: Our Space could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by a vulnerability in the newswire/uploadmedia.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4648.title: Norman Virus Control nvcoaft51.sys driver privilege escalation
CVE-2007-4648.body: Norman Virus Control could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability in the nvcoaft51.sys driver. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request with a malicious KEVENT struct, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Virus Control (5.90 or later), available from the Norman Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4649.title: Multiple eScan products installation directory insecure permissions
CVE-2007-4649.body: Multiple MicroWorld eScan products could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by insecure permissions assigned to the installation directory. By placing malformed files or modifying specific DLL files in the directory, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system with SYSTEM level privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4654.title: Cisco Content Services Switch (CSS) SSHield denial of service
CVE-2007-4654.body: Cisco Content Services Switch (CSS) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SSHield with OpenSSH on Cisco WebNS. By sending multiple large packets intended to exploit the SSH CRC32 attack detection overflow, a remote attacker could exhaust the connection slot and cause the device to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4655.title: Shopping Basket Pro unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2007-4655.body: Shopping Basket Pro could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an unspecified vulnerability related to improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Shopping Basket Pro (7.52 or later), available from the Shopping Basket Pro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4657.title: PHP strcspn() and strspn() functions unspecified vulnerability
CVE-2007-4657.body: An unspecified vulnerability in PHP related to an integer overflow error in the strcspn() and strspn() functions has an unknown impact and remote attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.8 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4657.title: PHP str[c]spn() integer overflow
CVE-2007-4657.body: PHP is vulnerable to an integer overflow in the str[c]spn() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4662.title: PHP php_openssl_make_REQ() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4662.body: PHP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the php_openssl_make_REQ() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4663.title: PHP glob() open_basdir security bypass
CVE-2007-4663.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker bypass security restrictions, caused by an unspecified vulnerability in the glob() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass open_basedir restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.4 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4664.title: Firebird MAX_PATH_LEN unspecified
CVE-2007-4664.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Firebird related to the attach database and create database commands with overly large MAX_PATH_LEN values has an unknown impact and attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of Firebird (2.0.2 or later), available from the SourceForge.net : Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4665.title: Firebird XNET denial of service
CVE-2007-4665.body: Firebird is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when registering events in parallel with an XNET client. A local attacker on the adjacent network could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Firebird (2.0.2 or later), available from the SourceForge.net : Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4666.title: Firebird unspecified network packet denial of service
CVE-2007-4666.body: Firebird is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing network packets. By sending overly large network packets, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to increase the CPU load to a higher value and consume large amounts of memory resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Firebird (2.0.2 or later), available from the SourceForge.net : Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4671.title: Apple Safari HTTPS security bypass
CVE-2007-4671.body: Apple Safari for iPhone, Mac OS X, and Windows could allow a remote attacker to bypass same-domain security restrictions, caused by an unspecified vulnerability related to the handling of HTTPS content within an HTTP session. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute JavaScript code in the context of HTTPS Web pages in that domain.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPhone (1.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Safari:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.4 beta or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4672.title: Apple QuickTime PICT image file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4672.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper handling of malformed PICT image files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PICT file containing an invalid length specified for the "UncompressedQuickTimeData" opcode, a remote attacker could cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4673.title: Apple QuickTime QTL file code execution
CVE-2007-4673.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of URLS in the qtnext field in QTL files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QTL file, a remote attacker could cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4675.title: Apple QuickTime QTVR (QuickTime Virtual Reality) movie file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4675.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling malformed Panorama Sample atoms. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QTVR movie file containing a Panorama Sample atom, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4676.title: Apple QuickTime Poly type opcodes buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4676.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing the Poly type opcodes. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PICT file, a remote attacker could cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4676.title: Apple QuickTime PackBitsRgn opcodes buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4676.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing the PackBitsRgn opcodes. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PICT file, a remote attacker could cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4677.title: Apple QuickTime color table atom buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4677.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing the malformed color table atom. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QuickTime movie file containing an invalid color table atom, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4679.title: Apple Mac OS X CFFTP ftp client redirection
CVE-2007-4679.body: CFNetwork in Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to redirect clients to arbitrary FTP sites, caused by an implementation error in CFFTP. By sending a specially-crafted response to an FTP PASV command, a remote attacker in control of an FTP server could cause the victim to connect to another host. This could be used to launch further attacks against the victim's system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4680.title: Apple Mac OS X CFNetwork SSL man-in-the-middle
CVE-2007-4680.body: CFNetwork in Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to spoof trusted SSL certificates, caused by improper validation of certificates. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof SSL certificates and redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information that could be used to launch further attacks against the victim's system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Safari:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4681.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreFoundation directory hierarchy buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4681.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to an off-by-one buffer overflow in the CoreFoundation component, caused by improper bounds checking of directory hierarchies. By persuading a victim to read a specially-crafted directory hierarchy, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4682.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreText code execution
CVE-2007-4682.body: The CoreText component in Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper initialization of object pointers. By persuading a victim to view specially-crafted text, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4684.title: Apple Mac OS X kernel i386_set_ldt integer overflow
CVE-2007-4684.body: The Apple Mac OS X kernel is vulnerable to an integer overflow in the i386_set_ldt system call. By passing specially-crafted arguments to the i386_set_ldt system call, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4686.title: Apple Mac OS X kernel IOCTL integer overflow
CVE-2007-4686.body: The Apple Mac OS X kernel is vulnerable to an integer overflow when handling IOCTL requests. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the system to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4688.title: Apple Mac OS X Networking component Node Information Query information disclosure
CVE-2007-4688.body: The Networking component in Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an implementation error in the Node Information Query functionality. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain host addresses, which could be used to launch further attacks against the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4689.title: Apple Mac OS X Networking component IPV6 code execution
CVE-2007-4689.body: The Apple Mac OS X Networking component could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a double-free memory corruption vulnerability when handling IPV6 packets. By sending specially-crafted IPV6 packets to a vulnerable system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to crash. Note: Intel-based systems are not affected by this vulnerability.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4691.title: Apple Mac OS X NSURL component security bypass
CVE-2007-4691.body: The Apple Mac OS X NSURL component could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the local file system, caused by improper validation of URLs that reference local files. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access local files and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4692.title: Apple Safari tabbed browsing information disclosure
CVE-2007-4692.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an implementation error in the tabbed browsing feature. If HTTP authentication is used by a site that is loaded in a tab other than the active tab, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof HTTP authentication sheets and possibly obtain user credentials.For Windows Vista and Windows XP:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.4 beta or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4694.title: Apple Mac OS X WebCore component file:// URL unauthorized file access
CVE-2007-4694.body: The Apple Mac OS X WebCore component could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the local file system, caused by improper validation of file:// URLs by Safari. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view arbitrary local files.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4695.title: Apple Mac OS X WebCore component HTML form field manipulation
CVE-2007-4695.body: The Apple Mac OS X WebCore component could allow a remote attacker to modify HTML form field data, caused by an unspecified input validation vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a victim to upload a specially-crafted file.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4698.title: Apple Safari JavaScript frame cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4698.body: Apple Safari for Mac OS X and Windows XP and Vista is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of certain JavaScript events when they are associated with the wrong frame. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of another Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For Windows Vista and Windows XP:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.0.4 beta or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4700.title: Apple Mac OS X WebKit component Safari TCP port security bypass
CVE-2007-4700.body: The Apple Mac OS X WebKit component could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and use Safari as an indirect proxy. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to send malicious data to arbitrary TCP ports on remote systems.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.4.11 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4706.title: Apple QuickTime QTL file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4706.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of QTL files. By persuading a victim to open a malformed QTL file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or by hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4707.title: Apple QuickTime Flash media handler code execution
CVE-2007-4707.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the QuickTime Flash media handler. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Flash media file, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or by hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4709.title: Apple Mac OS X CFNetwork directory traversal
CVE-2007-4709.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by the improper handling of downloaded files by the CFNetwork component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory traversal techniques to automatically download files to arbitrary folders on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4710.title: Apple Mac OS X ColorSync profile code execution
CVE-2007-4710.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of images. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image with an embedded ColorSync profile, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious image as an email attachment or embedding the image within a document.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4711.title: Toms Gastebuch multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4711.body: Toms Gastebuch is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Toms Gästebuch (1.02 or later), available from the Toms Seiten Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4712.title: eNetman index.php file include
CVE-2007-4712.body: eNetman - The Enchanced Network Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of eNetman (v2 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2007-4713.title: Urchin urchin.cgi cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4713.body: Urchin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the urchin.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4714.title: Yvora CMS error_view.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4714.body: Yvora CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the error_view.php script using the ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4715.title: Weblogicnet files_dir parameter file include
CVE-2007-4715.body: Weblogicnet could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the es_desp.php, es_custom_menu.php or the es_offer.php script using the files_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4716.title: PHD Help Desk unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2007-4716.body: PHD Help Desk is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script using an unknown parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PHD Help Desk (1.31 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2007-4722.title: Move Media Player Quantum Streaming IE Player ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4722.body: The Move Media Player Quantum Streaming IE Player ActiveX control (qsp2ie07051001.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the Play() or Buzzer() methods, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of qsp2ie07051001.dll (7.7.4.39 or later), available from the Move Networks Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4726.title: WebOddity directory traversal
CVE-2007-4726.body: WebOddity could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a direct request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4727.title: lighttpd mod_fastcgi code execution
CVE-2007-4727.body: lighttpd could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a header overflow in the mod_fastcgi extension. By sending a specially-crafted request with an overly large contentLength value, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Lighttpd (1.4.18 or later), available from the Lighttpd Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4730.title: X.org X11 composite extension buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4730.body: X.org X11 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the composite extension. By copying data between specially-crafted pixmaps, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of X.org X11 (1.4 or later), available from the X.org X11 Web site. See References.Debian/GNU Linux:Refer to DSA-1372-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mandriva Linux (x11-server):Refer to MDKSA-2007:178 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (xorg):Refer to USN-514-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4731.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect TMregChange() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4731.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TMregChange() function in the TMReg.dll library. By sending specially-crafted data to TCP port 5005, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Patch 4 - Build 1185), available from the Trend Micro Web site. CVE-2007-4732.title: Sun Solaris strfreectty function denial of service
CVE-2007-4732.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Special File System's (SPECFS) strfreectty function. CVE-2007-4736.body: CKGold Shopping Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the category.php script using the manufacturer_id or category_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4737.body: SpeedTech PHP Library could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-4747.body: Cisco Video Surveillance IP Gateway video encoder and decoder, Services Platform (SP), and Integrated Services Platform (ISP) devices could allow a remote attacker on the adjacent network to gain elevated privileges, caused by improper authentication by the telnet server. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain administrative privileges on the device.Refer to cisco-sa-20070905-video for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4748.title: PPStream PowerPlayer.dll ActiveX buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4748.body: PPStream is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the PowerPlayer.dll library ActiveX control. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site with a malicious Logo value, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4750.title: RemoteDocs R-Viewer RDZ file code execution
CVE-2007-4750.body: RemoteDocs R-Viewer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a design error in the R-Viewer application. CVE-2007-4751.title: RemoteDocs R-Viewer temporary directories information disclosure
CVE-2007-4751.body: RemoteDocs R-Viewer could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Unencrypted copies of opened documents are stored in a predictable temporary directory and are not removed on a regular basis. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose encrypted data and obtain sensitive information.Refer to SYMSA-2007-009 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4752.title: OpenSSH X11 cookie privilege escalation
CVE-2007-4752.body: OpenSSH could allow a remote attacker on the adjacent network to gain elevated privileges. Trusted X11 cookies are created when untrusted cookies cannot be created, which could allow an attacker to bypass security restrictions and gain elevated privileges using an untrusted X client.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSH (4.7 or later), available from the OpenSSH Web site. See References.For rPath Linux:Refer to rPath Linux Issue RPL-1706 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4755.title: Alien Arena client_connect denial of service
CVE-2007-4755.body: Alien Arena is vulerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a query to the game server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the spoofed client_connect command to obtain a list of IP addresses for players and block all activity forcing the server to time out, resulting in a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4756.title: Total Commander FTP weak security
CVE-2007-4756.body: Total Commander could provide weaker than expected security. Paths are stripped from the listing window. CVE-2007-4757.body: phpMytourney could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-4760.body: Multiple Hitachi products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the javadoc command of the Cosminexus Developer's Kit for Java component. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability when creating HTML files to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HS07-027 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4762.title: Pre Projects E-SMART CART login SQL injection
CVE-2007-4762.body: Pre Projects E-SMART CART is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-4763.body: PHP Object Framework (PHPOF) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-4764.body: Pawfaliki could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2007-4766.title: PCRE escape sequence processing integer overflow
CVE-2007-4766.body: The PCRE (Perl Compatible Regular Expressions) library is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows that can occur when processing escape sequences. By passing specially-crafted data to an application linked to the vulnerable library, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application.Upgrade to the latest version of PCRE (7.4 or later), available from the PCRE Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4769.title: PostgreSQL out-of-range backref numbers denial of service
CVE-2007-4769.body: PostgreSQL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing regular expressions. CVE-2007-4771.title: libicu doInterval buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4771.body: libicu (International Components for Unicode library) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the doInterval function.
