CVE-2007-4873.title: SimpNews dbtables.inc information disclosure
CVE-2007-4873.body: SimpNews could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted request to the dbtables.inc file or any INC file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of SimpNews (2.42.01 or later), available from the SimpNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4874.title: SimpNews comment.php layout2b.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4874.body: SimpNews is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the comment.php or layout2b.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the backurl or l_username parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SimpNews (2.42.01 or later), available from the SimpNews Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4880.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) Client Acceptor daemon buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4880.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Client Acceptor Daemon. If the Client Acceptor Daemon (CAD) is used with either the Web GUI or with CAD-managed scheduling, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the client to crash.Refer to IBM Flash Alert 1268775 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4881.title: Psi Social Networking Script myprofile.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4881.body: Psi Social Networking Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the profile/myprofile.php script using the u parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4890.title: Microsoft Visual Studio VB To VSI Support Library ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4890.body: The Microsoft Visual Studio VB To VSI Support Library ActiveX control (VBTOVSI.DLL) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Load() and SaveAs() functions to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4891.title: Microsoft Visual Studio PDWizard ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2007-4891.body: The Microsoft Visual Studio PDWizard ActiveX control (PDWizard.ocx) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability related to insecure usage of the StartProcess(), SyncShell(), SaveAs(), CABDefaultURL(), CABFileName(), CABRunFile() methods. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page or open a specially-crafted HTML file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the application using the vulnerable ActiveX control.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4892.title: Plesk PLESKSESSID SQL injection
CVE-2007-4892.body: Plesk is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php3 or auth.php3 script using the PLESKSESSID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to swsoft Article ID: 2159 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4893.title: WordPress and WordPress multi-user (MU) unfiltered_html feature cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4893.body: WordPress and WordPress multi-user (MU) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the unfiltered_html privilege feature. By sending a specially-crafted POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the no_filter field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For WordPress:Upgrade to the latest version of Wordpress (2.2.3 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.For WordPress multi-user (MU):Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress multi-user (MU) (1.2.6a or later), available from the WordPress multi-user (MU) Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4894.title: WordPress and WordPress multi-user (MU) pingback.extensions.getPingbacks() SQL injection
CVE-2007-4894.body: WordPress and WordPress multi-user (MU) are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the pingback.extensions.getPingbacks() method using the post_type parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.For WordPress:Upgrade to the latest version of Wordpress (2.2.3 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.For WordPress multi-user (MU):Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress multi-user (MU) (1.2.6a or later), available from the WordPress multi-user (MU) Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4895.title: Sisfo Kampus dwoprn.php script directory traversal
CVE-2007-4895.body: Sisfo Kampus could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the dwoprn.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the f parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4897.title: Ekiga SIPURL::GetHostAddress() denial of service
CVE-2007-4897.body: Ekiga is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the SIPURL::GetHostAddress() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to allocate a large amount of memory, resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Ekiga (2.0.7 or 2.0.9 or later), available from the Ekiga Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4899.title: BOINC forum_forum.php and forum_text_search_action.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4899.body: BOINC is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forum_forum.php and forum_text_search_action.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id or search_string parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4900.title: RSA enVision username cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4900.body: RSA enVision is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the logon page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4902.title: Ultra Crypto Component CryptoX.dll ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4902.body: The Ultra Crypto Component ActiveX control (CryptoX.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveToFile() function to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4903.title: Ultra Crypto Component CryptoX.dll ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4903.body: The Ultra Crypto Component ActiveX control (CryptoX.dll) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the AcquireContext() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4904.title: Multiple vendor media player AU file processing denial of service
CVE-2007-4904.body: RealNetworks RealPlayer and HelixPlayer are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error when processing specially-crafted AU files. By persuading a victim to open a malformed AU file, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash. Note: Avnex AV MP3 Player and Media Player Classic are also affected by this vulnerability.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4906.title: NuclearBB send_queued_emails.php file include
CVE-2007-4906.body: NuclearBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the send_queued_emails.php script using the root_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4907.title: X-Cart xcart_dir parameter file include
CVE-2007-4907.body: X-Cart could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the xcart_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of X-Cart (3.5 or later), available from the X-Cart Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4908.title: AuraCMS index.php file include
CVE-2007-4908.body: AuraCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the pilih parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4909.title: WinSCP scp and sftp command execution
CVE-2007-4909.body: WinSCP could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing scp or sftp commands in an iframe, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary files to the system or download arbitrary files from the system.Upgrade to the latest version of WinSCP (4.04 or later), available from the WinSCP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4911.title: jetCast Server JSMP3OGGWt.dll denial of service
CVE-2007-4911.body: jetCast Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the JSMP3OGGWt.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request to TCP port 8000, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4912.title: Invision Power Board (IP.Board) user profile cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4912.body: Invision Power Board (IP.Board) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the user profile. If character sets other than iso-8859-1 or utf-8 are enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Invision Power Board (2.3.1 after 9/12/2007 or later), available from the Invision Power Board Web site. See References.--OR--Refer to Invision Power Web site: Company News and Updates for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4914.title: Invision Power Board (IP.Board) subscription manager unauthorized access
CVE-2007-4914.body: Invision Power Board (IP.Board) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. If the subscription manager is enabled, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted payment request with a malicious member ID to demote arbitrary members to the subscriber group.Upgrade to the latest version of Invision Power Board (2.3.1 after 9/12/2007 or later), available from the Invision Power Board Web site. See References.--OR--Refer to Invision Power Web site: Company News and Updates for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4916.title: Microsoft Windows MFC ActiveX FindFile() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4916.body: The Microsoft Foundation Class (MFC) library and multiple applications using the affected libraries are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the FindFile method in MFC42.dll, MFC42u.dll, MFC71.dll, and MFC71u.dll. By sending an overly long first argument to any external application that uses the vulnerable library, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to crash. Note: This vulnerability affects the HP All-in-One Series Web Release and HP Photo & Imaging Gallery hpqutil!ListFiles ActiveX control (hpqutil.dll), which uses the vulnerable MFC library.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4917.title: Php-Stats tracking.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4917.body: Php-Stats is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the tracking.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ip parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4918.title: Gelato index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4918.body: Gelato is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the post parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Gelato (1.0 or later), available from the Gelato Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4919.title: JBlog index.php and modifpost.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4919.body: JBlog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php and modifpost.php scripts using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4920.title: PHP Webquest soporte_derecha_w.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4920.body: PHP Webquest is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the soporte_derecha_w.php script using the id_actividad parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4921.title: Ajax File Browser settings.inc.php file include
CVE-2007-4921.body: Ajax File Browser could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the settings.inc.php script using the approot parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4923.title: joomlaradio component for Joomla! admin.joomlaradiov5.php file include
CVE-2007-4923.body: The joomlaradio component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.joomlaradiov5.php script using the mosConfig_live_site parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4932.title: Shop-Script FREE admin.php authentication bypass
CVE-2007-4932.body: Shop-Script FREE could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain access to the admin panel.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ssfree20-en-access-admin-patch.zip), available from the Shop-Script Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4937.title: CS GuestBook /base/usr/0.php information disclosure
CVE-2007-4937.body: CS GuestBook could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Usernames and passwords are stored on the Web root by default. By sending a request to the /base/usr/0.php script, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain usernames and password hashes.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4938.title: MPlayer AVI file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4938.body: MPlayer is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted AVI file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.For Mandriva Linux:Refer to MDKSA-2007:192 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-4939.title: Media Player Classic AVI file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4939.body: Media Player Classic is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted AVI file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim. Note: This vulnerability also affects StormPlayer, CD-Storm (MYMPC) and other products based on Media Player Classic.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4941.title: KMPlayer AVI file denial of service
CVE-2007-4941.body: KMPlayer is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted AVI file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available resources, resulting in a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4945.title: LetterGrade year cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4945.body: LetterGrade is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the cal_month.php3 script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4945.title: LetterGrade email cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4945.body: LetterGrade is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a student email address to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4950.title: PHPortal employee.php file include
CVE-2007-4950.body: PHPortal could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the employee.php script using the DOCUMENT_ROOT parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4953.title: SimpCMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4953.body: SimpCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the keyword parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4955.title: FlashFun component for Joomla! mosConfig_live_site file include
CVE-2007-4955.body: The FlashFun component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.joomlaflashfun.php script using the mosConfig_live_site parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4956.title: KwsPHP login.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4956.body: KwsPHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the pseudo parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of KwsPHP (1.0.85 or later), available from the KwsPHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4956.title: Member_Space module for KwsPHP index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4956.body: The Member_Space module for KwsPHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the mod parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of KwsPHP (1.0.85 or later), available from the KwsPHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4956.title: stats module for KwsPHP index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4956.body: The stats module for KwsPHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the typenav parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of KwsPHP (1.0.85 or later), available from the KwsPHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4957.title: Chupix CMS download.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-4957.body: Chupix CMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the download.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the fichier parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4958.title: TinyWebGallery multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4958.body: TinyWebGallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php, i_login.php or i_top_tags.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4960.title: Second Life secondlife URI handler information disclosure
CVE-2007-4960.body: Second Life could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a design error that registers the "secondlife://" URI handler and allows the installation process to be invoked by command line arguments. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the -autologin and -loginuri parameters in an iframe to obtain the victim's username, password hash and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4962.title: WinImage IMG or ISO files directory traversal
CVE-2007-4962.body: WinImage could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by improper validation of extracted IMG or ISO files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted IMG or ISO file containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the filename, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to traverse directories and extract files to arbitrary locations on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4965.title: Python imageop buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4965.body: Python is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the imageop module. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, if the imageop module is enabled.For Gentoo Linux (Python):Refer to GLSA 200711-07 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4966.title: GForge editprofile.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4966.body: GForge is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the editprofile.php script using the skill_delete[] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4975.title: b1gMail hilfe.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4975.body: b1gMail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the hilfe.php script. CVE-2007-4976.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery viewlog.php file include
CVE-2007-4976.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. An authenticated remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the viewlog.php script using the log parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Coppermine Photo Gallery (1.4.13 or later), available from the Coppermine Photo Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4977.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery mode.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4977.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mode.php script. An authenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the referer parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Coppermine Photo Gallery (1.4.13 or later), available from the Coppermine Photo Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4978.title: PHP SyncML base_dir parameter file include
CVE-2007-4978.body: PHP SyncML could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Encoder.php or Decoder.php script using the base_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4980.title: GCALDaemon HTTPListener denial of service
CVE-2007-4980.body: GCALDaemon is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by an error in the HTTPListener.java file. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request with a modified Content-Length value causing the HTTP daemon to be blocked.Upgrade to the latest version of GCALDaemon (1.0-beta14 or later), available from the GCALDaemon Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4981.title: Obedit save function cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-4981.body: Obedit is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the save function in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Obedit (3.04b or later), available from the Obedit Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4982.title: MW6 Technologies QRCode ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-4982.body: The MW6 Technologies QRCode ActiveX control (MW6QRCode.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveAsBMP() and SaveAsWMF() methods to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4984.title: Styles Demo for phpBB index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-4984.body: Styles Demo for phpBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the s parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-4985.title: ImageMagick ReadDCMImage and ReadXCFImage function denial of service
CVE-2007-4985.body: ImageMagick is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by errors in the ReadDCMImage and ReadXCFImage functions. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause the application to enter an infinite loop, resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of ImageMagick (6.3.5-9 or later), available from the ImageMagick Web site. See References.For GraphicsMagick:Upgrade to the latest version of GraphicsMagick (1.1.11 or later), available from the GraphicsMagick Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (imagemagick):Refer to USN-523-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4986.title: ImageMagick multiple functions buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4986.body: ImageMagick is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflow errors in the AllocateImageColormap(), ReadDCMImage(), ReadDIBImage(), and ReadXBMImage() functions. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted DCM, DIB, XBM, XCF, or XWD image file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user.Upgrade to the latest version of ImageMagick (6.3.5-9 or later), available from the ImageMagick Web site. See References.For GraphicsMagick:Upgrade to the latest version of GraphicsMagick (1.1.11 or later), available from the GraphicsMagick Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (imagemagick):Refer to USN-523-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4987.title: ImageMagick ReadBlobString() function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4987.body: ImageMagick is vulnerable to an off-by-one buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ReadBlobString() function in magick/blob.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user.Upgrade to the latest version of ImageMagick (6.3.5-9 or later), available from the ImageMagick Web site. See References.For GraphicsMagick:Upgrade to the latest version of GraphicsMagick (1.1.11 or later), available from the GraphicsMagick Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (imagemagick):Refer to USN-523-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4988.title: ImageMagick ReadDIBImage function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4988.body: ImageMagick is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ReadDIBImage function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of ImageMagick (6.3.5-9 or later), available from the ImageMagick Web site. See References.For GraphicsMagick:Upgrade to the latest version of GraphicsMagick (1.1.11 or later), available from the GraphicsMagick Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux (imagemagick):Refer to USN-523-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-4990.title: X.Org XFS QueryXBitmaps and QueryXExtents buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4990.body: X.Org XFS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the handlers for the QueryXBitmaps and QueryXExtents protocol requests. By sending specially-crafted requests to the swap_char2b() function, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the server. Note: On Solaris systems, remote exploitation is possible via specially-crafted requests to TCP port 7100.Upgrade to the latest version of X.Org XFS (1.0.5 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information.

CVE-2007-4991.title: Microsoft Internet Security and Acceleration (ISA) Server SOCKS4 information disclosure
CVE-2007-4991.body: Microsoft Internet Security and Acceleration (ISA) Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted empty packet to the SOCKS4 socket, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the IP address of the server's last proxy request.Upgrade to the latest version of Microsoft ISA Server (2004SE SP3 or later), available from the Microsoft Corporation Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4992.title: Firebird SQL process_packet() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-4992.body: Firebird SQL is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the process_packet() function. By sending an overly long request to TCP port 3050, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Firebird SQL (2.0.3 or later), available from the Firebird SQL Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-4997.title: Linux kernel ieee80211_rx() denial of service
CVE-2007-4997.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer overflow error in the ieee80211_rx() function. By sending a specially-crafted IEEE 802.11 frame containing an SKB length, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux kernel (2.6.23 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-4999.title: Pidgin HTML data denial of service
CVE-2007-4999.body: Pidgin is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when parsing HTML data. By sending a specially-crafted message containing invalid HTML data, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Pidgin (2.2.2 or later), available from the Pidgin Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5000.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_imap and mod_imagemap module cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5000.body: The mod_imap and mod_imagemap module in the Apache HTTP server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. Note: This vulnerability also affects Hitachi Web Server, uCosminexus Application Server, uCosminexus Developer, uCosminexus Service Platform, Cosminexus Application Server, Cosminexus Server and Cosminexus Developer.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache (1.3.40-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For Mac OS X 10.4.11, Mac OS X 10.5.2, Mac OS X Server 10.5.2:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Mac OS X Server 10.4.11:Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5009.title: phpBB Plus lang_main_album.php file include
CVE-2007-5009.body: phpBB Plus could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the language/lang_german/lang_main_album.php script using the phpbb_root_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Refer to the phpBB Plus Support Forum posting dated Sat 22 Sep, 2007 21:24 for workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5010.title: WebBatch client cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5010.body: WebBatch is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the webbatch.exe Web client. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5012.title: PhpWebGallery picture.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5012.body: PhpWebGallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the picture.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the author parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.PhpWebGallery customers should contact PhpWebGallery support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-5015.title: Streamline PHP Media Server account_footer.php file include
CVE-2007-5015.body: Streamline PHP Media Server could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the account_footer.php script using the sl_theme_unix_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5016.title: OneCMS userreviews.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5016.body: OneCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the userreviews.php script using the abc parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of OneCMS (2.5 or later), available from the OneCMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5017.title: Yahoo! Messenger CYFT Object (ft60.dll) code execution
CVE-2007-5017.body: The CYFT object (ft60.dll) in Yahoo! Messenger could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of the second argument to the GetFile method. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted Web page, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files to the system and possibly execute arbitrary code with the victim's privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5019.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment isInstalled.dnsResolve buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5019.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the isInstalled.dnsResolve function. By sending an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5020.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader mailto: PDF code execution
CVE-2007-5020.body: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader, when installed on Windows XP systems running Internet Explorer 7 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified vulnerability related to the mailto: option. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF document, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.Refer to APSB07-18 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5022.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) server-initiated unauthorized access
CVE-2007-5022.body: An unspecified vulnerability in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. If the Server-initiated prompted scheduling is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the client's data.Refer to IBM Flash Alert 1268775 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5026.title: DBlog CMS dblog.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2007-5026.body: DBlog CMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the dblog.mdb file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download the database file and obtain sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5027.title: Level One WBR3404TX Broadband Router Web Management cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5027.body: The Level One WBR3404TX Broadband Router is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web Management interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the DD or DU parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5029.title: Dibbler invalid option denial of service
CVE-2007-5029.body: Dibbler is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by errors in multiple functions. By sending a specially-crafted request with an invalid option, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Dibbler (0.6.1 or later), available from the Dibbler Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5030.title: Dibbler option length denial of service
CVE-2007-5030.body: Dibbler is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by multiple integer overflows in multiple functions. By sending a specially-crafted request with an overly long option length, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Dibbler (0.6.1 or later), available from the Dibbler Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5031.title: Dibbler rebind denial of service
CVE-2007-5031.body: Dibbler is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the TSrvOptIA_NA::rebind function. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Dibbler (0.6.1 or later), available from the Dibbler Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5033.title: phpBB XS profile.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5033.body: phpBB XS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the profile.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the selfdes parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5038.title: Bugzilla offer_account_by_email() security bypass
CVE-2007-5038.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the offer_account_by_email() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an improperly checked createemailregexp parameter to bypass security restrictions and create user accounts.Refer to the Bugzilla Web site for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5048.title: Lhaplus ARJ archive buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5048.body: Lhaplus is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the ARJ archives. By sending a specially-crafted ARJ archive containing an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Lhaplus (1.55 or later), available from the Lhaplus Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-5054.title: iziContents gsLanguage parameter file include
CVE-2007-5054.body: iziContents could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If language_home is set to an empty string and rootdp is set to an arbitrary value, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the search.php, inlinepoll.php, showpoll.php, showlinks.php or the submit_links.php script using the gsLanguage parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5055.title: iziContents admin_home and rootdp parameters file include
CVE-2007-5055.body: iziContents could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If rootdp is set to an arbitrary value, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the poll_summary.php script using the admin_home parameter or the db.php script using the rootdp parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5056.title: SAPID CMF adodb-perf-module.inc.php last_module code execution
CVE-2007-5056.body: SAPID CMF could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the adodb-perf-module.inc.php script before being used in an eval() function call. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the last_module parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5056.title: Open-Realty adodb-perf-module.inc.php last_module code execution
CVE-2007-5056.body: Open-Realty could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the adodb-perf-module.inc.php script before being used in an eval() function call. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the last_module parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5056.title: PacerCMS adodb-perf-module.inc.php last_module code execution
CVE-2007-5056.body: PacerCMS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the adodb-perf-module.inc.php script before being used in an eval() function call. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the last_module parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5056.title: CMS Made Simple adodb-perf-module.inc.php code execution
CVE-2007-5056.body: CMS Made Simple could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of the adodb-perf-module.inc.php script before being used in an eval() function call. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted parameter value in the last_module parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of CMS Made Simple (1.1.4.1 or later), available from the CMS Made Simple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5057.title: NetSupport Manager security bypass
CVE-2007-5057.body: NetSupport Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an unspecified vulnerability related to improper handling of authentication sessions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Refer to NetSupport Technical Document: TD543 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5058.title: Barracuda Spam Firewall Web Administration Console cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5058.body: Barracuda Spam Firewall is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web Administration Console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username field to inject malicious script into the Monitor Web Syslog Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Barracuda Spam Firewall (3.5.10.016 or later), available from the Barracuda Spam Firewall Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5059.title: GreenSQL admin panel cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5059.body: GreenSQL is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin panel. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a login form or an URL value to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of GreenSQL (0.2.3 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5060.title: Xcms admin/cpass.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5060.body: Xcms is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery in the admin/cpass.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request to the index.php script to change arbitrary passwords and possibly perform other attacks against the affected system, including cross-site scripting, Web cache poisoning, and PHP code execution.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5061.title: ClanSphere index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5061.body: ClanSphere is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of ClanSphere (2007.4.1 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5065.title: Flash Slide Show component for Joomla! admin.slideshow1.php file include
CVE-2007-5065.body: The Flash Slide Show component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.slideshow1.php script using the mosConfig_live_site parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5066.title: Webmin unspecified URL command execution
CVE-2007-5066.body: Webmin could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error that occurs in the URL validation process. By sending a specially-crafted URL request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Webmin (1.370 or later), available from the Webmin Web site: Security Alerts. See References.

CVE-2007-5068.title: phpFullAnnu login SQL injection
CVE-2007-5068.body: phpFullAnnu is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the login parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5069.title: Nuke Mobile Entertainment module for PHP-Nuke compatible.php file include
CVE-2007-5069.body: Nuke Mobile Entertainment module for PHP-Nuke could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the compatible.php script using the module_name parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5072.title: Simple PHP Blog user_style.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5072.body: Simple PHP Blog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the user_style.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user_colors[bg_color] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Simple PHP Blog (0.5.1 or later), available from the Simple PHP Blog Project Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-5080.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer MP3 Lyrics3 tag buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5080.body: RealNetworks RealPlayer and RealOne Player are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of Lyrics3 tags in MP3 files. By persuading a victim to open a malformed MP3 file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the RealNetworks Customer Support - Real Security Updates Web page for upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5081.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer RM file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5081.body: RealNetworks RealPlayer and RealOne Player are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of RM files. By persuading a victim to open a malformed RM file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the RealNetworks Customer Support - Real Security Updates Web page for upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5082.title: CA BrightStor Hierarchical Storage Manager CsAgent service buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5082.body: Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor Hierarchical Storage Manager is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the CsAgent service. By sending a specially-crafted CsAgent command, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of BrightStor Hierarchical Storage Manager (r11.6 or later), available from the CA SupportConnect Web site. CVE-2007-5084.title: CA BrightStor Hierarchical Storage Manager CsAgent service SQL injection
CVE-2007-5084.body: Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor Hierarchical Storage Manager is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to unspecified scripts using multiple CsAgent service commands, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of BrightStor Hierarchical Storage Manager (r11.6 or later), available from the CA SupportConnect Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5090.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest unspecified data manipulation
CVE-2007-5090.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest has an unspecified vulnerability which could allow a local attacker to manipulate data. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1268116 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For IBM products:Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2007-5092.title: Dance Music module for PHP-Nuke modules.php file include
CVE-2007-5092.body: Dance Music module for PHP-Nuke could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the modules.php script using the ACCEPT_FILE parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5094.title: Ipswitch IMail Server buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5094.body: Ipswitch IMail Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the iaspam.dll library. By sending a specially-crafted SMTP message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5098.title: DFD Cart set_depth parameter file include
CVE-2007-5098.body: DFD Cart could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the product.control.config.php, customer.browse.list.php or customer.browse.search.php script using the set_depth parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of DFD Cart (1.1.5 or later), available from Sourceforge.net. CVE-2007-5102.title: Wordsmith config.inc.php file include
CVE-2007-5102.body: Wordsmith could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the config.inc.php script using the _path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. CVE-2007-5104.body: bcoos is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5105.title: WordPress user_email parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5105.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wp-register.php script. If user registration is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user_email parameter in a specially-crafted POST request to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5105.title: WordPress wp-register.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5105.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wp-register.php script. If user registration is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user_login and user_email parameters in a specially-crafted POST request to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5106.title: WordPress wp-register.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5106.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wp-register.php script. If user registration is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user_login and user_email parameters in a specially-crafted POST request to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5107.title: Ask.com Toolbar AskJeevesToolBar.SettingsPlugin.1 ActiveX buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5107.body: Ask.com Toolbar is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the AskJeevesToolBar.SettingsPlugin.1 ActiveX control. By sending a specially-crafted request with an overly long ShortFormat value, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5109.title: FlatNuke index.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5109.body: FlatNuke could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a cross-site request forgery vulnerability in the index.php script. By sending a specially-crafted request to the index.php script using a modified regpass or level parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify the privileges for arbitrary accounts.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5110.title: ebCrypt EbCrypt.eb_c_PRNGenerator.1 ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-5110.body: The ebCrypt EbCrypt.eb_c_PRNGenerator.1 ActiveX control (ebCrypt.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveToFile() function to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5115.title: Mods 4 Xoops Contenido eZ publish multiple file include
CVE-2007-5115.body: Mods 4 Xoops Contenido eZ publish could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using various parameters to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5116.title: Perl Unicode regular expressions buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5116.body: The Perl regular expression engine is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper handling of Unicode encoded data. By passing specially-crafted Unicode data to a regular expression using unspecified attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the Perl application.Upgrade to the latest Development Release of Perl (5.9.5 or later), available from the Perl Web site. See References.Refer to VMSA-2008-0001 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information, available from the VMware Security-announce Mailing List, Mon Jan 7 17:46:23 PST 2008. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5117.title: FrontAccounting path_to_root file include
CVE-2007-5117.body: FrontAccounting could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the login.php or language.php script using the path_to_root parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of FrontAccounting (1.14 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5119.title: JSPWiki version information disclosure
CVE-2007-5119.body: JSPWiki could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to an uploaded attachment file using an invalid version parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of JSPWiki (2.4.104, 2.5.139-b, or later), available from the JSPWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5120.title: JSPWiki multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5120.body: JSPWiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the NewGroup.jsp, Edit.jsp, Comment.jsp, UserPreferences.jsp, Diff.jsp, and PageInfo.jsp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of JSPWiki (2.4.104, 2.5.139-b, or later), available from the JSPWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5121.title: JSPWiki Login.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5121.body: JSPWiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Login.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the redirect parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of JSPWiki (2.5.139-b or later), available from the JSPWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5122.title: Classifieds PLUS Script store_info.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5122.body: Classifieds PLUS Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the store_info.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5123.title: Novus notas.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5123.body: Novus is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the notas.asp script using the nota_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5127.title: SimpGB index.php and emoticonlist.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5127.body: SimpGB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script using the l_username parameter or the emoticonlist.php script using the i_emoticonlist parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SimpGB (1.47 or later), available from the SimpGB Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5129.title: SimpGB cfginfo.php information disclosure
CVE-2007-5129.body: SimpGB could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a vulnerability in the cfginfo.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain database tables and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of SimpGB (1.47 or later), available from the SimpGB Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5129.title: SimpGB .htaccess files information disclosure
CVE-2007-5129.body: SimpGB could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The dbtables.inc script sets improper permissions for .htaccess files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the files and obtain a user's database password and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of SimpGB (1.47 or later), available from the SimpGB Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5131.title: ActiveKB index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5131.body: ActiveKB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5134.title: Cisco Catalyst 6500 and Cisco 7600 loopback address ACL bypass
CVE-2007-5134.body: A design error in Cisco Catalyst 6500 and Cisco 7600 could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to bypass access control lists. The Supervisor module, Multilayer Switch Feature Card (MSFC), and other intelligent modules receive and process unfiltered packets from loopback addresses. If the system is running Hybrid Mode and Native Mode, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass access control lists.Refer to cisco-sr-20070926-lb for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5135.title: OpenSSL SSL_get_shared_ciphers() off-by-one buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5135.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to an off-by-one buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SSL_get_shared_ciphers() function. By sending multiple cipher strings to the last character of the current cipher string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (0.98f or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. See References.For IBM HMC 6 Release 1.3:Apply the Security fix for HMC Version 6 Release 1.3, available from the IBM Subscription service. See References.For IBM HMC 7 Release 3.2.0:Apply the Security fix for HMC Version 7 Release 3.2.0, available from the IBM Subscription service. See References.Refer to VMSA-2008-0001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information, available from the Security-announce Mailing List, Mon Jan 7 17:46:23 PST 2008. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5138.title: lustig.cms forum.php file include
CVE-2007-5138.body: lustig.cms could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the forum.php script using the view parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5139.title: Chupix CMS header.php file include
CVE-2007-5139.body: Chupix CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the header.php script using the repertoire parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5140.title: IntegraMOD for phpBB archive_topic.php file include
CVE-2007-5140.body: IntegraMOD for phpBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the archive_topic.php script using the phpbb_root_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5141.title: SiteX search.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5141.body: SiteX is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php script using the search parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5149.title: Public Media Manager newstopic_inc.php file include
CVE-2007-5149.body: Public Media Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the newstopic_inc.php script using the indir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5152.title: Sun Java System Access Manager container-based security bypass
CVE-2007-5152.body: Sun Java System Access Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when using container-based authentication. If Sun Java System Access Manager is installed in a version 9.1 container and the container is restarted, the system will not require authenticated after the restart. This could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to administrative applications.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103069 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5153.title: Sun Java System Access Manager container code execution
CVE-2007-5153.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Sun Java System Access Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. If Sun Java System Access Manager is installed in a version 8.x container, a remote or local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the application.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103069 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5155.title: ICEOWS IceGUI.DLL buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5155.body: ICEOWS is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the IceGUI.DLL extension. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ACE archive containing an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5157.title: phpFidoNode phfito-post.php file include
CVE-2007-5157.body: phpFidoNode could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the phfito-post.php script using the SRC_PATH parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5161.title: FeedReader3 RSS feed cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5161.body: FeedReader3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when processing RSS feeds. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into an RSS feed which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of FeedReader3 (3.11 or later), available from the FeedReader3 Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5170.title: Sun Fire Server Embedded Lights Out Manager (ELOM) unauthorized access
CVE-2007-5170.body: Sun Fire Server could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the network, caused by a vulnerability in the Embedded Lights Out Manager (ELOM) software. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to initiate network traffic and send unsolicited emails from the server.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102942 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5171.title: Quicksilver Forums unspecified data manipulation
CVE-2007-5171.body: Quicksilver Forums could allow a remote attacker to manipulate data, caused by an unspecified vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete another user's PM messages.Upgrade to the latest version of Quicksilver Forums (1.4.1 or later), available from the Quicksilver Forums Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5172.title: Quicksilver Forums reporting library information disclosure
CVE-2007-5172.body: Quicksilver Forums could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the error reporting library displaying database password information when a connection error is revealed. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the database password and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Quicksilver Forums (1.4.1 or later), available from the Quicksilver Forums Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5173.title: OpenID Auth for phpBB BBStore.php file include
CVE-2007-5173.body: OpenID Auth for phpBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files.
