CVE-2007-5174.body: actSite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the news.php script using the do parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of actSite (1.57 or later), available from the actSite Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5176.title: GroupLink eHelpDesk index2.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5176.body: GroupLink eHelpDesk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index2.jsp script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5176.title: GroupLink eHelpDesk rf_create.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5176.body: GroupLink eHelpDesk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the rf_create.jsp script. CVE-2007-5180.body: Ohesa Emlak Portali is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5181.body: Netkamp Emlak Scripti is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5182.title: Netkamp Emlak Scripti mail.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5182.body: Netkamp Emlak Scripti is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mail.asp script. CVE-2007-5183.title: OdysseySuite Internet Banking mailbox.mws cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5183.body: OdysseySuite Internet Banking is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Mailbox.mws. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5185.body: phpwcms-xt could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the config_HTML_MENU.php and the config_PHPLM.php scripts using the HTML_MENU_DirPath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5186.body: Segue CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-5187.body: The PHP-Fusion Expanded Calendar module is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5189.body: X-script GuestBook is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5197.title: Mono Mono.Math.BigInteger integer overflow
CVE-2007-5197.body: Mono is vulnerable to a buffer overflow caused by an integer overflow in the Mono.Math.BigInteger class. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute arbitrary code on the system.For Gentoo Linux (Mono):Refer to GLSA 200711-10 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5209.title: CenterTools DriveLock DriveLock.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5209.body: CenterTools DriveLock is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DriveLock.exe service. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request containing overly long characters, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.For DriveLock 4.x and 5.0:Upgrade to the latest version of DriveLock (5.0.0.314 or 4.1.1.277 or later), available from the CenterTools Web site. See References.For DriveLock SRC Server:Upgrade to the latest version of DriveLock SRC Server (5.0.0.47 or later), available from the CenterTools Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5210.title: Peakflow SP access controls security bypass
CVE-2007-5210.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Peakflow SP related to access controls could allow an authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions.For Peakflow SP 3.5.1:Apply patch 14 for this vulnerability, available from the Arbor Networks Web site. See References.For Peakflow SP 3.6.1:Apply patch 5 for this vulnerability, available from the Arbor Networks Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5214.title: Axis 2100 IP camera video viewing page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5214.body: The Axis 2100 IP camera is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input to the video viewing page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the conf_Layout_OwnTitle parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the video stream is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of August 30, 2008.

CVE-2007-5214.title: Axis 2100 IP camera network settings page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5214.body: The Axis 2100 IP camera is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the network settings page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the network parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of August 30, 2008.

CVE-2007-5217.title: Altnet Download Manager ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5217.body: The Altnet Download Manager ActiveX control (adm4.dll), which is used in the file-sharing applications Kazaa and Grokster, is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the Install() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5218.title: DRBGuestbook jump.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5218.body: DRBGuestbook is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the jump.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the action parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of DRBGuestbook (1.1.14 or later), available from the DRBGuestbook Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5219.title: CyberLink PowerDVD CLAVSetting.CLSetting.1 ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-5219.body: The CyberLink PowerDVD CLAVSetting.CLSetting.1 ActiveX control (CLAVSetting.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system, caused by insecure use of the CreateNewFile() method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory traversal techniques to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5221.title: Poppawid childwindow.inc.php file include
CVE-2007-5221.body: Poppawid could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If the system is running on PHP 4.x, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the childwindow.inc.php script using the form parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5222.title: MDPro referer header SQL injection
CVE-2007-5222.body: MDPro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script when processing the referer HTTP header, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of MDPro (1.0.82 or later), available from the MAXdev Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5224.title: Original Photo Gallery exif.inc.php command execution
CVE-2007-5224.body: Original Photo Gallery could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the exif.inc.php script. If PHP is configured with the "globals on" option, a remote attacker could send a direct request using the exif_prog parameter containing shell metacharacters to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with the privileges of the Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Original Photo Gallery (0.11.3 or later), available from the Original Photo Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5228.title: Project issue tracking module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5228.body: Project issue tracking module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker with create or edit projects permission could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the individual or overview subscription forms are viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-021 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5229.title: FeedBurner FeedSmith Feedburner plugin cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5229.body: FeedBurner FeedSmith is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Feedburner plugin. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to cause the victim to modify settings, hijack blog feeds and perform other arbitrary tasks, once the victim views the malicious request. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of FeedBurner FeedSmith (2.3 or later), available from the FeedBurner Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5231.title: Zomplog upload_files.php file upload
CVE-2007-5231.body: Zomplog could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the upload_files.php script. CVE-2007-5233.body: Web Template Management System is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5234.title: Ossigeno CMS footer.php file include
CVE-2007-5234.body: Ossigeno CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-5236.title: Sun Java Web Start cache information disclosure
CVE-2007-5236.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities related to improper restrictions on untrusted applications in Sun Java Web Start could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information By persuading a victim to execute an untrusted application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the location of the Java Web Start cache.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103073 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5237.title: Sun Java Web Start cache information disclosure
CVE-2007-5237.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities related to improper restrictions on untrusted applications in Sun Java Web Start could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information By persuading a victim to execute an untrusted application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the location of the Java Web Start cache.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103073 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-5244.title: Borland InterBase multiple functions buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5244.body: Borland InterBase is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by multiple functions. By sending a specially-crafted request using various parameters, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. CVE-2007-5245.title: Firebird INET_connect() and SVC_attach() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5245.body: Firebird is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the INET_connect() and SVC_attach() functions. CVE-2007-5249.title: America`s Army and America`s Army Special Forces logging function denial of service
CVE-2007-5249.body: America's Army and America's Army Special Forces are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking by the logging function of the Unreal Engine. If Punkbuster is enabled, a remote attacker could send PB_Y packets to the YPG server on UDP port 1716 or PB_U packets to the UCON server on UDP port 1716 to cause the servers to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5251.body: Helm is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the domain.asp script using the showOption parameter and the FileManager.asp script using the Folder or StartPath parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5253.title: Cart32 c32web.exe information disclosure
CVE-2007-5253.body: Cart32 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the c32web.exe file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted URL containing a NULL character to the ImageName parameter, which could allow the attacker to traverse directories and download or view any file on the same physical drive as the Cart32 installation.Upgrade to the latest version of Cart32 (6.4 or later), available from the Cart32 Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5255.title: Google Mini Search Appliance search module cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5255.body: Google Mini Search Appliance is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ie parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Google has released patch GA-2007-09-m, available from the Google Enterprise Support Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5257.title: EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX control (officeviewer.ocx) FtpDownloadFile() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5257.body: The EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX control (officeviewer.ocx) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the FtpDownloadFile() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of EDraw Office Viewer Component (5.3.288.1 or later), available from the 5.3.288.1 Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5261.title: MultiCart search.php and categorydetail.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5261.body: MultiCart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to search.php script using the ddlCategory parameter and the categorydetail.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5264.title: DropTeam account password information disclosure
CVE-2007-5264.body: DropTeam could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The username and password for the DropTeam account are sent unencrypted to the game server. A remote attacker with administrative privileges could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the product key and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5271.title: Trionic Cite CMS bField[bf_data] parameter remote file include
CVE-2007-5271.body: Trionic Cite CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the -custom.php or custom.php scripts using the bField[bf_data] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5272.title: Furkan kategori.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5272.body: Furkan Tastan Blog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the kategori.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5279.title: PowerArchiver BlackHole archive buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5279.body: PowerArchiver is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of BlackHole archives. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted BlackHole archive containing an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PowerArchiver (10.20.21 or later), available from the PowerArchiver Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5281.title: Hitachi Cosminexus SSL/TLS handshake JSSE denial of service
CVE-2007-5281.body: Hitachi Cosminexus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the JSSE (Java Secure Socket Extension) when handling improper SSL/TLS handshake requests. If the system is configured to use JSEE APIs to receive SSL/TLS connections, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to HS07-031 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5282.title: Hitachi Cosminexus Agent unspecified denial of service
CVE-2007-5282.body: Hitachi Cosminexus Agent is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when handling invalid data. By sending specially-crafted data from a process other than Cosminexus Manager, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to HS07-033 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5283.title: Hitachi TPBroker TSC Domain denial of service
CVE-2007-5283.body: Hitachi TPBroker is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the TSC Domain when handling invalid messages. By sending a specially-crafted message, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to terminate the TPBroker Object Transaction Monitor and Cosminexus TPBroker Object Transaction Monitor abnormally, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to HS07-032 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5289.title: HP Quality Center workflow scripts security bypass
CVE-2007-5289.body: HP Quality Center could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of cached workflow scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the OTA API to overwrite affected files in the database and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.HP Quality Center customers should contact HP support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-5290.title: MailBee WebMail Pro login.php and default.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5290.body: MailBee WebMail Pro is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script using the mode parameter or the default.asp script using the mode2 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MailBee WebMail Pro (4.1 or later), available from the MailBee WebMail Pro Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5291.title: DB Manager Edit.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5291.body: DB Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Edit.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5292.title: Directory Image Gallery photos.cfm cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5292.body: Directory Image Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the photos.cfm script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the backwardDirectory parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5293.title: IDMOS ia.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5293.body: IDMOS CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ia.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the content parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5293.title: IDMOS CMS error.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5293.body: IDMOS CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the error.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the err_msg in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5294.title: IDMOS CMS aural.php file include
CVE-2007-5294.body: IDMOS CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the aural.php script using the site_absolute_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5295.title: Wikepage index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5295.body: Wikepage is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PageContent or the PageName parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. Note: This vulnerability also affects TipiWiki2.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5297.title: Minki index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5297.body: Minki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5300.title: wzdftpd USER command denial of service
CVE-2007-5300.body: wzdftpd is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by a stack-based buffer overflow. By sending an overly long USER command, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the daemon to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of wzdftpd (0.8.3 or later), available from the wzdftpd Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5300.title: wzdftpd do_login_loop() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5300.body: wzdftpd is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by an off-by-one error in the do_login_loop() function. By sending an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of wzdftpd (0.8.3 or later), available from the wzdftpd Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5303.title: SnewsCMS news_page.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5303.body: SnewsCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the news_page.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5304.title: ElseIf CMS multiple parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5304.body: ElseIf CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the usingrepertimage, elseifvotetxtresultatduvote, or elseifforumtxtmenugeneraleduforum parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5306.title: ElseIf CMS votesresultats.php path disclosure
CVE-2007-5306.body: ElseIf CMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the votesresultats.php script using an invalid parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5307.title: ElseIf CMS upload.php file upload
CVE-2007-5307.body: ElseIf CMS could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation by the upload.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5308.title: Php Homepage galerie.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5308.body: Php Homepage is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the galerie.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5309.title: Flash Image Gallery component for Joomla! admin.wmtgallery.php file include
CVE-2007-5309.body: The Flash Image Gallery component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.wmtgallery.php script using the mosConfig_live_site parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5310.title: WMT Portfolio component for Joomla! admin.wmtportfolio.php file include
CVE-2007-5310.body: The WMT Portfolio component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.wmtportfolio.php script using the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5311.title: TorrentTrader Classic Edition admin-functions.php file include
CVE-2007-5311.body: TorrentTrader Classic Edition could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin-functions.php script using the ss_uri parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5312.title: TorrentTrader Classic Edition css.php and browse.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5312.body: TorrentTrader Classic Edition is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the css.php script using the color parameter and the browse.php script using the cat parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5314.title: xKiosk WEB xkurl.php file include
CVE-2007-5314.body: xKiosk WEB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the xkurl.php script using the PEARPATH parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5315.title: LiveAlbum common.php file include
CVE-2007-5315.body: LiveAlbum could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the common.php script using the livealbum_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5318.title: TYPOlight webCMS preview.php information disclosure
CVE-2007-5318.body: TYPOlight webCMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the preview.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the src parameter to download arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of TYPOlight (2.4.7 or later), available from the TYPOlight Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5320.title: ImagXpress ImagXpress8 ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-5320.body: ImagXpress PegasusImaging.ActiveX.ImagXpress8.dll could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system, caused by insecure use of the CompactFile() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory traversal techniques to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.Refer to Pegasus Imaging Corporation Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5321.title: Verlihub Control Panel page parameter file include
CVE-2007-5321.body: Verlihub Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to an unspecified script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Verlihub Control Panel (1.7 or later), available from the VHCP-Verlihub Control Panel Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5322.title: Microsoft Visual FoxPro FPOLE.OCX ActiveX FoxDoCmd command execution
CVE-2007-5322.body: The Microsoft Visual FoxPro ActiveX control (FPOLE.OCX) could allow a remote attacker to execute commands on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the FoxDoCmd function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the victim's system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-010. See References.

CVE-2007-5323.title: EMC RepliStor recv function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5323.body: EMC RepliStor is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the recv function. By sending a specially-crafted request to the RepliStor Server Service on TCP port 7144, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the current version of EMC RepliStor, available to current customers from the EMC Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5325.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products Message Engine and Ascore.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5325.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Message Engine service and the Ascore.dll component. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5327.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products mediasvr.exe 0x10d opnum buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5327.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Message Engine service. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request containing an overly long argument in the 0x10d opnum, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5327.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products RPC engine and rpcx.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5327.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RPC Engine service and the rpcx.dll component. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5328.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products Message Engine RPC security bypass
CVE-2007-5328.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the use of multiple insecure methods by the Message Engine RPC service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized modifications to the file system and system registry, which could allow the attacker to gain complete control over the affected system.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5329.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products dbasvr code execution
CVE-2007-5329.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of RPC requests by the dbasvr component that could cause memory corruption. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5330.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products cadbd RPC code execution
CVE-2007-5330.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of RPC requests by the cadbd RPC service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5331.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products Queue.dll LQserver.exe code execution
CVE-2007-5331.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of RPC requests by Queue.dll for the message queuing service (LQserver.exe). By sending a specially-crafted ONRPC protocol request for operation 0x76, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5332.title: Multiple CA BrightStor ARCserve backup products mediasvr and caloggerd code execution
CVE-2007-5332.body: Multiple Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve backup products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of RPC requests by the mediasvr and caloggerd components. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the CA SupportConnect Web site for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5335.title: Mozilla Firefox addMicrosummaryGenerator sidebar information disclosure
CVE-2007-5335.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a vulnerability in the addMicrosummaryGenerator sidebar method. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view a victim's browser history.Upgrade to the latest version of Mozilla Firefox (2.0.0.8 or later), available from the Mozilla Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5337.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey sftp: URI unauthorized file access
CVE-2007-5337.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey, when installed on Linux systems with gnome-vfs support, could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper handling of sftp: URIs. If an attacker could persuade a victim to visit a specially-crafted page located on a server to which both the victim and attacker have access, the attacker could read any file on that system that is owned by the victim. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability, the attacker would need limited write access to the targeted system.Refer to MFSA 2007-34 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Netscape:Upgrade to the latest version of Netscape (9.0.0.1 or later), available from the Netscape Web site. See References.For Warpzilla Enhanced Gecko:Upgrade to the latest version of Gecko (1.8.1.8 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5338.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey XPCNativeWrapper Script object code execution
CVE-2007-5338.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error related to the handling of XPCNativeWrappers when modified by Script objects. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the affected system or cause a denial of service, if the attacker could persuade a victim to visit a malicious Web page or open a malicious HTML email.Refer to MFSA 2007-35 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Netscape:Upgrade to the latest version of Netscape (9.0.0.1 or later), available from the Netscape Web site. See References.For Warpzilla Enhanced Gecko:Upgrade to the latest version of Gecko (1.8.1.8 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5339.title: Mozilla multiple unspecified browser engine code execution
CVE-2007-5339.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by multiple unspecified memory corruption vulnerabilities related to the browser engine. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the affected system or cause a denial of service, if the attacker could persuade a victim to visit a malicious Web page or open a malicious HTML email.Refer to MFSA 2007-29 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5340.title: Mozilla multiple unspecified JavaScript engine code execution
CVE-2007-5340.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by multiple unspecified memory corruption vulnerabilities related to the JavaScript engine. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the affected system or cause a denial of service, if the attacker could persuade a victim to visit a malicious Web page or open a malicious HTML email.Refer to MFSA 2007-29 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5347.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer DHTML object code execution
CVE-2007-5347.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified vulnerability related to the handling of certain method calls to DHTML objects. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-5350.title: Microsoft Windows Vista kernel ALPC privilege escalation
CVE-2007-5350.body: The Microsoft Windows Vista kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of legacy reply paths by the Windows Advanced Local Procedure Call (ALPC). An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by executing a specially-crafted application to gain complete control over the vulnerable system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-5351.title: Microsoft Windows Vista SMBv2 signing code execution
CVE-2007-5351.body: The Microsoft Windows Vista SMBv2 feature could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability related to the implementation of SMBv2 signing. By sending a specially-crafted SMBv2 packet to a vulnerable system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the local user.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-063. See References.

CVE-2007-5352.title: Microsoft Windows LSASS LPC privilege escalation
CVE-2007-5352.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability in the Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS). A local attacker could run an application to send a specially-crafted LPC packet to the LSASS process and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.— OR —Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2007-5362.title: MOSMediaLite451 mosConfig_absolute_path parameter file include
CVE-2007-5362.body: MOSMediaLite451 could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the credits.html.php, info.html.php, media.divs.php, media.divs.js.php, purchase.html.php, or support.html.php scripts using the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5363.title: Panoramic Picture Viewer component for Joomla! admin.panoramic.php file include
CVE-2007-5363.body: The Panoramic Picture Viewer component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.panoramic.php script using the mosConfig_live_site parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5366.title: Interstage Application Server Servlet Service path disclosure
CVE-2007-5366.body: Interstage Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Servlet Service using an invalid parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Refer to Web Root Path Disclosure Vulnerability in Interstage Application Server Advisory for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5367.title: Sun Solaris VFS denial of service
CVE-2007-5367.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in Virtual File System (VFS). A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available kernel memory, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103088 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5370.title: DNews dnewsweb.exe cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5370.body: DNews is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by dnewsweb.exe in Windows and dnewsweb in Unix. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cmd or utag parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5372.title: SQL-Ledger unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2007-5372.body: SQL-Ledger is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified attack vectors, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5373.title: ldapscripts command line parameter information disclosure
CVE-2007-5373.body: ldapscripts could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the passing of user credentials as the command line parameter. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "ps" command to display the password and obtain other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of ldapscripts (1.7.1 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5374.title: LightBlog cp_memberedit.php privilege escalation
CVE-2007-5374.body: LightBlog could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability in the cp_memberedit.php script. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain administrator access.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5378.title: Tk Toolkit FileReadGIF denial of service
CVE-2007-5378.body: TK is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a buffer overflow in the FileReadGIF function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF file in which the first subimage is smaller than the next subimage, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a segmentation fault.Upgrade to the latest version of Tcl/Tk (8.4.16 or later), available from Sourceforge.net: Files. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5381.title: Cisco IOS LPD daemon hostname buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5381.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Line Printer Daemon (LPD). If the LPD daemon is enabled, a remote attacker who has the ability to modify the hostname could send an overly-long router hostname to TCP port 515 to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the device to crash.Refer to cisco-sr-20071010-lpd for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5386.title: phpMyAdmin setup.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5386.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the setup.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (2.11.1.1 or later), available from the phpMyAdmin Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5387.title: Pindorama client.php file include
CVE-2007-5387.body: Pindorama could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the client.php script using the c[components] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5392.title: Xpdf DCTStream::reset() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5392.body: Xpdf is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the DCTStream::reset() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to KDE Security Advisory 2007-11-07 for patch information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5393.title: Xpdf CCITTFaxStream::lookChar() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5393.body: Xpdf is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the CCITTFaxStream::lookChar() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file containing a "CCITTFaxDecode" filter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to KDE Security Advisory 2007-11-07 for patch information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5395.title: AbiWord Link Grammar and Link Grammar separate_sentence() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5395.body: AbiWord Link Grammar and Link Grammar are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the separate_word() function. By passing a specially-crafted sentence containing overly long words to the separate_sentence() function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.For AbiWord Link Grammar:Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the ABI SVN Repository. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5400.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer SWF frame buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5400.body: RealPlayer is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of Shockwave Flash frames. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave Flash file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to the Real Player Customer Support Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5401.title: HelpBox uploadrequest.asp file upload
CVE-2007-5401.body: HelpBox could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the uploadrequest.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of HelpBox (4.0 or later), available from the Layton Technology Web site. CVE-2007-5402.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the changerequeststatus.asp, editrequestuser.asp, requestcommentsuser.asp, or useractions.asp scripts using the sys_request_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of HelpBox (4.0 or later), available from the Layton Technology Web site. CVE-2007-5402.title: HelpBox writepwdenduser.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5402.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5403.title: HelpBox usersearchrequests.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5403.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the usersearchrequests.asp script. CVE-2007-5403.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the statsrequestypereport.asp script. CVE-2007-5403.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the writeenduserenduser.asp script. CVE-2007-5403.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the editrequestenduser.asp script. CVE-2007-5403.body: HelpBox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the requestattach.asp script. CVE-2007-5404.body: HelpBox could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. A failed login with an invalid username returns a different error message than a failed login with a valid username. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of HelpBox (4.0 or later), available from the Layton Technology Web site. CVE-2007-5405.title: Autonomy KeyView kpagrdr.dll multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2007-5405.body: The Autonomy (formerly Verity) KeyView Applix Presents reader (kpagrdr.dll), which is used in IBM Lotus Notes, Symantec Mail Security, and possibly other applications, is vulnerable to multiple stack and heap-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted Applix Graphics file using one of the affected file viewers, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. CVE-2007-5410.title: wmtrssreader component for Joomla! Wmtrssreader.php file include
CVE-2007-5410.body: The wmtrssreader component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-5411.title: Linksys SPA941 VoIP Phone firmware SIP cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5411.body: The Linksys SPA941 VoIP Phone firmware is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input coming from an SIP message. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5413.title: HP OpenView Configuration Management and Client Configuration Manager unauthorized access
CVE-2007-5413.body: HP OpenView Configuration Management (CM) Infrastructure (Radia) and Client Configuration Manager (CCM) when running httpd.tkd could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a weakness in URL home path restrictions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system and data.Refer to HPSBMA02279 SSRT071298 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5423.title: TikiWiki tiki-graph_formula.php command execution
CVE-2007-5423.body: TikiWiki could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the tiki-graph_formula.php script. A remote attacker could send a direct request using the "f" parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.For Gentoo Linux (tikiwiki):Refer to GLSA 200710-21 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-5425.title: ActiveKB admin/index.php questid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-5425.body: ActiveKB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin/index.php script using the questid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5426.title: ActiveKB NX page parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5426.body: ActiveKB NX is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of ActiveKB NX (2.7 or later), available from the Interspire Web site. CVE-2007-5447.title: ionCube PHP Encoder extension for PHP ioncube_read_file security bypass
CVE-2007-5447.body: ionCube PHP Encoder could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation by the ioncube_loader_win_5.2.dll file. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using the ioncube_read_file function to access restricted files.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5448.title: MadWifi xrates denial of service
CVE-2007-5448.body: MadWifi is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the handling of beacon frames. By sending a specially-crafted beacon frame containing an overly large length value in the xrates, a remote attacker could cause the driver to exit resulting in a kernel panic.Upgrade to the fixed version of MadWifi, available from the MadWifi.org SVN Repository. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5449.title: Softbiz Recipes Portal Script searchresult.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5449.body: Softbiz Recipes Portal Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the searchresult.php script using the sbcat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5450.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone TIFF images code execution
CVE-2007-5450.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a buffer overflow error when processing TIFF images. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted TIFF image using the Safari Web browser, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected device to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone (1.1.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5454.title: PHP File Sharing System index.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-5454.body: PHP File Sharing System could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the cam parameter to delete files and to view or create arbitrary directories using the Web interface.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5455.title: WWWIsis wxis.exe cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5455.body: WWWIsis is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wxis.exe file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the lang parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5457.title: The Flash Uploader component for Joomla! install.joomla_flash_uploader.php and uninstall.joomla_flash_uploader.php file include
CVE-2007-5457.body: The Flash Uploader component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the install.joomla_flash_uploader.php and uninstall.joomla_flash_uploader.php scripts using the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5459.title: Mouseover Dictionary unspecified code execution
CVE-2007-5459.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Mouseover Dictionary could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary script code on the vulnerable system using unknown attack vectors.Upgrade to the latest version of Mouseover Dictionary (0.6.2 or later), available from the Mouseover Dictionary Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5460.title: Microsoft ActiveSync weak XOR encryption
CVE-2007-5460.body: Microsoft ActiveSync uses weak XOR encryption for passwords sent over USB interfaces. A local attacker with administrator privileges could sniff the network or masquerade as a docking station to obtain and decrypt the password.Upgrade to the latest version of Windows Mobile (6 or later), available from the Windows Mobile Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5461.title: Apache Tomcat WebDAV directory traversal
CVE-2007-5461.body: Apache Tomcat could allow an authenticated remote attacker to traverse directories and view any known file on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted WebDAV write request containing the absolute path of the targeted file within the SYSTEM ENTITY tag. Note: This vulnerability also affects Apache Jakarta Slide.Upgrade to the fixed version of Apache Tomcat WebDAV (5.5 or 6.0 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat SVN Repository. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5462.title: Sun Solaris mountd daemon denial of service
CVE-2007-5462.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the RPC Services Library (librpcsvc). If the mountd service is used on an NFS server with an overly large number of exported file systems or with long access lists, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the mountd daemon.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103082 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-5462.title: Sun Solaris RPC Services Library (librpcsvc) denial of service
CVE-2007-5462.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the RPC Services Library (librpcsvc). If the automountd service is used to gain remote access to NFS servers with an overly large number of exported file systems, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the automountd daemon.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103082 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-5464.title: Live for Speed skin name buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5464.body: Live for Speed is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing another user's skin name. By sending a specially-crafted packet using an overly long skin name, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5466.title: eXtremail CRAM-MD5 authentication buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5466.body: eXtremail is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted CRAM-MD5 authentication message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5468.title: Cisco CallManager and OpenSER SIP call hijacking
CVE-2007-5468.body: Cisco CallManager and OpenSER could allow a remote attacker to hijack calls, caused by the improper handling of SIP messages. By sending a specially-crafted request for a URI containing a sniffed authentication header, a remote attacker who can sniff the traffic could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's call.For OpenSER:Apply the fix for this vulnerability, available from the OpenSER SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2007-5473.title: Mono StaticFileHandler.cs information disclosure
CVE-2007-5473.body: Mono could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a vulnerability in StaticFileHandler.cs. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by appending a space or dot to a file request, resulting in the disclosure of source code from arbitrary files.Upgrade to the latest revision of Mono (1.2.5.2 revision 87715 or later), available from the Mono Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5474.title: Atheros AR5416-AC1E chipset association request denial of service
CVE-2007-5474.body: The Atheros AR5416-AC1E chipset, as used by the Linksys WRT350N Wi-Fi access point, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing a vendor-specific information element in an association request. By sending an Atheros information element with an invalid length, a remote attacker could cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of October 2008.

CVE-2007-5477.title: WebMod auth.w cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5477.body: WebMod is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the auth.w script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5478.title: Stringbeans Portal project_name parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5478.body: Stringbeans Portal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5480.body: InnovaAge InnovaShop is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the msg.jsp and home001.jsp scripts. CVE-2007-5485.body: The mg2 module for KwsPHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5486.title: dotProject Companies module security bypass

By creating a specially-crafted URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the Companies Module.Upgrade to the latest version of dotProject (2.1 or later), available from the dotProject Web site. CVE-2007-5488.title: Asterisk-Addons cdr_addon_mysql module SQL injection
CVE-2007-5488.body: Asterisk-Addons is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5489.title: Artmedic CMS index.php file include
CVE-2007-5489.body: Artmedic CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5490.title: Okul Otomasyon Portal default.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5490.body: Okul Otomasyon Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. When islem is set to 1, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the default.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5494.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux content accelerator denial of service
CVE-2007-5494.body: Red Hat Enterprise Linux is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak in the Red Hat Content Accelerator kernel patch. By sending an overly large number of open requests, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory resources, resulting in a denial of service.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5496.title: SETroubleShoot sealert AVC denial events cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5496.body: SETroubleShoot sealert is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using AVC denial events to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to RHSA-2008-0061 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5497.title: e2fsprogs libext2fs unspecified integer overflow
CVE-2007-5497.body: The e2fsprogs libext2fs library is vulnerable to an unspecified integer overflow while loading images. By passing specially-crafted data to an application linked to the vulnerable library, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application.Refer to SUSE-SR:2007:025 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5498.title: Linux kernel Xen hypervisor block backend driver denial of service
CVE-2007-5498.body: Linux kernel, when running on a 64-bit host with a 32-bit paravirtualized guest, is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by the failure to perform sanity checks by the Xen hypervisor block backend driver. By sending a specially-crafted request for an overly large number of blocks, a local authenticated attacker on the Guest OS could cause the Host OS to crash.Refer to Red Hat Bugzilla Bug 369531 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5501.title: Linux kernel tcp_sacktag_write_queue() denial of service
CVE-2007-5501.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the tcp_sacktag_write_queue() function. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted ACK packet to cause the system to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux kernel (2.6.23.8 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5502.body: OpenSSL FIPS Object Module could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Pseudo Random Number Generator (PRNG) implementation. The key and seed that are used belong with the previous FIPS self-test, which allows more predictable random data to be generated than expected. A remote attacker could exploit this weakness to bypass protection mechanisms that rely on the module.Apply patches available from the OpenSSL Security Advisory [29-Nov-2007]. See References.

CVE-2007-5503.title: Cairo read_png function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5503.body: Cairo is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the read_png function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PNG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Cairo (1.4.12 or later), available from the Cairo Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5537.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager and Cisco Unified CallManager SIP INVITE denial of service
CVE-2007-5537.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager and Cisco Unified CallManager are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) stack. By flooding UDP port 5060 with SIP INVITE messages, a remote attacker could exhaust all resources and cause a kernel panic.Refer to cisco-sa-20071017-cucm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5538.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager and Cisco Unified CallManager TFTP filename buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5538.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager and Cisco Unified CallManager are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Centralized TFTP File Locator Service. By sending a specially-crafted filename to UDP port 69 or TCP port 6970, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20071017-cucm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5541.title: Opera for Desktop unspecified code execution
CVE-2007-5541.body: Opera for Desktop could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified vulnerability that affects external email and newsgroup applications that have been configured for use in the browser. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (9.24 or later), as listed in Opera Software Knowledge Base Article 866. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2007-5562.title: NETGEAR ProSafe SSL VPN Concentrator 25 Web interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5562.body: NETGEAR ProSafe SSL VPN Concentrator 25 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by /cgi-bin/welcome/XYZ. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the err parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5564.title: Nssboard profile cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5564.body: Nssboard, formerly Simple PHP forum, is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the user profile. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTML tags to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the member page or user's profile is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5567.title: Galmeta Post upload_config.php file include
CVE-2007-5567.body: Galmeta Post could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the upload_config.php script using the DDS parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5568.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) and PIX MGCP denial of service
CVE-2007-5568.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) and PIX security appliances are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of malformed MGCP packets.
