If the Media Gateway Control Protocol (MGCP) application layer protocol inspection feature is enabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted MGCP packets to UDP port 2427 to cause the device to reload, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20071017-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5569.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) and PIX security appliances TLS denial of service
CVE-2007-5569.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) and PIX security appliances are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of malformed Transport Layer Security (TLS) packets. By sending a specially-crafted TLS packet, a remote attacker could cause the device to reload, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20071017-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5570.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) HTTP request denial of service
CVE-2007-5570.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of malformed HTTP requests. If the HTTPS server is enabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted HTTP requests to cause the device to reload, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20071017-fwsm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5571.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) access control list entries (ACEs) security bypass
CVE-2007-5571.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when loading manipulated ACLs. When deleting and re-adding access control list entries (ACEs), the internal structure of the ACL becomes corrupted, which causes the FWSM to not evaluate some ACEs. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and deny normal traffic while allowing normally restricted traffic.Refer to cisco-sa-20071017-fwsm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5572.title: Simple PHP Blog add_link.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5572.body: Simple PHP Blog is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the add_link.php script. By sending a specially-crafted email within an IMG tag, a remote attacker could use the delete action with the link_id parameter to delete links and possibly perform cross-site scripting, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activity, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious email message and read the comment.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5572.title: Simple PHP Blog add_block.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5572.body: Simple PHP Blog is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the add_block.php script. By sending a specially-crafted email within an IMG tag, a remote attacker could use the delete action with the block_id parameter to delete blocks and possibly perform cross-site scripting, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activity, if the attacker could persuade the victim to open the malicious email message and read the comment.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5573.title: LimeSurvey language.php file include
CVE-2007-5573.body: LimeSurvey (formerly PHPSurveyor) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the language.php script using the rootdir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of LimeSurvey (1.53 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2007-5574.title: PHPDJ djpage.php file include
CVE-2007-5574.body: PHPDJ could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the djpage.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5575.title: 1024 CMS unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5575.body: 1024 CMS is vulnerable to an unspecified cross-site request forgery, caused by a vulnerability when handling HTTP requests. By persuading an authenticated victim to view a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change arbitrary passwords and possibly perform other attacks against the affected system, including cross-site scripting, Web cache poisoning, and PHP code execution.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5576.title: BEA WebLogic Enterprise and Tuxedo information disclosure
CVE-2007-5576.body: BEA WebLogic Enterprise and Tuxedo could allow a local authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information. The cnsbind, cnsunbind, and cnsls commands display the user's supplied password in clear text. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the victim's password to obtain sensitive information with the privileges of the victim.Refer to BEA07-158.00 for patch and upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2007-5577.title: Joomla! Section Manager cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5577.body: Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when creating new sections in Section Manager. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Title or Section Name form fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! (1.0.13 or later), available from the Joomla Web site: 1.0.13 Changelog. See References.

CVE-2007-5578.title: Basic Analysis and Security Engine (BASE) base_main.php security bypass
CVE-2007-5578.body: Basic Analysis and Security Engine (BASE) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the base_main.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Basic Analysis and Security Engine (BASE) (1.3.8 or later), available from the Basic Analysis and Security Engine (BASE) project Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5583.title: Cisco IP Phone SIP INVITE sequence denial of service
CVE-2007-5583.body: Cisco IP Phone 7940 running firmware P0S3-08-7-00 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of the state engine in the SIP stack. By sending a sequence of specially-crafted SIP INVITE messages without a username, a remote attacker could prevent the device from sending and receiving calls and force it to reboot.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5587.title: Microsoft Windows Macrovision secdrv.sys driver buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5587.body: The Microsoft Windows Macrovision Security Driver (secdrv.sys) is vulnerable to an unspecified buffer overflow. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted application to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS07-067. See References.

CVE-2007-5589.title: phpMyAdmin server_status.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5589.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the server_status.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to PMASA-2007-6 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5590.title: Miranda IM multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2007-5590.body: Miranda IM is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking within the ICQ, IRC, Jabber, and Yahoo instant messaging components. By sending a specially-crafted instant message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the victim's system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Miranda (0.7.1 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2007-5592.title: awzMB Setting[OPT_includepath] file include
CVE-2007-5592.body: awzMB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the Setting[OPT_includepath] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5593.title: Drupal install.php code execution
CVE-2007-5593.body: The Drupal installer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the install.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by providing credentials for an unreachable database to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-025 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5594.title: Drupal HTTP request user deletion cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5594.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a logged in victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to delete users and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-029 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5597.title: Drupal Core API unpublished comments information disclosure
CVE-2007-5597.body: Drupal Core could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper handling of the publication status of comments by the hook_comments API operation. This could result in the disclosure of unpublished comments by various Drupal modules, which could allow a remote attacker with a valid account to obtain sensitive information.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-030 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information.

CVE-2007-5598.title: Weblinks module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5598.body: The Weblinks module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified vectors to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-028 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information.

CVE-2007-5601.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer IERPCtl ActiveX buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5601.body: The RealNetworks RealPlayer IERPCtl ActiveX control (ierpplug.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in the Database Component in MPAMedia.dll. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page using Microsoft Internet Explorer, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.For RealPlayer 10.5 and 11 beta:Apply the patch for this vulnerability (securitydb.rnx), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.For RealOne Player, RealOne Player v2 and RealPlayer 10:Upgrade to the latest version of RealPlayer (10.5 or 11 beta) and install the patch for this vulnerability (securitydb.rnx), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.--OR--As a workaround, set the kill bit on the Class Identifier (CLSID) FDC7A535-4070-4B92-A0EA-D9994BCC0DC5. Refer to Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 240797 for information. See References.CAUTION: Use Registry Editor at your own risk. Any change using Registry Editor may cause severe and irreparable damage and may require you to reinstall your operating system. Internet Security Systems cannot guarantee that problems caused by the use of Registry Editor can be solved.

CVE-2007-5603.title: SonicWALL NetExtender NELaunchCtrl ActiveX AddRouteEntry() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5603.body: The SonicWALL NetExtender NELaunchCtrl ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long second argument to the AddRouteEntry() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.For SonicWALL SSL-VPN 200:Upgrade to the latest firmware (2.1 or later), available from the SonicWALL, Inc. Web site. See References.For SSL-VPN 2000 and SSL-VPN 4000:Upgrade to the latest firmware (2.5 or later), available from the SonicWALL, Inc. Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5604.title: HP Instant Support ActiveX control ExtractCab buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5604.body: The HP Instant Support ActiveX control (HPISDataManager.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the ExtractCab property, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02326 SSRT071490 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5612.title: IBM Director CIM Server connection handling denial of service
CVE-2007-5612.body: IBM Director is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by improper handling of multiple inactive connections by the CIM Server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending multiple connection requests to the server without sending a specific client response, allowing the attacker to consume all available CPU resources eventually causing the server to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available to registered users from the IBM Director Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5620.title: ZZ:FlashChat help.php local file include
CVE-2007-5620.body: ZZ:FlashChat could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the help.php script using the file parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5621.title: Token module for Drupal cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5621.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Token module. A remote attacker with "post comments" or "post comments without approval" permissions could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. Note: Vocabulary names, term names, and usernames are affected by this vulnerability.Refer to Drupal Security Advisory DRUPAL-SA-2007-027 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information.

CVE-2007-5622.title: 3proxy ftpprchild function denial of service
CVE-2007-5622.body: 3proxy is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the FTP proxy module ftpprchild() function. By sending multiple OPEN commands, a remote attacker could cause the service to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of 3proxy (0.5.3j or later), available from the 3proxy Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5624.title: Nagios CGI cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5624.body: Nagios is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by various CGI scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Nagios (2.10 or later), available from the Nagios Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5625.title: SearchSimon Lite filename.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5625.body: SearchSimon Lite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the filename.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the QUERY parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5628.title: The Online Web Library Site scripture.php file include
CVE-2007-5628.body: The Online Web Library Site (TOWeLS) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the scripture.php script using the pageHeaderFile parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5629.title: CandyPress Store logon.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5629.body: CandyPress Store is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the logon.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5630.title: BBPortalS BBsProcesS tnews.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5630.body: BBPortalS BBsProcesS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the tnews.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5631.title: PeopleAggregator path_prefix and current_blockmodule_path file include
CVE-2007-5631.body: PeopleAggregator could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the path_prefix or current_blockmodule_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of PeopleAggregator (1.2pre6-release-55 or later), available from the Broadband Mechanics Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5634.title: Speedfan Speedfan.sys denial of service
CVE-2007-5634.body: Microsoft Windows Vista is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the IOCTL dispatch handler of the Speedfan.sys driver. By creating a specially-crafted file to overwrite an arbitrary MSR, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5636.title: Nortel IP Softphone UNIStim RTCP buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5636.body: The Nortel IP Softphone 2050 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of packets sent to the RTCP port. By sending multiple invalid packets to the RTCP port on a vulnerable system, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Refer to Nortel Technical Support Security Advisory Bulletin 2007008382 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5638.title: Multiple Nortel IP Phones Open Audio Stream messages spoofing
CVE-2007-5638.body: Multiple Nortel IP Phones use a limited number of values in the 32-bit ID number field of an RUDP datagram. This could allow a remote attacker to spoof "Open Audio Stream" messages and launch further attacks against the affected device.Refer to Nortel Technical Support Security Advisory Bulletin 2007008383 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5641.title: PHP Project Management full_path file include
CVE-2007-5641.body: PHP Project Management could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the full_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP Project Management (0.8.11 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5642.title: PHP Project Management module def_lang and m_path parameters local file include
CVE-2007-5642.body: PHP Project Management could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the module, def_lang or m_path parameters to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP Project Management (0.8.11 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5643.title: Vanilla CategoryID parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-5643.body: Vanilla is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the sortcategories.php or sortroles.php script using the CategoryID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Vanilla (1.1.4 or later), available from the Vanilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5646.title: Simple Machines Forum index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5646.body: Simple Machines Forum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using multiple parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Simple Machines Forum (1.1.4 or later) or (1.0.12 or later), available from the Simple Machines Forum Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5647.title: SocketKB multiple parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5647.body: SocketKB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the node or art_id parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5649.title: Socketmail lostpwd.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5649.body: Socketmail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the lostpwd.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using lost_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5653.title: PHP multiple COM objects security bypass
CVE-2007-5653.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass the safe_mode and disable_function security restrictions, caused by improper handling of COM objects. By uploading a malicious script to the server, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system.No remedy available as of December 2016.

CVE-2007-5654.title: LiteSpeed Web Server mime-type information disclosure
CVE-2007-5654.body: LiteSpeed Web Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a vulnerability in the way certain mime-types are handled. By sending a specially-crafted URL request with an appended null (%00) character and file extension, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the source code of arbitrary scripts.Upgrade to the latest version of LiteSpeed (3.2.4 or later), available from the LiteSpeed Technologies Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5655.title: TIBCO SmartSockets RTserver pointer values code execution
CVE-2007-5655.body: TIBCO SmartSockets could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation by the RTserver component when handling requests. By sending a specially-crafted request containing pointer values, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause a denial of service. Note: This vulnerability also affects TIBCO RTworks and TIBCO Enterprise Message Service.For TIBCO SmartSockets:Upgrade to the latest version of TIBCO SmartSockets (6.8.1 or later), as listed in TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory January 15, 2008. See References.For TIBCO RTworks:Upgrade to the latest version of TIBCO RTworks (4.0.4 or later), as listed in TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory January 15, 2008. See References.For TIBCO Enterprise Message Service:Upgrade to the latest version of TIBCO EMS (4.4.2 or later), as listed in TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory January 15, 2008. See References.

CVE-2007-5656.title: TIBCO SmartSockets RTserver loop bounds code execution
CVE-2007-5656.body: TIBCO SmartSockets could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation by the RTserver component when handling requests. By sending a specially-crafted request containing malicious loop bounds, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause a denial of service. Note: This vulnerability also affects TIBCO RTworks and TIBCO Enterprise Message Service.For TIBCO SmartSockets:Upgrade to the latest version of TIBCO SmartSockets (6.8.1 or later), as listed in TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory January 15, 2008. See References.For TIBCO RTworks:Upgrade to the latest version of TIBCO RTworks (4.0.4 or later), as listed in TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory January 15, 2008. See References.For TIBCO Enterprise Message Service:Upgrade to the latest version of TIBCO EMS (4.4.2 or later), as listed in TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory January 15, 2008. See References.

CVE-2007-5673.title: WebIf cmd parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5673.body: WebIf is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the cgi-bin/webif.exe file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cmd parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5676.title: PHP-Nuke favorites.php file include
CVE-2007-5676.body: PHP-Nuke could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the favorites.php script using the nuke_bb_root_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5679.title: DMCMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5679.body: DMCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5685.title: shttp safe_path directory traversal
CVE-2007-5685.body: shttp could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the safe_path() function. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to traverse directories and view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of shttp (0.0.5 or later), available from the Shttp Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5687.title: JustSystems Ichitaro JSTARO4.OCX buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5687.body: JustSystems Ichitaro is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the JSTARO4.OCX object. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Word document using a plug-in browser, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the JUSTSYSTEMS Web site for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5688.title: The Multi-Forums module for phpBB directory.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5688.body: The Multi-Forums module for phpBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the directory.php script using the go and cat parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5691.title: Mozilla Firefox ParseFTPList.cpp denial of service
CVE-2007-5691.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in ParseFTPList.cpp when listing files. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious FTP server, a remote attacker could cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Mozilla Firefox (2.0.0.8 or later), available from the Mozilla Firefox Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5698.title: CREApark GOLD KOY PORTALI default.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5698.body: CREApark GOLD KOY PORTALI is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the default.asp script. If sayfa is set to arama1, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the aranan parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5699.title: eIQnetworks Enterprise Security Analyzer SEARCHREPORT buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5699.body: eIQnetworks Enterprise Security Analyzer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the SEARCHREPORT command. By sending an overly long argument to the SEARCHREPORT command, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5701.title: IBM Lotus Domino Certificate Authority (CA) password disclosure
CVE-2007-5701.body: IBM Lotus Domino could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when using the Domino CA (Certificate Authority) process commands on the server console. An attacker could use the uppercase characters with the CA "activate" or "unlock" commands to display the passwords in clear text. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the password and other sensitive information.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1261095 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5702.title: Novell Swamp login page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5702.body: Novell OpenSUSE Workflow Administration and Management Platform is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the login box to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5704.title: Online Event Registration Template login.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5704.body: The Online Event Registration Template is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.asp or admin_login.asp scripts using the Password or Email Address field, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5705.title: Jeebles Directory Settings settings.inc.php code execution
CVE-2007-5705.body: Jeebles Directory could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified vulnerability in the administration system's Settings component. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors related to the settings.inc.php script to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5706.title: Jeebles Directory download.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-5706.body: Jeebles Directory could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a direct request to the download.php script containing an absolute path using the pathname in a query string to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5709.title: Sony CONNECT Player (SonicStage) m3u playlist buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5709.body: Sony CONNECT Player (SonicStage) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing .M3U files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .M3U playlist containing an overly long file name, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5710.title: WordPress edit-post-rows.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5710.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the edit-post-rows.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the posts_columns parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress (2.3.1 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5711.title: World in Conflict packets denial of service
CVE-2007-5711.body: World in Conflict is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of packets. By sending an overly large packet to UDP or TCP port 48000, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the server.Upgrade to the current version of World in Conflict (v1.001 Update #002), available from the World in Conflict Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5712.title: Django i18n denial of service
CVE-2007-5712.body: Django is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the i18n internationalization system. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP Accept-Language request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Django (0.91.1, 0.95.2, and 0.96.1 or later), available from the Django Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5719.title: MiniBB table SQL injection
CVE-2007-5719.body: MiniBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the table parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of MiniBB (2.1a or later), available from the MiniBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5721.title: MySpace Resource Script (MSRS) breadcrumb.php file include
CVE-2007-5721.body: MySpace Resource Script (MSRS) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the breadcrumb.php script using the rootBase parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5722.title: Ourgame GLWorld GLCHAT.GLChatCtrl.1 ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5722.body: The Ourgame GLWorld GLCHAT.GLChatCtrl.1 ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the ConnectAndEnterRoom() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5723.title: NuFW samp_send() denial of service
CVE-2007-5723.body: NuFW is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking by the samp_send() function when calling the sasl_encode64() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service and possibly trigger a heap-based buffer overflow with three bytes on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of NuFW (2.2.7 or later), available from the NuFW Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5725.title: Smart-Shop Shopping Cart index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5725.body: Smart-Shop Shopping Cart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5728.title: phpPgAdmin redirect.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5728.body: phpPgAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts including the redirect.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using encoded script tags to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5729.title: QEMU NE2000 emulator code execution
CVE-2007-5729.body: QEMU could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system, caused by an error in the NE2000 emulator. By writing an overly large Ethernet frame, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly cause a heap-based buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-5730.title: QEMU net socket buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5730.body: QEMU is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending specially-crafted data in the "net socket listen" option, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-5741.title: Plone statusmessages and linkintegrity modules python code execution
CVE-2007-5741.body: Plone could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by multiple vulnerabilities in the statusmessages and linkintegrity modules where malicious network traffic is incorrectly identified as python pickles. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary python code with the privileges of the Zope/Plone process.Apply Plone Hotfix 20071106, available from the Plone Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5742.title: Battle for Wesnoth WML preprocessor directory traversal
CVE-2007-5742.body: Battle for Wesnoth could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error in the WML preprocessor. An attacker could send a specially-crafted pathname containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) using a malicious add-on to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Wesnoth (1.2.8 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2007-5745.title: OpenOffice.org Quattro Pro files buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5745.body: OpenOffice.org is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing "Attribute" or "Font Description" records from Quattro Pro files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Quattro Pro file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (2.4 or later), available from the OpenOffice.org Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5746.title: OpenOffice.org EMF buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5746.body: OpenOffice.org is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling EMF files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted EMF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (2.4 or later), available from the OpenOffice.org Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5751.title: Liferea feedlist.opml information disclosure
CVE-2007-5751.body: Liferea could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insecure permissions on the feedlist.opml backup file. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain feed or proxy authentication usernames and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Liferea (1.4.6 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2007-5756.title: WinPcap NPF.SYS bpf_filter_init() code execution
CVE-2007-5756.body: WinPcap could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an array indexing error in the bpf_filter_init() function in the NPF.SYS device driver. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of WinPcap (4.0.2 or later), available from the WinPcap Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5758.title: IBM DB2 db2dasrrm DASPROF buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5758.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by db2dasrrm. By sending an overly long string to the DASPROF environment variable, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5761.title: Motorola netOctopus nantsys.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2007-5761.body: Motorola's netOctopus could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the exposure of the world-writable \\.\NantSys device interface when the nantsys.sys device driver is installed. By modifying SYSENTER_EIP_MSR, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges.Refer to the Motorola Web site for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5771.title: Flatnuke3 myforum cookie privilege escalation
CVE-2007-5771.body: Flatnuke3 could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by improper validation of the myforum cookie. By modifying the myforum cookie value, an attacker could gain administrative privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5773.title: Flatnuke3 file manager module security bypass
CVE-2007-5773.body: Flatnuke3 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation by the file manager module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and view or modify arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5774.title: Flatnuke3 index.php path disclosure
CVE-2007-5774.body: Flatnuke3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using an invalid parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5779.title: GOM Player GomWebCtrl.GomManager.1 ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5779.body: The GOM Player GomWebCtrl.GomManager.1 ActiveX control (GomWeb3.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the OpenURL() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of GOM Player (2.1.8.3682 or later), available from the GOM PLAYER Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5780.title: teatro pub08_comments.php file include
CVE-2007-5780.body: teatro could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the pub08_comments.php script using the basePath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5781.title: Sige sige_init.php file include
CVE-2007-5781.body: Sige could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the sige_init.php script using the SYS_PATH parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5782.title: FireConfig dl.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-5782.body: FireConfig could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the dl.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file parameter and appended with NULL (%00) characters to traverse directories and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5783.title: emagiC CMS.Net emc.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5783.body: emagiC CMS.Net is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the emc.asp script using the pageId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.emagiC CMS customers should contact emagiC CMS support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-5785.title: JobSite Professional file.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5785.body: JobSite Professional is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the file.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5786.title: GoSamba include_path file include
CVE-2007-5786.body: GoSamba could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the include_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5790.title: Globe7 VoIP Service user credentials weak encryption
CVE-2007-5790.body: The Globe7 VoIP Service could provide weaker than expected security. The user credentials file is stored using a weak encryption scheme. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to decrypt the file and possibly obtain other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5792.title: Vonage Motorola Phone Adapter RTP protocol man-in-the-middle
CVE-2007-5792.body: The Vonage Motorola Phone Adapter is vulnerable to a man-in-the-middle attack, caused by an unencrypted RTP protocol. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to capture unencrypted RTP packets and reconstruct the media, allowing the adapter to be used as a remote eavesdropping device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5798.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server navigateTree.do page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5798.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the navigateTree.do page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the keyField, nameField, valueField, or frameReturn parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM APAR PK50245 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5800.title: BackUpWordPress plugin bkpwp_plugin_path file include
CVE-2007-5800.body: The BackUpWordPress plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Archive.php, Predicate.php, Writer.php or the Reader.php script using the bkpwp_plugin_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of BackUpWordPress (0.4.3 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5802.title: Synergiser index.php path disclosure
CVE-2007-5802.body: Synergiser could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using an invalid page parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5803.title: Nagios CGI unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5803.body: Nagios is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by CGI scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Nagios (2.12 or later), available from the Nagios Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5811.title: phpMyConferences PageTraiteDownload.php dir parameter directory traversal
CVE-2007-5811.body: phpMyConferences could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the PageTraiteDownload.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the dir parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5812.title: ModuleBuilder DownloadModule.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-5812.body: ModuleBuilder could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the DownloadModule.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to traverse directories and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5813.title: ISPworker download.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-5813.body: ISPworker could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the download.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the ticketid or filename parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5814.title: SonicWALL NetExtender NELaunchCtrl ActiveX AddRouteEntry() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5814.body: The SonicWALL NetExtender NELaunchCtrl ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long second argument to the AddRouteEntry() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.For SonicWALL SSL-VPN 200:Upgrade to the latest firmware (2.1 or later), available from the SonicWALL, Inc. Web site. See References.For SSL-VPN 2000 and SSL-VPN 4000:Upgrade to the latest firmware (2.5 or later), available from the SonicWALL, Inc. Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5820.title: Ax Developer CMS index.php file include
CVE-2007-5820.body: Ax Developer CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the module parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5822.title: Scribe forum.php new username PHP code execution
CVE-2007-5822.body: Scribe could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forum.php script when registering a new user. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted username parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5824.title: Firefly Media Server ws_decodepassword() denial of service
CVE-2007-5824.body: Firefly Media Server (previously known as Multi-Threaded DAAP Daemon - mt-daapd) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the ws_decodepassword() function. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP GET request to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Firefly Media Server (mt-daapd) (0.2.4.1 or later), available from the FireFly Media Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5824.title: Firefly Media Server ws_getheaders() denial of service
CVE-2007-5824.body: Firefly Media Server (previously known as Multi-Threaded DAAP Daemon - mt-daapd) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the ws_getheaders() function. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP GET request to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Firefly Media Server (mt-daapd) (0.2.4.1 or later), available from the FireFly Media Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5826.title: EDraw Flowchart EDImage.ocx ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2007-5826.body: The EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX control (EDImage.ocx) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that passes a specially-crafted argument to the HttpDownloadFile() method, an attacker could download malicious files to the victim's system which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5827.title: iSCSI Enterprise Target /etc/ietd.conf information disclosure
CVE-2007-5827.body: iSCSI Enterprise Target could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the application of world readable permissions to the /etc/ietd.conf file. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the usernames and passwords and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5829.title: Symantec AntiVirus and Norton AntiVirus for Macintosh "Mount Scan" privilege escalation
CVE-2007-5829.body: Symantec AntiVirus and Norton AntiVirus for Macintosh could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. The "Mount Scan" feature uses an executable that is installed with root privileges in the /Library/Application Support folder. If "Mount Scanning" is enabled and the attacker is a member of the admin group, the attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges by replacing the privileged "Mount Scan" executable with a malicious application.Refer to SYM07-028 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5836.title: AFCommerce firstname parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-5836.body: AFCommerce is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the "firstname" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5837.title: yarssr GUI.pm module command execution
CVE-2007-5837.body: yarssr could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands, caused by improper validation by the GUI.pm module exec function. If Gnome default URL handling is not enabled, and if the victim could be persuaded to click on a specially crafted URL in a feed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary shell commands on the system within the security context of the user.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5840.title: SyndeoCMS main.inc.php file include
CVE-2007-5840.body: SyndeoCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the main.inc.php script using the cmsdir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of SyndeoCMS (2.5.01 or later), available from the SyndeoCMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5841.title: nuBoard index.php file include
CVE-2007-5841.body: nuBoard could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the site parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5842.title: Vortex Portal cfgProgDir file include
CVE-2007-5842.body: Vortex Portal could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the secure.php or the checklogin.php script using the cfgProgDir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5843.title: scWiki common.php file include
CVE-2007-5843.body: scWiki could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the common.php script using the pathdot parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5844.title: GuppY error.php id file include
CVE-2007-5844.body: GuppY could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the error.php script using the "id" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5849.title: CUPS SNMP asn1_get_string() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5849.body: CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer underflow in the asn1_get_string function. By sending a specially-crafted SNMP reply containing negative length values in an asn1 encoded string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the service to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of CUPS (1.3.5 or later), available from the CUPS Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5850.title: Apple Mac OS X Desktop services buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5850.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in Desktop Services. By persuading a victim to open a directory containing a specially-crafted .DS_Store file using Finder, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5851.title: Apple Mac OS X iChat weak security
CVE-2007-5851.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an unspecified error in iChat. A remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to start a video conference with a victim without prior approval which could be used to launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5854.title: Apple Mac OS X Launch Services cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5854.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack, caused by improper handling of HTML files by Launch Services. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted HTML file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks and obtain sensitive information on the vulnerable system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5855.title: Apple Mac OS X Mail weak security
CVE-2007-5855.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security when creating an SMTP account using Account Assistant. If SMTP authentication is selected on an MD5 Challenge-Response authentication and plaintext authentication supported server, Mail defaults to a plaintext authentication setting. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5856.title: Apple Mac OS X QuickLook information disclosure
CVE-2007-5856.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to restrict Plug-ins in QuickLook from making requests. By persuading a victim to preview a specially-crafted HTML file using QuickLook, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to initiate network requests and obtain sensitive information.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5857.title: Apple Mac OS X QuickLook unauthorized access
CVE-2007-5857.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to a system. By persuading a victim to create an icon for a movie file or preview a specially-crafted movie file using QuickLook, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to URLs within the movie file.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5858.title: Apple Safari WebKit security bypass
CVE-2007-5858.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability within the WebKit component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass same-origin policy restrictions and gain unauthorized access to other domains. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Windows XP and Vista:Apple the Safari 3 Beta Update 3.0.4 Security Update, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone:Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone (1.1.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5859.title: Apple Mac OS X Safari RSS code execution
CVE-2007-5859.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of Safari RSS feeds. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URL, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5861.title: Apple Mac OS X Microsoft Office Spotlight Importer code execution
CVE-2007-5861.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the Microsoft Office Spotlight Importer. By persuading a victim to download a specially-crafted .xls file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5863.title: Apple Mac OS X Software Update command execution
CVE-2007-5863.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a man-in-the-middle vulnerability that exists when Software Update is checking for new updates. By intercepting the requests to the update server, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to send out a specially-crafted distribution file and execute arbitrary commands on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2007-009 v1.1, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5887.title: ASP Message Board printer.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-5887.body: ASP Message Board is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the printer.asp script using the forum parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5888.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery displayecard.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5888.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the displayecard.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "data" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the Coppermine Gallery Forum posting dated November 5, 2007 09:05:36 AM for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5891.title: ManageEngine OpManager Login.do cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5891.body: ManageEngine OpManager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Login.do script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the requestid, fileid, woMode or the woID parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5892.title: SSReader Pdg2.dll ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5892.body: The SSReader Pdg2 ActiveX control (pdg2.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the Register() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5893.title: C++ Sockets Library HTTPSocket.cpp denial of service
CVE-2007-5893.body: C++ Sockets Library is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation by the HTTPSocket.cpp program. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request with an empty protocol version number, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the application which is using the affected library.Upgrade to the latest version of C++ Sockets Library (2.2.5 or later), available from the C++ Sockets Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-5904.title: Linux kernel CIFS VFS SendReceive() buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5904.body: The CIFS VFS file system in Linux kernel is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the SendReceive() function. By sending an overly long SMB response, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the file system to crash.Apply the patch available from the Linux kernel GIT Repository. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5911.title: Viewpoint Media Player ActiveX control multiple function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5911.body: The Viewpoint Media Player ActiveX control (AxMetaStream.dll) for Internet Explorer is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the BroadcastKey(), BroadcastKeyFileURL(), Component(), ComponentClassID(), ComponentFileName(), ExtraProperty(), Properties(), RequiredVersions(), Source() or the XMLText() function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5915.title: PHPHelpdesk index.php file include
CVE-2007-5915.body: PHPHelpdesk could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the whattodo parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5917.title: Skalinks admin_account.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2007-5917.body: Skalinks is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin_account.php script. By persuading an authenticated victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to add new admin users and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5925.title: MySQL ha_innodb.cc convert_search_mode_to_innobase() denial of service
CVE-2007-5925.body: MySQL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the convert_search_mode_to_innobase() function in ha_innodb.cc. A remote attacker with ALTER privileges could exploit this vulnerability to cause the database server to crash.For Gentoo Linux (MySQL):Refer to GLSA 200711-25 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5926.title: Openbase SQL stored procedures command execution
CVE-2007-5926.body: Openbase SQL could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input within the stored procedures. A remote attacker from within the local network could send a specially-crafted request and inject arbitrary shell commands using backtick characters, which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Openbase SQL (10.0.8 or later), available from the OpenBase Downloads Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-5929.title: Openbase SQL stored procedures buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5929.body: Openbase SQL is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when creating stored procedures. By creating a stored procedure with an overly long name, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Openbase SQL (10.0.8 or later), available from the OpenBase Downloads Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-5930.title: Cerberus FTP Server Web interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5930.body: Cerberus FTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Cerberus FTP Server (2.46 or later), available from the Cerberus FTP Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5931.title: OrangeHRM reDirect() security bypass
CVE-2007-5931.body: OrangeHRM could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in which the reDirect() fails to validate user privileges. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of OrangeHRM (2.2.2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2007-5932.title: FatWire Content Server search fields cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5932.body: FatWire Content Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search and advanced search field. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest patched version of FatWire Content Server (6.3 or later), available from the FatWire Corporation Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5941.title: Adobe Shockwave SWCtl.SWCtl ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-5941.body: The Adobe Shockwave SWCtl.SWCtl ActiveX control (SWCtl.SWCtl) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the ShockwaveVersion() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash. Adobe reports through private correspondence that this vulnerability is not exploitable.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5947.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey jar: URI cross-site scripting
