CVE-2007-5947.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of jar: URIs. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted jar: URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. This vulnerability is only exploitable on Web sites that allow users to upload image, archive, and certain other file types.For Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey:Refer to MFSA 2007-37 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5950.title: NetCommons unspecified parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5950.body: NetCommons is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of NetCommons (1.0.11 or 1.1.2 or later), available from the NetCommons Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5958.title: X.Org X11 X -sp command information disclosure
CVE-2007-5958.body: X.Org X11 could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper processing of security policy arguments. By sending the file name as a command line argument to the X -sp command, a local attacker could disclose the existence of restricted files and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of X.org X11 (1.4 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For Sun Solaris:Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103205 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5960.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey window.location HTTP Referer spoofing
CVE-2007-5960.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to spoof HTTP Referer headers, caused by a race condition that exists when setting the window.location property. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch cross-site request forgery attacks against Web sites that utilize the Referer header to protect against these types of attacks.Refer to MFSA 2007-39 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-5961.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server RHN channel search cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5961.body: Red Hat Network Satellite Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to RHSA-2008-0261 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-5962.title: vsftpd deny_file denial of service

CVE-2007-5975.body: The TBSource code is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5979.title: F5 Networks FirePass 4100 SSL VPN download_plugin.php3 cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5979.body: F5 Networks FirePass 4100 SSL VPN is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the download_plugin.php3 script. Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-5980.title: eggblog rss.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5980.body: eggblog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the rss.php script. CVE-2007-5984.body: AutoIndex PHP Script is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2007-5985.body: BtiTracker is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the usercp.php script. CVE-2007-5986.body: BtiTracker is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the functions.php script using an unknown parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of BtiTracker (1.4.5 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files. CVE-2007-5987.title: BtiTracker details.php security bypass
CVE-2007-5987.body: BtiTracker could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper restricting by the details.php script. CVE-2007-5990.title: ExoPHPDesk index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5990.body: ExoPHPDesk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2007-5991.title: ExoPHPDesk index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5991.body: ExoPHPDesk is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the profile parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-5993.title: VTLS Web Gateway vtls.web.gateway.cgi cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-5993.body: VTLS Web Gateway is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the vtls.web.gateway.cgi script. CVE-2007-5996.title: Softbiz Link Directory Script searchresult.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5996.body: Softbiz Link Directory Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5997.title: Softbiz Banner Exchange Network Script campaign_stats.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-5997.body: Softbiz Banner Exchange Network Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-5999.body: Softbiz Auctions Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-6000.body: Konqueror is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of cookies. By sending an argument containing an overly long cookie, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the victim's browser.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6003.title: Thomson SpeedTouch 716 url cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6003.body: The Thomson SpeedTouch 716 router is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the cgi/b/ic/connect/ script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the url parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2007-6004.title: TokoInstan index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6004.body: TokoInstan is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-6005.title: WebEx GPCContainer ActiveX Control denial of service
CVE-2007-6005.body: The WebEx GPCContainer ActiveX Control (GpcContainer.GpcContainer.1) is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by a memory access violation in the InitParam() and SetParam() functions. CVE-2007-6012.title: DocuSafe SearchR.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-6012.body: DocuSafe is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-6015.title: Samba send_mailslot function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6015.body: Samba is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the send_mailslot function. CVE-2007-6018.title: Horde IMP Webmail Client and Horde Groupware Webmail Edition HTML filter security bypass

By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted HTML email, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete arbitrary email messages or purge previously deleted email messages.Update to Horde version 3.1.6 or Horde Groupware Webmail Edition 1.0.4, available from the Horde Web site. CVE-2007-6020.title: Autonomy KeyView foliosr.dll multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2007-6020.body: The Autonomy (formerly Verity) KeyView Folio Flat File speed reader (foliosr.dll), which is used in IBM Lotus Notes, Symantec Mail Security, and possibly other applications, is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted Folio Flat File using one of the affected file viewers, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's application to crash.For IBM Lotus Notes:Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1298453 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6026.title: Microsoft Jet Database Engine MDB file buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6026.body: Microsoft Jet Engine is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing a MDB file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted MDB file, a remote attacker could cause the victim's application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or hosting it on a Web site.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-028. See References.

CVE-2007-6028.title: ComponentOne FlexGrid ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6028.body: The ComponentOne FlexGrid ActiveX control (VSFlexGrid.VSFlexGridL) is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6035.title: Cacti graph.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6035.body: Cacti is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the graph.php script using the local_graph_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Cacti (0.8.7a or later), available from the Cacti Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6037.title: Citrix NetScaler standalone parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6037.body: Citrix NetScaler is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the generic_api_call.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the standalone parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6039.title: PHP multiple gettext functions denial of service
CVE-2007-6039.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by an error in the dgettext(), dcgettext(), dngettext(), gettext(), ngettext(), dcgettext() functions. By passing an overly long argument in a specially-crafted PHP file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a segmentation fault.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6039.title: PHP stream_wrapper_register() denial of service
CVE-2007-6039.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by an error in the stream_wrapper_register() function. By passing an overly long argument to the stream_wrapper_register() function in a specially-crafted PHP file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a segmentation fault.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6040.title: Belkin Wireless G Router log.stm denial of service
CVE-2007-6040.body: The Belkin Wireless G Router F5D7230-4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of SYN packets. By flooding a device with SYN packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the log.stm logging system to consume all available resources on the device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6055.body: Liferay Enterprise Portal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login field. CVE-2007-6057.body: Datecomm Social Networking Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-6058.body: ProfileCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2007-6067.body: PostgreSQL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing complex regular expressions. CVE-2007-6079.title: Bcoos common.php local file include

Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6080.title: bcoos bid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2007-6080.body: bcoos is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the click.php script using the bid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6080.body: bcoos is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the click.php script using the bid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Vigile CMS (1.8 or later), available from the iTCms Web site. CVE-2007-6103.body: I Hear U is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation by the ring() function. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary shell commands using the domain and tld parameters containing a semi-colon character (;), which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system with the privileges of the Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6178.title: EHCP confdir parameter remote file include
CVE-2007-6178.body: EHCP (Easy Hosting Control Panel) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the dbutil.bck.php or dbutil.php script using the confdir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Easy Hosting Control Panel (0.27 or later), available from the Easy Hosting Control Panel Web site. CVE-2007-6179.title: Charray's CMS ccms_library_path file include
CVE-2007-6179.body: Charray's CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2007-6182.title: ISPmanager usr/local/ispmgr/sbin/responder privilege escalation

CVE-2007-6184.title: Project Alumni index.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-6184.body: Project Alumni could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the act parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to traverse directories and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6185.title: Eurologon CMS files.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-6185.body: Eurologon CMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2007-6187.body: NoAh The PHP Content Architect could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a direct request to the css_file.php, js_file.php or the xml_file.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the filepath parameter to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6188.title: TuMusika Evolution language directory traversal
CVE-2007-6188.body: TuMusika Evolution could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the languages_n.php, languages_f.php or the languages.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the language parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to traverse directories and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6188.body: TuMusika Evolution could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a direct request to the sc_download.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the uri parameter to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6191.title: p.mapper _SESSION[PM_INCPHP] file include
CVE-2007-6191.body: p.mapper could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the globals.php or mc_table.php scripts using the _SESSION[PM_INCPHP] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6195.title: HP-UX DCE swagentd buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6195.body: HP-UX when running DCE is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sw_rpc_agent_init function within swagentd. By sending specially-crafted arguments, a remote attacker could overwrite function pointers to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBUX02294 SSRT071451 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6196.title: @Mail func cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6196.body: @Mail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the util.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the func parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of @Mail (5.2 or later), available from the @Mail Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6202.title: Seditio CMS pag_sub[] SQL injection
CVE-2007-6202.body: Seditio CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker with knowledge of the database table could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the pag_sub[] function in the plug.php script using the search parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Seditio CMS (121 or later), available from the Neocrome Website engines Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6203.title: Apache HTTP Server 413 error page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6203.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could embed malicious script within a HTTP method request containing an invalid length data value, which would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site, once the link is clicked and a "413 Request Entity Too Large" error page is returned. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6204.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) multiple CGI buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6204.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the ovlogin.exe, OpenView5.exe, snmpviewer.exe and webappmon.exe CGI applications. By sending an overly long argument to one of the vulnerable CGI applications, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Refer to HPSBMA02281 SSRT061261 rev.1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6205.title: Serendipity RSS feeds cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6205.body: Serendipity is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Remote RSS sidebar plugin. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using links in RSS feeds to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the RSS feed is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Serendipity (1.2.1 or later), available from the Serendipity Web site. CVE-2007-6206.title: Linux kernel core dump information disclosure
CVE-2007-6206.body: Linux kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a root process creating a core dump in the same location as the UID of a core dump file owned by a non-root user. CVE-2007-6209.body: Zsh could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. The difflog.pl script creates insecure temporary files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to other files on the system using the insecure difflog.pl script which would allow the attacker to overwrite or delete arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6211.body: SING could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of log files when running as a suid binary. CVE-2007-6214.body: LearnLoop could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2007-6215.body: Web-MeetMe could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2007-6220.body: Typespeed is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error when handling malformed packets. CVE-2007-6221.body: TuMusika Evolution could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. CVE-2007-6229.body: Rayzz Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. CVE-2007-6232.body: FTP admin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2007-6234.body: FTP admin could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation by the index.php script during authentication. CVE-2007-6244.body: The Adobe Flash Player ActiveX control is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input embedded within an SWF file. CVE-2007-6244.body: The Adobe Flash Player ActiveX control is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input embedded within an SWF file. CVE-2007-6245.title: Adobe Flash Player unspecified HTTP response splitting
CVE-2007-6245.body: Adobe Flash Player is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting attacks, caused by improper validation of input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and modify HTTP headers using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to cause the server to return a split response, once the URL is clicked. This would allow the attacker to perform further attacks, such as Web cache poisoning, cross-site scripting, and possibly obtain sensitive information.Refer to APSB07-20 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6246.title: Adobe Flash Player memory permissions privilege escalation
CVE-2007-6246.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by an error within the setting of memory permissions. CVE-2007-6249.title: Gentoo Portage etc-update information disclosure
CVE-2007-6249.body: Gentoo Portage could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. The etc-update application creates temporary files with umask permissions which results in the files being world-readable. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by merging configuration files to gain unauthorized access to the system and obtain sensitive information.Refer to GLSA 200712-11 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. CVE-2007-6250.title: AOL Radio AmpX ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6250.body: The AOL Radio AmpX ActiveX control (AmpX.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the AppendFileToPlayList method. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that passes an overly long string to the AppendFileToPlayList method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.AOL Radio customers should contact AOL support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2007-6252.title: Learn2 STrunner ActiveX control (iestm32.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6252.body: The Learn2 STrunner ActiveX control (iestm32.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6253.body: The Adobe Form Designer and Form Client ActiveX controls (FileDlg.dll and SvrCopy.dll) are vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows. CVE-2007-6254.body: The BusinessObjects RptViewerAX ActiveX control (RptViewerAX.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. CVE-2007-6291.title: Absolute Banner Manager abm.aspx SQL injection
CVE-2007-6291.body: Absolute Banner Manager is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the abm.aspx script using the "z" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6292.title: MWOpen E-Commerce leggi_commenti.asp SQL injection
CVE-2007-6292.body: MWOpen E-Commerce is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the leggi_commenti.asp script using the id parameter which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6294.title: IBM Hardware Management Console (HMC) commands privilege escalation
CVE-2007-6294.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in IBM Hardware Management Console (HMC) could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system using certain HMC commands.For IBM HMC 3 R3.7:Apply the Security fix for HMC Version 3 Release 3.7, as listed in IBM Subscription service Bulletin 4036. See References.For IBM HMC 6 R1.3:Apply the Security fix for HMC Version 6 Release 1.3, as listed in IBM Subscription service Bulletin 4037. See References.For IBM HMC 7 R3.2.0:Apply the Security fix for HMC Version 7 Release 3.2.0, as listed in IBM Subscription service Bulletin 4038. See References.

CVE-2007-6295.title: IBM Lotus Sametime WebRunMenuFrame page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6295.body: IBM Lotus Sametime is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the WebRunMenuFrame page in the online meeting center template. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM SPR #IHAS77TRYF for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6298.title: Shoutbox module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6298.body: The Shoutbox module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when posting messages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the data is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2007-032 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6299.title: vbDrupal taxonomy_select_nodes() SQL injection
CVE-2007-6299.body: vbDrupal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the taxonomy_select_nodes() function using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. Note: Successful exploitation requires the installation of a module that passes data to the taxonomy_select_nodes() function.Upgrade to the latest version of vbDrupal (4.7.9.0 or 5.4.0 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2007-6302.title: Novell NetMail AntiVirus agent buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6302.body: Novell NetMail is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the AntiVirus agent. By using the avirus.exe service protocol to add integer value to a memory allocation routine prior to an integer overflow check, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the victim's system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (3.52f), available from the Novell Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6306.title: JFreeChart Image Map cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6306.body: JFreeChart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied image maps. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the chart name, chart tool tip text, and the href, shape, and coords attribute for a chart area to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of JFreeChart (1.0.8a or later), available from the JFree Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6307.title: wwwstats clickstats.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6307.body: wwwstats is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the clickstats.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the link parameter or the useragent field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of wwwstats (3.22 or later), available from the wwwstats Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6309.title: webSPELL calendar.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6309.body: webSPELL is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the calendar.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the upID, tag, month, userID, or year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6309.title: webSPELL usergallery.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6309.body: webSPELL is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the usergallery.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the galleryID parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6310.title: Falt4 CMS index.php and feed.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6310.body: Falt4 CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php or feed.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the handler or the topic parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the latest version of Falt4 CMS, available from the SourceForge.net Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-6311.title: Falt4 CMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6311.body: Falt4 CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the nav_ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the latest version of Falt4 CMS, available from the SourceForge.net Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-6312.title: Websense Enterprise and Websense Web Security Suite logon page cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6312.body: Websense Enterprise and Websense Web Security Suite are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the logon page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username field that contains a quotation mark (") to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply Hotfix #80, available from the Websense Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6314.title: BarracudaDrive Web Server source code disclosure
CVE-2007-6314.body: BarracudaDrive Web Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. If an attacker sends a URL request for a known LUA or any other custom script with a "dot", "plus" or any other character greater than 0x7f appended to the filename, the requested file's source code will be returned.Upgrade to the latest version of BarracudaDrive Web Server (3.8 or later), available from the BarracudaDrive Web Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6318.title: WordPress GBK or Big5 character sets SQL injection
CVE-2007-6318.body: WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. If "exact" and "sentence" are enabled, a remote attacker with knowledge of the database table prefix could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "s" parameter. If DB_CHARSET in the wp-config.php script is set to the GBK or Big5 character set, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress (2.5 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6321.title: RoundCube Webmail email messages cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6321.body: RoundCube Webmail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of HTML email messages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTML tags to inject malicious expressions into an email message which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the message is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of RoundCube Webmail (0.2-alpha or later), available from the The RoundCube Webmail Project Web page. See References.

CVE-2007-6324.title: CityWriter head.php file include
CVE-2007-6324.body: CityWriter could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the head.php script using the path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of CityWriter (0.9.8 or later), available from the Hulihan Applications Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6325.title: Fastpublish CMS designconfig.php file include
CVE-2007-6325.body: Fastpublish CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the designconfig.php script using the config[fsBase] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6326.title: Simple HTTP (shttpd) /aux denial of service
CVE-2007-6326.body: Simple HTTPD is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when handling HTTP requests. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP GET /aux request, a remote attacker could crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6327.title: AVS Media AVSMJPEGFILE.DLL ActiveX buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6327.body: The AVS Media AVSMJPEGFILE.DLL ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6331.title: HP Info Center HPInfoDLL.HPInfo.1 ActiveX control command execution
CVE-2007-6331.body: The HP Info Center HPInfoDLL.HPInfo.1 ActiveX Control (HPInfoDLL.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute commands on the system, caused by the use of the insecure LaunchApp() method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system.Refer to HP SoftPaq SP38166 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6335.title: ClamAV libclamav MEW PE buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6335.body: Clam AntiVirus (ClamAV) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the cli_scanpe function when parsing PE files packed with the MEW packer. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PE file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Clam AntiVirus (0.92 or later), available from the Clam AntiVirus Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6336.title: ClamAV MS-ZIP buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6336.body: Clam AntiVirus (ClamAV) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by an of-by-one error in the MS-ZIP decompression code. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Clam AntiVirus (0.92 or later), available from the ClamAV Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6338.title: CourseMill Learning Management System userlogin.jsp SQL injection
CVE-2007-6338.body: CourseMill Learning Management System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the userlogin.jsp script using the user parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6344.title: Mcms Easy Web Make index.php file include
CVE-2007-6344.body: Mcms Easy Web Make could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the template parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6345.title: aurora framework db_mysql.lib SQL injection
CVE-2007-6345.body: aurora framework is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the db_mysql.lib script using the value parameter in the pack_var() function, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of aurora 20071208 or later, available from the aurora Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6347.title: ViArt block_site_map.php file include
CVE-2007-6347.body: Multiple ViArt products could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the block_site_map.php script using the root_folder_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (site_map_security_fix_for_release_3_3_2.html), available from theViArt Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6349.title: Perforce P4Web Content-Length header denial of service
CVE-2007-6349.body: Perforce P4Web is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by improper handling of malformed HTTP Content-Length headers. By sending an HTTP request with no body and a Content-Length value greater than zero, a remote attacker could cause the P4Webs.exe process to consume all available CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of P4Web (2007.2 or later), available from the Perforce Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6353.title: Exiv2 setDataArea buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6353.body: Exiv2 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the setDataArea function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted EXIF image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to Red Hat Bugzilla Bug 425921 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6359.title: Apple Mac OS X cs_validate_page function denial of service
CVE-2007-6359.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by improper bounds checking of user-supplied input by the cs_validate_page function in the bsd/kern/ubc_subr.c file. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by causing the hashes function to return a NULL value, resulting in a kernel panic.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6361.title: Gekko temp directory path disclosure
CVE-2007-6361.body: Gekko could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the temp directory using an invalid parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6366.title: SineCMS mods.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6366.body: SineCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. If mods is set to "Calendar", action is set to "info" and the Calendar module is enabled, a remote attacker with knowledge of the database table prefix could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the mods.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of SineCms (2.2.7 or later), available from the SineCms Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6367.title: SineCMS mods.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6367.body: SineCms is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mods.php script. If the Guestbook module is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user and commento parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of the SineCMS Guestbook module (2.2.6 or later), available from the SineCMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6373.title: GestDown multiple scripts SQL injection
CVE-2007-6373.body: GestDown is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the catdownload.php, download.php or hitcounter.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6374.title: Bitweaver register.php, index.php and login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6374.body: Bitweaver is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the register.php, index.php or login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the error parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6381.title: Typo3 indexed_search system extension SQL injection
CVE-2007-6381.body: Typo3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the indexed_search system extension, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of TYPO3 (4.0.8 or 4.1.4 or later), available from the TYPO3 Security Bulletin 20071210-1. See References.

CVE-2007-6384.title: BEA WebLogic Mobility Server Image Converter information disclosure
CVE-2007-6384.body: WebLogic Mobility Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on sites that utilize Image Converter. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.Refer to BEA07-182.00 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6385.title: Kerio WinRoute Firewall unspecified security bypass
CVE-2007-6385.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the proxy server of Kerio WinRoute Firewall related to a failure to require authentication for HTTPS pages could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Kerio WinRoute Firewall (6.4.1 or later), available from the Kerio Technologies Inc. Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6386.title: Multiple Trend Micro products PccScan.dll ZIP buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6386.body: Multiple Trend Micro products are vulnerable to a buffer overflow in PccScan.dll, caused by improper validation of ZIP files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ZIP file with an overly long file name, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the SfCtlCom.exe process to crash.Apply the TIS16.0 English language security patch, as listed in Trend Micro Support Document 1036464. See References.

CVE-2007-6387.title: Vantage Linguistics AnswerWorks ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6387.body: Vantage Linguistics AnswerWorks ActiveX control (awApi4.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments to the GetHistory(), GetSeedQuery() and SetSeedQuery() methods, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects multiple Intuit products.For Vantage Linguistics:Apply the AnswerWorks security patch, available from the Vantage Linguistics Web site. See References.For Intuit:Apply the AnswerWorks Minimal security patch, available from the Intuit Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6388.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_status cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6388.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mod_status module. If the server-status page is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the status page is displayed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. Note: This vulnerability affects multiple vendor HTTP server components that utilize the Apache mod_status module. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache (2.2.7-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For WebSphere Application Server 6.0.2:Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.27 or later) or APAR PK59667. See References.For WebSphere Application Server 6.1.0:Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.17 or later) or APAR PK59667. See References.For Mac OS X 10.4.11, Mac OS X 10.5.2, Mac OS X Server 10.5.2:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Mac OS X Server 10.4.11:Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6392.title: DWdirectory search.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6392.body: DWdirectory is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php script using the search parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of DWdirectory (2.1.1 or later), available from the Dominion Web Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6393.title: Ace Image Hosting Script albums.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6393.body: Ace Image Hosting Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. If mode is set to editalbum, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the albums.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6394.title: Content Injector index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6394.body: Content Injector is vulnerable to SQL injection. If action is set to expand, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Content Injector (1.54 or later), available from the p3mbo.com Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6400.title: PolDoc download_file.php directory traversal
CVE-2007-6400.body: PolDoc Document Management System (PDDMS) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the download_file.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the filename parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6406.title: CA eTrust Threat Management Console IP Address cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6406.body: CA eTrust Integrated Threat Management Console is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the IP Address to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6407.title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6407.body: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using assess modification, user-id, and other unspecified attack vectors in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6408.title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express username information disclosure
CVE-2007-6408.body: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a weakness when creating new users. The application returns an error message depending on whether a valid username has been entered during a login attempt. An attacker could use this information to enumerate valid usernames and perform dictionary or brute force attacks to gain access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6413.title: Sun Solaris NFS unauthorized access
CVE-2007-6413.body: Sun Solaris could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the kernel patches 120011-04 or later (SPARC) and 120012-04 or later (x86) which are configured as NFS servers and allow root access to netgroups. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to systems that are excluded from configured netgroups and also obtain root access to shared files on the NFS server.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103162 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6421.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_balancer cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6421.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mod_proxy_balancer module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ss, wr, or rr parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache (2.2.7-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6422.title: Apache mod_proxy_balancer balancer_handler function denial of service
CVE-2007-6422.body: Apache is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the mod_proxy_balancer module balancer_handler function when using a threaded Multi-Processing Module. By sending a specially-crafted request to the bb variable during the editing of worker settings, a remote authenticated attacker could crash the child process handling the request.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache (2.2.7-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2007-6425.title: HP-UX ARPA Transport unspecified denial of service
CVE-2007-6425.body: HP_UX is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when ARPA transport is running. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to crash the service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (UNOF_37676.depto), as listed in HPSBUX02306 SSRT071463 rev.1. See References.

CVE-2007-6427.title: X.Org X11 XInput extension code execution
CVE-2007-6427.body: X.Org X11 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error within multiple functions in the XInput extension when swapping the byte order of client requests. If the X server is configured for TCP connections, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted X11 request to corrupt memory and cause the victim's application to crash or execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of X.Org X11 (1.4 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For Sun Solaris:Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103200 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6429.title: X.Org X11 MIT-SHM extension integer overflow
CVE-2007-6429.body: X.Org X11 is vulnerable to an integer overflow caused by improper bounds checking by the MIT-SHM extension. If the X server is configured for TCP connections, a remote attacker could create a pixmap with a specially calculated size to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of X.Org X11 (1.4 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For Sun Solaris:Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103200 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6429.title: X.Org X11 EVI extension buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6429.body: X.Org X11 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the EVI extension when handling a GetVisualInfo request. If the X server is configured for TCP connections, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted GetVisualInfo request to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of X.Org X11 (1.4 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For Sun Solaris:Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103200 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6432.title: Adobe Pagemaker .PMD Key Strings buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6432.body: Adobe Pagemaker is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow in AldFs32.dll, caused by improper bounds checking related to "Key Strings" when handling .PMD files. By persuading a victim to open a malformed .PMD file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSA08-10 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2007-6435.title: Novell GroupWise client SRC buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6435.body: Novell GroupWise client is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper parsing of the SRC parameter. By sending a specially-crafted email within an IMG tag and persuading a victim either to reply or forward the message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Novell GroupWise Client (6.5.7 or later), available from the Novell GroupWise Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6436.title: JustSystems Ichitaro JSGCI.DLL buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6436.body: JustSystems Ichitaro is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the JSGCI.DLL library when processing malicious documents. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available for users from the JUSTSYSTEMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6437.title: syslog-ng timestamp denial of service
CVE-2007-6437.body: syslog-ng is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a segmentation fault when processing incoming messages. By sending a message with a specially-crafted timestamp that does not end with a space character, a remote attacker could crash the application.For syslog-ng Open Source Edition:Upgrade to the latest version of syslog-ng Open Source Edition (2.0.6 or later), available from the BalaBit Web site. See References.For syslog-ng Premium Edition:Upgrade to the latest version of syslog-ng Premium Edition (2.1.8 or later), available from the BalaBit Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6438.title: Wireshark (Ethereal) SMB dissector denial of service
CVE-2007-6438.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SMB dissector. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the SMB dissector to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Wireshark (0.99.7 or later), available from the Wireshark Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6439.title: Wireshark (Ethereal) USB dissector denial of service
CVE-2007-6439.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the USB dissector. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause an infinite loop or an application crash, resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Wireshark (0.99.7 or later), available from the Wireshark Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2007-6439.title: Wireshark (Ethereal) IPv6 dissector denial of service
CVE-2007-6439.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the IPv6 dissector. CVE-2007-6451.title: Wireshark (Ethereal) CIP dissector denial of service
CVE-2007-6451.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the CIP dissector related to the allocation of "a huge amount of memory". A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the CIP dissector to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Wireshark (0.99.7 or later), available from the Wireshark Web site. CVE-2007-6452.title: Google Web Toolkit benchmark reporting system cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6452.body: Google Web Toolkit is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input to the benchmark reporting system. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Web Toolkit (1.4.61 or later), available from the Google Web Toolkit Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6454.title: PeerCast handshakeHTTP function buffer overflow
CVE-2007-6454.body: PeerCast is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the handshakeHTTP function. By sending an overly long request to the handshakeHTTP function, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PeerCast (0.1218 or later), available from the PeerCast Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6455.title: Mambo itemid and option parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6455.body: Mambo is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the itemid or option parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6457.title: SurgeMail host header denial of service
CVE-2007-6457.body: SurgeMail is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request with an overly-long repeating string sequence in the host header, a remote attacker could crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6466.title: MOG-WebShop index.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6466.body: MOG-WebShop is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the prod, cat or group parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6467.title: MKPortal ida SQL injection
CVE-2007-6467.body: MKPortal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the ida parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6471.title: phPay main.php file include
CVE-2007-6471.body: phPay could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the main.php script using the config parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6472.title: phpMyRealty (PMR) findlistings.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6472.body: phpMyRealty (PMR) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the findlistings.php script using the listing_updated_days parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6472.title: phpMyRealty (PMR) search.php SQL injection
CVE-2007-6472.body: phpMyRealty (PMR) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php script using the type parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6474.title: GF-3XPLORER index_3x.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6474.body: GF-3XPLORER is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index_3x.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the newdir parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of GF-3XPLORER (2.5 or later), available from Sourceforge.net:Files. CVE-2007-6475.title: GF-3XPLORER lang_sel file include
CVE-2007-6475.body: GF-3XPLORER could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of GF-3XPLORER (2.5 or later), available from Sourceforge.net:Files. See References.

CVE-2007-6476.title: GF-3XPLORER phpinfo.php path disclosure
CVE-2007-6476.body: GF-3XPLORER could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted direct request to the phpinfo.php script, which invokes the phpinfo() function to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of GF-3XPLORER (2.5 or later), available from Sourceforge.net:Files. CVE-2007-6477.body: Citrix Web Interface is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the on-line help. CVE-2007-6479.title: Dokeos profile.php file upload
CVE-2007-6479.body: Dokeos could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the profile.php script. CVE-2007-6483.title: Sentinel Protection Server and Keys Server directory traversal
CVE-2007-6483.body: Sentinel Protection Server and Sentinel Keys Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by improper validation of URLs by the Web server component. CVE-2007-6486.title: LineShout shout.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2007-6486.body: LineShout is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the shout.php script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2007-6487.body: WebGUI could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper restricting of access for valid users. CVE-2007-6494.body: Hosting Controller could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper handling of user supplied input by the addreseller.asp, AccountActions.asp, addsubsite.asp, UNINSTAL.asp, GatewayVariables.asp, choosetranstype.asp, importhostingplans.asp, and AutoSignUpPlans.asp scripts. By sending a specially-crafted URL request, an attacker could change user passwords, profiles, credit amount, pay type, and plans in addition to create new users, uninstall FrontPage extensions, and delete gateway information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6498.title: Hosting Controller multiple SQL injection
CVE-2007-6498.body: Hosting Controller is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the email field or login field, or to the accountmanager.asp, GatewayVariables.asp, or DisableForum.asp script using the sortfield, GateWayID, or ForumID parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6500.title: Hosting Controller multiple security bypass
CVE-2007-6500.body: Hosting Controller could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper handling of user supplied input by the addreseller.asp, AccountActions.asp, addsubsite.asp, UNINSTAL.asp, GatewayVariables.asp, choosetranstype.asp, importhostingplans.asp, and AutoSignUpPlans.asp scripts. By sending a specially-crafted URL request, an attacker could change user passwords, profiles, credit amount, pay type, and plans in addition to create new users, uninstall FrontPage extensions, and delete gateway information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6501.title: Hosting Controller multiple security bypass
CVE-2007-6501.body: Hosting Controller could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper handling of user supplied input by the addreseller.asp, AccountActions.asp, addsubsite.asp, UNINSTAL.asp, GatewayVariables.asp, choosetranstype.asp, importhostingplans.asp, and AutoSignUpPlans.asp scripts. By sending a specially-crafted URL request, an attacker could change user passwords, profiles, credit amount, pay type, and plans in addition to create new users, uninstall FrontPage extensions, and delete gateway information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6502.title: Hosting Controller install path information disclosure
CVE-2007-6502.body: Hosting Controller could allow a remote attacker to gain sensitive information. By sending a URL request containing the forum location when a forum is not available, an attacker could generate an error message that reveals the default installation path.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6502.title: Hosting Controller NEWSRVR.asp information disclosure
CVE-2007-6502.body: Hosting Controller could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the NEWSRVR.asp script. By sending a specially-crafted URL request containing the AdminName and AdminLevel parameters, an attacker could enumerate all usernames on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site. See References.

CVE-2007-6503.title: Hosting Controller multiple security bypass
CVE-2007-6503.body: Hosting Controller could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper handling of user supplied input by the addreseller.asp, AccountActions.asp, addsubsite.asp, UNINSTAL.asp, GatewayVariables.asp, choosetranstype.asp, importhostingplans.asp, and AutoSignUpPlans.asp scripts. By sending a specially-crafted URL request, an attacker could change user passwords, profiles, credit amount, pay type, and plans in addition to create new users, uninstall FrontPage extensions, and delete gateway information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Post-Hotfix 3.3 Security Patch), available from the Hosting Controller Web site.
